56a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan las kyang byas pa'o zhes so// ri dwags dang ri drags mo ni gser gyi rang bzhin te/ rin po che gzhan gyis spras pa'o// sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba ni nag po'o// kha cig tu gtso bo'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go//
56a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi rwa rnams ni rang rang gi phyogs rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go// de las gzhan pa rnams ni de'i glo dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go// rwa lnga pa la ni de las gzhan pa'i phyogs dang dbus kyi de bzhin
56a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i mdog ste/ ji ltar rigs par ro// phyogs gcig gi rwa thams cad kyang rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog kyang kha cig tu'o// 'khor lo'i dbang po zhal bzhi pa nyid la rang rang gi
56b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi zhal gyi mdog go/ zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no// bum pa bzang po rnams ni gser las byas pa'o// dpag bsam gyi shing rnams ni de las gzhan pa'i shing bzang po lta bu'o// pad+ma'i lta ba ni ljang gu'o// gas ra na
56b2(rgyud 'grel): sor po'o// 'dab ma rnams ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'o// de'i sa gzhi dmar po shas che ba'i dkar po'o// chos 'byung gi cha'i re khA ni dkar po'o// khor yug gi phyogs la yang shol nyid yin na ro khA dkar po 'am gser nyid
56b3(rgyud 'grel): yin na nI ser po'o// rdo rje rnams dang de'i re khA nag po'o// gzhan rnams ni dkar po 'am ser po'o// zhes gsungaso// rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i mdog ni ji ltar mdzes pa ste/ bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la 'og tu rlung gi dkyil
56b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi mtha' nas steng du 'og min gyi mtha'i bar du rdo rje'i ra ba gnas pa'i phyir dang rlung la sogs pa rnams ni ji ltar rigs par kha dog sna tshogs pa'i phyiraro// 'od zer rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog
56b5(rgyud 'grel): skye 'phro ba'i tshul lo// 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni rdzogs sangs so shes sku yin phyir// dog dbang rdo rje'i rigasu brjod// chos sku'i rang bzhin dag pa la// 'di yi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro// zhes pa'i rigs pas/ dkar po ser
56b6(rgyud 'grel): po de bzhin dmar// ljang gu dang ni nag po nyid// rtsig pa'i tshon zhes gsungaso// gang gi tshe ches rnams rang bzhin gyis ni dkar// des na ngag dbang 'dir dkar nyid// ces gsungs pas/ gsung rdo rje dkar po gtso bor
57a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa de'i chen tshan gyi re khA dkar po dang ser po dang ljang gu dang / dkar ba'o// kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dkar ba nyid yin yang / mi bskyod pa dang lhan cig ra gcig pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir/
57a2(rgyud 'grel): nang gi rtsig pa nag po nyid do// gzhan du ni dkar po kho na yin te/ ji skad du/ gsung rdo rje gtso bor gyur pa kho cig tu dkar po nyid du 'gyur ba'o zhes gsungaso// rtsa ba'i thig nang gi dkyil 'khor du yang zur thig gnyis gnyis
57a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis bcad pa'i phyogs gzhi'i sa gzhi rnams rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go// bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi'i thig rnams de bzhi no// ka ba rnams kyang de bzhin te/ rang rang gi re mig gi de bzhin gshegs
57a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan ma'i phreng bas mtshan ma'o// gtso bo'i sa ni gtso bo'i mdog go/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma ni/ bden bral ljang la dbang ldan nag/ me dang rlung gi mtshams ni ser// phyogs rnams kyi ni dmar po'o// gtso bo'i snam bu
57a5(rgyud 'grel): la ni gtso bo'i mtshan ma'i phreng ba'o// re khA gzhan ni mdog dang sbom phra ji ltar mdzes pa'o// bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la ni thugs kyi 'khor lo nag po// de'i rtsibs kyi bar rnams ni dmar po ste/ gsung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba
57a6(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i phyir ro// gsung gi 'khor lo dmar po'o// de'i rtsibs par rnams ni dkar po ste/ sku'i 'khor lo'o lte ba yin pa'i phyiraro// sku'i 'khor lo ni dkar po'o// de'i rtsibs rnams kyi bar ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs
57b1(rgyud 'grel): rnamasu rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go// mu khyud gsum ni go rims bzhin du rdo rje nag po dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / 'khor lo dkar po'i phreng bas bskor ba'o// phyi ngos nas brtsams te nang
57b2(rgyud 'grel): gi bar du ljang gu dang / dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / nag po'i kha dog gi re khA lnga'o// shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho dang / dbus kyi sa rnams dang / theg rnams kyi kha dog dkar po dang / ljang gu dang /
57b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang / ser po dang / nag po'o// gzhan ni re khA lnga dang / sa gzhi dang / thog rnams nag po dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / dkar po dang / bsres pa'i sngon po'i mdogo zhes ze ro// de bzhin du
57b4(rgyud 'grel): snga ma dang / phyi mar kha dog gi rim pa yongasu bsams nas rdul tshon dgye bar bya'o// de yang bskal pa dang mi ldan pa 'dus pa na mtshan ma dang phyag rgya ji ltar rig par bri'o// skal ba dang mi ldan pa med na nI/ lha'i sku bri
57b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya zhing / bris sku 'am/ lugs ma 'am/ 'bur du btong pa 'am/ legs par 'dus byas pa gzhag par bya'o// de ltar klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis ji ltor nus pas dkyil 'khor du/ sa bon dgod bya yang na ni// mtshan ma
57b6(rgyud 'grel): 'am lha'i gzugs nyid de/ lugs ma 'am bzo byas dgod par bya/ zhes gsungaso// phyag rgya bri ba ni mngon por brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las gsungs te/ mi nus na ni bris pa yi// phyag rgya 'am mtshon ma dgod par bya'o// gang
58a1(rgyud 'grel): yang gsungs pa/ tshon nam yang na pir rnams kyis// bris pa rnams kyis rnam par spras zheso// dpal kha sbyor gyi rgyud du yang / de ltar lugs ma dang / 'dus byas pa la sogs pa'i gzugs dang / mtshan
58a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o// zhes gsungaso// de'i phyir 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la/ lte bar bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i zla ba la ral gri sngo bsangaso// shar du zla ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo dkar po
58a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs brgyad pa'o// lhor nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rin po che ljang gu cha dgu pa'o// nub tu nyi ma la mgon po 'od dpag med kyi pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o// byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i ral gri ljang gu'o// mer zla
58a4(rgyud 'grel): ba la spyan ma'i mig 'bras nag po can gyi mig dkar po gnyis sprin la gnas pa'o// bden dral du zla ba la mA ma kI'i rdo rje nag po rtse lnga pa ste/ rgyud du de ltar bshad pa'i phyiraro// rlung du zla ba la sau gos dkar mo'i pad+ma dmar po
58a5(rgyud 'grel): bye ba yu ba dang rtsa ba dang bcas pa'o// dbang ldan du zla ba la sgron ma'i ut+pa la mdog sngo ser ro// me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi dang / shar sgo'i g.yon dang g.ya suM cha chung gnyis gnyis spangs pa'i 'gram dag tu zla ba
58a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la go rim bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi me long dkar po dang / dri za'i pi wang sngon po dang / dri ser po'i dung dang / ro'i snod dmar po dang / ras
58b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs dang / chos 'byung dkar po'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgor nyi ma rnams la gshin rje mthar byed dang / shes rab mthar byed dang / pad+ma mthar byed dang / bgegs mthar byed kyi go rims bzhin du rdo rje tho ba nag po dang rdo rjes
58b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / rdo rje kha gyis pa sngon po'o// 'dir zla ba dang nyi mo bcu dgu ni sna tshogs pad+mo la gnas pa'o// mtshon ma thams cad ni 'od zer dang bcas pa rang rang gi phyogasu mgo bstan pa'o//
58b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ni mgo nub tu bsten pa'o// de ltar phyi ma rnamasu yang ngo // rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor lo'i dbang phyug nyid la ni dbusu chu skyes dang / zla ba la zhi ba'i rdo rje sngon po'o// kha cig ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o zhes so//
58b4(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa rnams ni dbus kyi 'od zer gyi thig zlum po la tshan gyi re khA mi bya'o zhes// zlum po'i thig gi phyi ngosu tshangs pa'i thig gi gle sa sar tsho chung bzhi dor nas bum pa cha chung bzhi pa ste/ bdud rtsisi bkang ba'i gser gyi
58b5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa cha brgyad do zhes phyogs gcig/ gzhan ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go zheso// 'di dang phyi ma rnams la dbusu de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan pa'i mtshan ma 'god pa
58b6(rgyud 'grel): na/ de'i gnasu dbus kyi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o// bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs po'i dkyil 'khor la/ dbusu nyi ma la mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje kha gyos pa rtse lnga pa in+d+ra nI la lta bu dang / reg bya rdo rje ma'i sna tshogs pa'i goso//
59a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rim pa dang po dang gnyis par gnas pa bcu gnyis po rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin// rim pa gsum par sgra'i 'gram gyi snam bu la tshangs pa'i thig
59a2(rgyud 'grel): nas cha chung bzhi dor bar g.yon du byams pa'i klu shing gi me tog 'khor lo dang bcas pa'o// g.ya su sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po'o// lhor de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje'i dang na mkha' snying po'i rdo rje dang / rin
59a3(rgyud 'grel): bo che mar gang cha dgu pa'o// nub tu de bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi pad+ma dmar po dang rdo rje'o// byang du de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i ral gri dang rdo rje'o//
59a4(rgyud 'grel): shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnamasu rim pa bzhin du gshin rje gshing la sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje tho ba dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'o// me la sogs pa'i mtsham su go
59a5(rgyud 'grel): rims bzhin du mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa sngon po dang / stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang / rdo rjes mtshan pas dbyug pa nag po'o// gtsug tor
59a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rdo rje sngon po ni gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngo su'o// kha cig ni 'khor lo ser po zhes bya'o// gnod mdzes rgyal po'i rdo rje ni pad+ma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngos su'o// byams pa la
59b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa brgyad rnams kyi mtshan ma ni zla ba gnas pa'o// gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bcu ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o// 'dir nyi ma dang zla ba sum cu rtsa gcig ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o// bum pa bri ba ni star
59b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no// kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la dbusu zla ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po'o// shar du zla ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo'o// lhor nyi ma la rin po che dbang po'i
59b3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen no// nub tu nyi ma la snang ba mtha' yas kyi mnga'o// byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o// spyan ma'i sprin la gnas pa'i mig gnyis so// mA ma kI'i mnga'o// gos dkar mo'i mnga'o// sgrol ma'i
59b4(rgyud 'grel): ut+pa la dmar po'o// rim pa gnyis par shar du drag mo'i mda'o// lhor rdo rje gzugs ma'i rdo rje'o// nub tu 'did chags rdo rje ma'i ral gri'o// byang du rdo rje zhi ba mo'o tal pa thung ngu'o// dbang ldan du rdo rje gnod
59b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin ma'i dbyug pa dkar ser ro// mer mkha' 'gro ma'i pad+ma dmar ser ro// bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma'i shag ti'o// rlung du sa rdo rje ma'i bum pa dkar ldengango // rim pa gsum byar shar gyi phyogasu gzhang ma'i rdo rje kha dog
59b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'o// lhor sgeg ma'i rdo rje'o// nub tu glu ma'i 'khar rnga'o// byang du gar ma'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa ljang gu'o// dbang ldan du gling bu ma'i gling bu'o// mer pi wang ma'i pi wa ngo // bden bral du mu kun Da ma'i mu kung Da
60a1(rgyud 'grel): rlung durdzarnam/ b+h+ya ste myur me tog ma'o me tog po blang ba'o// bdan bral du bdug spos ma'o smras par ro// rlung du mar ma'i myur ma'i mtshang snang // ba ldan du dra rdum
60a2(rgyud 'grel): dung chos so// shar du me long ma'i me long ngo // lhor ro me'i ro'i snod ngo // nub tu reg bya'i ma'i gos sna tshogaso// byang du chos ma'i chos 'byung dkar po'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgor ni go rims bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu
60a3(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / rdo rje zhags pa ma dang / rdo rje lcags sgrogs ma dang / rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje phreng ba'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje dril bu ma rnams te/ nyi ma la gnas
60a4(rgyud 'grel): pabapa'o/ 'dir brjod pa'i nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa'i mtshan ma bdun las mtshan ma gzhan ni zla ba la gnas pa'o// nyi ma dang zla ba sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du thong ba rnams la gnas pa'o//
60a5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa dri ba ni snga ma bzhin te/ thig zlum po drug pa las phyi rol tu zhes pa ni khyad par ro// ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor la dbus dang / shar dang bying dang / nub dang / lho rnamasu go rims bzhin du ye
60a6(rgyud 'grel): shes mkha' 'gro ma dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma mi zad ma dang / ro langs ma dang / gtum mo rnams kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha T+wAM ga rnamaso// dbang ldan dang / me dang bden bral dang rlung rnamasu sang
60b1(rgyud 'grel): ge mo dang stag mo dang / ce spyang ma dang 'ug pa mo rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu rnamaso// shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho'i sgo rnams su rgyal po'i dbang mo dang / gsal byed ma dang / 'jib byed ma dang / ka po dzAM rnams kyi go
60b2(rgyud 'grel): rims bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim pa kha bye ba dang / thal mo kha sbyar ba dang / snyim pa khrag gis bkang ba dang / rdo rje thal mo kha sbyar ba'i the bo'i rtse mo gnyis sbyar ba'i mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba'o// 'dir mtshan ma dang
60b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya rnams ni sna tshogs ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma ni rim pa bzhin du/ seng ge dang / mche ba can dkar po
60b4(rgyud 'grel): dong rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang / mi he dang / sbrul gyi dbang po brgyad kyi mjug ma dang / ro bzhi la gnas pa ste/ de ltar rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la ni bskal pa dang mi ldan pa 'dus pa na bri bar mi bya'o// gzhan
60b5(rgyud 'grel): du ni ngal bas 'jigs dang / yon bdag bsdus pa la dga' bas so// skal ba dang ldan pa rag tu dang bar bya ba'i don du ni yon bdag gi dbang las bri bar bya'o// de ltar phyi ma rnams la yang ji ltar 'byung ba bri ba dang mi bri
60b6(rgyud 'grel): babar rig par bya'o// phyi ngos kyi thig zlum po'i ngosu bum pa bri'o// bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid kyi kye'i rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba la khro bo'i rdo rje sngon po'o// shar dang lho la sogs pa dang / dbang
61a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan dang me la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la ni rim pa bzhin du rdo rje drag po dang / rdo rje gzugs ma dang / 'dod chags rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje zhi ba mo dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin ma dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / sgra
61a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ma dang / sa rdo rje ma rnams kyi mnga' dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / tal ba thung ngu dang / dbyug pa ser po dang / pad+ma dmar ser dang / sha ka ti dang / bum pa dkar ljang ngo // rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan dang me la sogs
61a3(rgyud 'grel): rnamasu gling bu ma dang / pi wang ma dang / mu kuN+Da ma dang / rdza rnga ma rnams kyi gling bu dang / pi wang dang / rnga mu kun Da dang / rdza rnga rnamaso// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnamasu rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje zhags pa ma dang / rdo rje lcags
61a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs ma dang // rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje dril bu rnam so// mtshan ma bcu bdun po 'dadi rnams ni thod pa dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// gling bu ma la sogs pa
61a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyi ni thod pa'i 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma'o// phyag gnyis pa dang bzhi pa la ni thod pa me do// phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba khro bo'i rdo rje sngon po'o// shar la sogs pa dang / dbang
61a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la gau rI dang / tsau rI dang / ro langs ma dang / za bod ma dang // spros mo dang / ri khrod ma dang / gtum mo dang / rab tu rmongs byed ma rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du mnga' dang / rdo rje dang /
61b1(rgyud 'grel): thod pa khrag dang bcas pa la gnas pa'i rus sbal dang / tshil gyi rkang pa la gnas pa'i sbrul dang / shes byakang ba la gnas pa'i seng ge dang / khu ba dang bcas pa'i thod pa la gnas pa'i dge slong dang / khrag dang bcas pa'i
61b2(rgyud 'grel): thod pa la gnas pa'i stag dang chang gi snod rnams so// rim pa gnyis pa'i mtshams rnamasu gling bu ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni snga ma bzhi no// shAr la sogs pa'i sgor stag gdong ma dang / phag gdong ma dang / khyi
61b3(rgyud 'grel): gdong ma dang / seng ge'i gdong ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje dril bu'o// mtshan ma bcu bdun po 'di rnams nyi ma la gnas pa'o// gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi nyi ma'i
61b4(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma rnamaso// dbus kyi 'od zer gyi phyi ngos su sngar bzhin du bum pa rnamaso// bdag med pa'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba dang / shar la sogs pa'i 'dag rnams la go rims bzhin du bdag med ma
61b5(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje ma dang / dkar mo dang / nu ma dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang / rim pa gnyis par phya bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor du brjod pa'i dkar mo la sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje'o// gling bu ma la sogs pa'i mtshan
61b6(rgyud 'grel): ma ni snga ma bzhin no// rta gdong ma la sogs pa'i gri gug rnams so// mkha' spyod ma'i rdo rje ni rta gdong ma'i phyi ngos su'o// sa skyod ma'i rdo rje ni khyi gdong ma'i phyi ngos su'o// 'dir gri gug bzhi ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o// mtshan
62a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// phyi'i dkar mo la sogs pa bco brgyad po rnams kyi zla ba dang / nyi ma ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o// gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad med pa ni lhag ma lha mo
62a2(rgyud 'grel): bco lnga po rnams kyi zla ba la gri gug rnams so// mkha' spyod ma'i mche na ma nI dkar mo'i phyi ngos so// ro langs ma'i phyi ngos su sa spyod ma'o// de bzhin du ku ru kul+le'i dkyil 'khor la yang yin te/ khyad par ni zla ba la
62a3(rgyud 'grel): u ba dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la dmar po kha 'bus pa'i mdo' yod pa'o// 'dir lha mo bcoM lnga po rnams kyang ku ru kul+le bzhin du mdog dmar po'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang po la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba dang /
62a4(rgyud 'grel): shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la go rims bzhin du rdo rje bdud rtsi dang / zhi ba mo dang / zhi gdong ma dang / zla ldan ma dang / ri bong can ma dang / zla dkyil ma dang / zla tshes ma dang / yang 'ong
62a5(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / yid tshim byed ma rnams kyi rdo rje'o// khyad par ni zla tshes ma'i zla ba chu gcig pa'o// rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan la sogs pa rnamasu me tog ma dang / bdug spos ma dang / mar me mA dang / dri chab ma rnams
62a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi me tog gi za ma tog dang / spos phor dang / mor me'i mchod sdong dang / dri'i dung chos rnamaso// shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnamasu gling bu me la sogs pa bzhi'i gling bu la sogs pa bzhi'o// shar la sogs pa'i
62b1(rgyud 'grel): sgo rnamasu khro gnyer rim par ldan dang / 'jigs sdigs dang / rta gzugs dang / tshogs kyi gtso bo rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu rnamaso// mtshan ma nyi shu rtswa gcig po 'di rnams ni
62b2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la gnas pa'o// me tog ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis kyi zla ba'i 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma'o// yang na dkyil 'khor pa thams cad la chos 'byung bri bar bya'o// 'di nyid kho na bri bar bya'o zhes pa ni gzhan dag go// gzhan
62b3(rgyud 'grel): dag go// gzhan rdo rje bdud rtsi gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma rnams ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud du rigs par bya'o// dgu'i bdag nyid can kye'i rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshigs pad+ma'i lte bar nyi ma la rdo rje
62b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon po kha dgyes pa'o// shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba rnams la go rims bzhin du dkar mo dang / tsham rkun ma dang / ro langs ma dang / za phodA ma dang / spros mo dang / ri khrod ma dag
62b5(rgyud 'grel): gtum mo dang / g.yung mo rnams kyi gri gug dang / cang te'u dang / rus sbal dang / sbrul dang / seng ge dang / dge slong dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje rnamaso// phyogs bcu drug pa'i nyi ma la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan
62b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thod pa dkar po zhes pa ni khyad par ro// phyi ngos kyi zlum po las phyi ngosu bum pa rnams// sgyu ma chen mo'i dkyil 'khor la pad+ma dmar po'i lte bar nya ma la bo tsam ldan 'das ma sgyu ma chen po'i pad+ma'i snod do// shar
63a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i 'dab ma'i zla ba rnams la g.yas bskor du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / ran chen mkha' 'gro ma dang / pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma dang / sna chags mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang /
63a2(rgyud 'grel): bache'i snye ma dang / sku tshugs chu skyes dang / rul zla'o// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro la ni rdo rje sems dpa' la 'khyud nas gnas pas de'i mtshan ma tha dad du mi dgod do// dgu'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas thong pa'i dkyil las
63a3(rgyud 'grel): la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar nyi ma la cang te'u'o// shwar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho dang / dbang ldan dang / me dang / bden bral dang / rlung gi 'dab mar nyi ma rnams la sna tshogs sde ma dang / 'dod ma dang / sa
63a4(rgyud 'grel): lkog nI gnas ma dang / legs bzungs m+b+ha dang / rlung 'tshang ma da // 'byung mi dang / phyug ban+ti ma dang / nAm kha la gnas ma rnams kyi blo grug rnam so// rdo rje hUM mdzad dkyil 'khor la dbus su rdo rje d+ha mdzad
63a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje// shAr la sogs par gaman skor du rdo rje dbyug pa dang / nyim mi dang / rdo rje gtsug d+hor dang / rdo rje 'khyil pa rnams dang / me la sogs par g.yoso sbyor du rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / dzarje dus dang / mig
63a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang / rdo rje bsdigs pa dang / gtsug tor dang / rdo rje sa 'og rnams kyi rdo rje tho ba dang / rdo rje dbyug pa dang / chu skyes dmar po dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / dgro sta dang / rtse gsum dang /
63b1(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje'i gtun shing rnams te/ mtshan ma thams cad ni sna tshogs mu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// yang na shar la sogs pa'i phyogasu g.yas skor du gshin rje mthar byed dang / shes rab
63b2(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed dang / pad+ma mthar byed dang / bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi rdo rje'i the ba dang / rdo rje mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'o// me la sogs pa'i mtsham su mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod
63b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa sngon po dang / stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa nag po'o// gshin rje gshed kyi mchen ma las phyi ngos su
63b4(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor 'khor lo can gyi rdo rje'o// pad+ma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngos su gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o// mtshan ma bcu gcig po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// yang na bgegs dgra'i rdo rje kha
63b5(rgyud 'grel): gyes pa'o// mye la sogs pa rnams su 'dod po'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa ston po dang / stobs po che dang / mi g.yo ba rnams kyi lcags kyu dang / rdo rjes mchin pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang / rtse gsum pa dang / ral
63b6(rgyud 'grel): gri'o/ gtsug tor 'khor lo can gyi 'khor lo ser po chen po'o// gzhan rnams kyi bshad ma thag pa snga ma bzhin no// yang na gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje zhags pa
64a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ra rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang / rdo rje dril bu rnams te/ gzhan gyi ni bshad ma thag pa snga ma bzhin no// bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar gnas pa'i nyi ma la dpal bde
64a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po kha gyes pa'o// phyogs bzhi'i 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma dang / lA ma dang / dum skyes ma dang / gzugs can ma rnams kyi gri gug rnams so// mtshe mos kyi 'dab ma rnams la pad+ma'i snod rnams so//
64a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rtsibs nyi shu rtsa bzhi la rab tu gtu mo dang / gtum mig ma dang 'od ldan ma dang sna chen ma dang dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang / mi'u thung ma dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang / shing grib ma dang sa
64a4(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs ma dang / 'jigs byed chen mo dang / rlung gi shugs can ma dang / chang 'thung ma dang / lha mo sngo sangs ma dang / rab tu bzang mo dang / rta rna mo dang / bya gdong ma dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang / dum skyes
64a5(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / chang 'tsheng ma dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang / rab tu dpa' mo dang / stobs chen mo dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma dang / brtson 'grus chen mo rnams kyi gr-i gug go// gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir dpa' bo rnams kyi mtshano ma mi
64a6(rgyud 'grel): bri'o// ra sgo rnamasu khwa gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong ma dang / khyi gdong ma dang / phag gdong ma rnams dang / mtsham su gshin rje brtan ma dang / gshin rje pho nya ma dang / gshin rje mche ba mo dang / gshin rje 'joms ma mo
64b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi sna tshogs chu skyes ma/ nyi ma rnams la gri gug go// 'drir shar la sogs pa'i phyogasu g.yon skor du dang / me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnamasu g.yas skor du mchen ma dgod do// phyi ngos su zlum po'i thig las phyi
64b2(rgyud 'grel): rol gyi mchims kyi char bum pa rnams bri'o// de las gzhan pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa dang / rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phreng bar brjod do// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid
64b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes la nyi mar cing ti'u'o// lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi gri gus rnams te/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogasu g.yon bskor dang / me la sogs pa'i mtsham su
64b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas bskor ro// de la 'khor lo nag po'i rtsabris kyi steng du phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la legs phreng can ma dang / thod pa can ma dang / 'jigs ma dang / mi thub ma rnams kyi'o// mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la
64b5(rgyud 'grel): thod pa rnamaso// de nas rdo rje sngon po'i phreng ba'o// rim pa gnyis po la rtsibs brgyad dmar po la gnas pa'i chu skyes brgyad rnams la phyogs rnams su dge ba'i ska rags ma dang / gzugs can ma dang / rnam rgyal ma dang /
64b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od can ma rnams kyi'o// mtshams rnams su dus can mo dang / mtsho chen mo dang / byed ma dang / bsod ma rnams kyi'o// de nas rdo rje phreng ba dmar po'o// rim pa gsum par rtsibs brgyad dkar po la gnas pa'i pad+ma brgyad
65a1(rgyud 'grel): la phyogasu sgrol ma dang / 'jigs mthong ma dang / legs mthong ma dang / thub dka' ma rnams kyi'o// mtshams rnams su dge ma dang / grib gnon ma dang / dus mtshan mo dang / grags chen ma rnams kyi'o//
65a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje phreng ba dkar po'o// sgo'i pad+ma rnams la mdzes ma dang / nor 'dzin ma dang / skal bzang mo dang / mthong ba yid 'ong ma rnams kyi'o// pad+ma nyi shu'i steng du nyi ma rnams la gri gug rnamaso zhes gdam so// rnal 'byor
65a3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi sna tshogs pad+ma dang / rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa'o// shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho'i re mig rnams la pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i kha T+wAM ga rnamaso// dbang ldan dang me la sogs pa'i
65a4(rgyud 'grel): re mig rnams la kha T+wAM ga dang / lcags kyu dang / dgra sti dang / dbyug pa'o// shwar la sogs pa'i re mig rnams la kha T+wAM ga rnams kyi phyi ngos su rim pa bzhin du khar bsdus pa'i lag pa gnyis dang / snyim pa sbyar ba dang khrag
65a5(rgyud 'grel): gi snyim pa dang gtun shing ngo // kha T+wAM ga la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o// 'od zer gyi khor yug gi phyi rol gyi shar phyogasu bdud rtsi'i thod pa gsumo// byang du sgron ma'i thod pa gsum dang / nub
65a6(rgyud 'grel): du gtor ma'i thod pa gsum dang / lhor btung ba'i thod pa gsum dang / dbang ldan du snyoms pa'i lag pa dang / dri'i snod do// maur ni pi wang dang / me tog gi za ma tog/ bden bral du sdigs mdzub kyi lag pa dang spos snod//
65b1(rgyud 'grel): rlung du thal mo dang mar me'o// de nas rdo rje phreng ba'i khor yug gi phyi'i shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la so sor bzhi bzhi dang sgo dang mtsham su brgyad te/ kha T+wAM ga nyer bzhi'o// bdud rtsi'i thod pa la sogs pa ni mtsho skyes ma nyi ma la
65b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o// gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyi rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa kha gyes pa'o// shar dang lho la sogs pa'i rwa'i rtsa ba rnamasu rtag po dang / rin chen
65b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang po dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa rnams kyi 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa dang / rin po che ldeng gu cha dgu pa dang / pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa dang / ral gri ljang gu rnamaso// sna tshogs rdo rje'i me dang /
65b4(rgyud 'grel): bden bral la sogs pa'i grwar rdo rje tsa ra tsi ka dang rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang / dkar mo rnams kyi 'khor lho dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri'o// de nas rdo rje 'phreng ba'o// de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyogs so sor rwa lnga'o/
65b5(rgyud 'grel): shar dang lho la sogs pa'i sgo rnamasu tho ba gshin rje gshed dang / dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dang / pad+ma gshin rje gshed dang / ral gri gshin rje gshed rnams kyi rdo rje rtse mo nyi shu bas mtshan po'i tho ba dang / dbyug
65b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dkar po dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / ral gri'o// 'dir rtag pa dang / lha mo rnams kyi mtshan ma ni zla ba la gnas pa'o// gzhan gyi ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o// nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'og tu ni sna tshogs pad+ma'o// dkyil 'khor gyi mtsham ste/
66a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams su pad+ma la gnas pa'i thod pa bzhi'o// ra'i glo rnams su bum pa rnamaso// rdo rje sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba la rdo rje rtsa dgu pa gser gyi mdog can no// shar dang lho
66a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba rnams la me tog sgrol ma dang / bdug seMs stsol ma 'ag ma ma'i sgralas dri'i sgrol ma rnams kyi me tog gi phreng ba dang / spos phor dang / mar me'i skong bu dang / dri'i dung chos rnamaso// me la sogs pa'i 'dab
66a3(rgyud 'grel): mar rtag pa dang / mi bskyod pa dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri rnamaso// shar dang lho la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje
66a4(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa mo dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog mi dang / rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi lcags kyu la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la'o// rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i phyi ngosu gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo sna tshogs
66a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang nyi ma la'o// rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i phyi ngosu rdo rje gnod mdzes ma'i sbrul gyi zhags pa ste/ sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la'o// me la sogs pa'i mtsham suM pad+ma las spyan ma dang mA ma kI dang / gros dkar mi sgrol
66a6(rgyud 'grel): ma rnam par dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bum pa dang / rir ba dang / me thab dang rgyal mtshan chen po'o// pad+ma'i phyi ngosu bum pa rnam so// 'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma 'am/ zla ba la
66b1(rgyud 'grel): mda' ste mtshan mo zla ba la gnas shing nyin par nyi ma la gnas te lha mo rnam par rgyu'o// shar dang lho la sogs pa'i phyogasu arka ma si dang / mgam si nga/ an rang d+han ma si dang / te dzo ma sI'i lha mo rnams kyi go rims bzhin du khab dang skud pa
66b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i khab dang / a sho ka'i yal ga dang mda' rnamaso// me dang srin po la sogs pa'i mtshams rnamasu u dA ya ma sis dang / gul ma ma si dang / bA na ma si dang / ts+tsha ba ra ma si rnams kyi mtshan ma ni go rims bzhin du
66b3(rgyud 'grel): arka ma si la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bzhin no// phyi'i pho brang gi snam bu'i shar du ma hA tsI ba ra ma si dang / ba rA ha mu khi'i lha mo dag gi rdo rje dang lcags kyu gnyiso// lho phyogasu lha mo pa dA kra ma si dang / ba ra li dag gi a sho
66b4(rgyud 'grel): ka'i 'dab ma gnyis// nub tu lha mo pa ra kra ma si daung / ba de li dag gi mda' gnyis so// byang du lha mo urma ma si dang ba rA li dag gi khab gnyis// me la sogs pa'i mtshams su pa tA li dang ba tA li dang / ba rA la dang ba rA
66b5(rgyud 'grel): ha mu khi rnams kyi khab dang skud pa dang bcas pa'i a khA ba dang a sho ka'i lo ma dang mda' rnams so// shAr sgor lha mo a lo'i rdo rje lcags kyu'o// lhor lha mo ta lo'i rdo rje zhags pa'o// nug tu lha mo ka lo'i rdo rje lcags
66b6(rgyud 'grel): sgeg go/ byang du lho mo sangs lo saM ba mA ra d+ha Ti'i rdo rje dril bu'o// 'dir sgo skyong ma'i mtshon ma rnams ni pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// gzhan dag gi ni pad+ma dang zla ba la'o// bsrung ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna
67a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar zla ba la so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rin po che'i chun po'o// shar du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i 'khor lo'o// lhor sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la
67a2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa'i rdo rje'o// nub tu sna tshogs pad+ma dang / nyi ma la bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i pad+ma'o// byang du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la rma bya chen mo'i rma bya'i mjug sgo'o// rim pa gnyis pa ri me la sogs
67a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtsham su nag mo dang / dus mtshan mo dang / rna ba nag mo dang / dkar mo rnams kyi dung dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum rnamaso// snom bu rnams la bum pa rnamaso// shar la sogs
67a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgor sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi'o// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyi rdo rje rtse
67a5(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa dkar po'o// lte ba'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar zla ba rnams la go rims bzhin du g.yas skor du sems ma rdo rje ma dang / rin chen rdo rje ma dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma dang / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi rdo rje
67a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po rtse lnga pa dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rtse mo can gyi rin po che dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma 'dab brgyad dkar dmar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog gi sna tshogs rdo rje'o// shar la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i lte
67b1(rgyud 'grel): bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la go rims bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag med dang / don yod grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po dang / rdo rje rin po che dang / rdo rje pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo
67b2(rgyud 'grel): rje rnams so// mi bskyod pa'i pad+ma'i shar la sogs po'i phyogs kyi 'dab myur zla ba rnamasde la rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje chags pa dang / rdo rje legs pa rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du rdo rje rje lnga pa
67b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa rdo rje lcags kyu dang / mnga'i dang / rdo rje'o// rin tshon 'byung ldan gyi pad+ma la rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje gzi brjid dang / rdo rje tog dang / rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa gnyis kyis
67b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba dang / nyi ma dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'o// snang ba mtha' yas kyi rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje rgyu dang / rdo rje bsrung
67b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi pad+ma dmar pr-i dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lho rtsibs brgyad pa dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i lce'o// don yod grub pa'i rdo rje las dang / rdo rje bsrung ba drang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyi
67b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje dang / rdo rje go cha dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mche ba dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o// mi bskyed pa la sogs pa so so'i byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa'i mtshan ma ni byang gi 'dab mar dang / bzhi pa'i
68a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma ni nub kyi 'dab ma la bri bar bya'o// me la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i lte ba'i zla ba rnams rdo rje sgeg mo dang / rdo rje 'phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje glu ma dang / rdo rje gar ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
68a2(rgyud 'grel): pibi wang dang / rdo rje'o// dbus kyi gzhal yas khang las phyi rol gyi snam bu'i shar du byams pa dang / mthong ba don yid dang / ngan song kun 'dren dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros rnams kyi pad+ma dang zla ba
68a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnams// lho phyogasu spos kyi glang po dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / na mkha' mdzod dang / ye sh+ye sa tog rnams kyi pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje rin po che rnamaso// nub tu 'od dpag med dang / zla 'od dang / bzang
68a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod dang / dra ban+dan gyi 'od rnams kyi chu skyes dang / zla ba rnams la rdo rje pad+ma rnamaso// byang du rdo rje snying po dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / spobs pa rtsegs pa dang / kun tu bzang po rnams kyi pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la sna tshogs
68a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnamaso// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mo la sogs pa'i grwa rnams pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje bdug spos ma dang / rdo rje me tog ma dang / rdo rje mar me ma dang / rdo rje dri chab ma rnams kyi mtshan mi ni snga ma bzhi no// shar la
68a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i sgor pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma rnamaso// snam bu rnams la bum pa rnamaso// bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid
68b1(rgyud 'grel): can 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa lnga ni sngon po dang / dmar po dang / dkar ba dang / ljang gu dang / ser po ste/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang / dbus kyi sa thams cad kyang ngo // dkyil
68b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gnyis pa la rtsig pa gsum ste/ sngon po dang / dkar po dang / ser po'o// 'khor lo gsum pa la rtsig pa dkar po gcig/ de la dbus kyi sa gzhi ser po lo sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la 'jam dpal gyi ral gri yu
68b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ser po can no// shA ra la sogs pa'i re mig gi nyi ma rnams la mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje sngon po dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ral gri
68b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan la sogs pa'i re mig gi zla ba rnams la spyan ma dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma rnams kyi rdo rje ser po dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / rdo rje dkar po dang / rdo rje ljang gu'o// rim pa gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor
68b5(rgyud 'grel): la shar la sogs pa'i phyogasu zla ba rnams la sems ma rdo rje ma dang / rin chen rdo rje ma dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma dang / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhino// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i
68b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshamasu zla ba rnams la tsun d+ha dang / rin chen dkar mda' dang / khro gnyer can dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog me rnams kyi ral gri dang / rin po che ser po dang / rdo rje dkar po dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog ljang gu rnamaso// rim
69a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor la shar gyi zla ba rnams la byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / spos kyi glang po dang / ye shes tog rnams kyi klu shing gi yal ga me tog dang bcas pa dang / ral gri dang /
69a2(rgyud 'grel): lag ldan gyi snam bu la gnas pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu ser po'o// lho'i zla ba rnams la bzang skyong dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa rnams kyi mda' dmar po dang / dkar po dang /
69a3(rgyud 'grel): ser po dang / ljang gu'o// nub kyi zla ba rnams la mthu chen thob dang / ngan song kun 'dren dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / dra ba can gyi 'od rnams kyi pad+ma dkar po dang / mngar dkar
69a4(rgyud 'grel): po dang / mda' ser po dang / ut+pa la dmar po la gnas pa'i nyi ma'o// byang phyogs kyi zla ba rnams la zla 'od dang / 'od dpag med dang / na mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams kyi ut+pa la la
69a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i zla ba dang / bum pa dmar po dang / mnga' ser po dang / mda' sngon po'o// 'dor go rims bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyi logs gnyis kyi snam bu la mtshan ma gnyis gnyis so// shar la sogs
69a6(rgyud 'grel): paba'i sgor nyi ma rnams la gshin rje mthar byed dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / rta mgrin dang / bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rnams kyi ral gri yu ba nag po can dang / rdo rje ser po dang / rdo rje dbyug pa dmar po dang / ral gri yu pa
69b1(rgyud 'grel): sngon po can dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi nyi ma rnams la mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa sngon po dang / stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri sngon po dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po
69b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po'o// gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi rol du nyi ma la gnod mdzes kyi ral gri'o// rta mgrin gyi mtshan ma'i phyi ngos su nyi ma la rdo rje sa 'ag gi rdo rje lcags kyu'o// zla ba dang nyi ma thams cad
69b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'og tu sna tshogs chu skyeso// snam bu rnams la bum pa rnamaso// kha cig tu ni gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi ngos su nyi ma la gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor lo dang ngo'i phyi ngos su gnod mdzes kyi ral
69b4(rgyud 'grel): gri'o zhes gsungaso// chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la nang gi 'khor lo tshon dkar pos dgang bar bya'o// gzhan na snga ma bzhin no// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbusuM sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba
69b5(rgyud 'grel): la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ral gri yu ba ser ba can no// shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma'i zla ba rnams la go rims bzhin g.yas bskor du gtsug tor chen po dang / gdugs dkar po dang / gar+thi
69b6(rgyud 'grel): brjid phung po dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba dang / 'phags pa dang / cher 'phags pa dang / rgyal ba ste gtsug tor brgyad po rnams kyi 'khor lo ser po rnamaso// shar gyi re mig gi
70a1(rgyud 'grel): dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje ston po'o// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams lnga rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje chags pa
70a2(rgyud 'grel): dang rardo rje legs pa rnams kyi rdo rje dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / mnga' dang / rdo rje'o// lce'i re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma dang / nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu ser po'i rgyal mtshon no// dbang ldan la sogs
70a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mtshams kyi sna tshogs chu skyes dang / zla ba la rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje tog dang / rdo rje bzhang pa rnams kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis kyi mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
70a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan dang / so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'o// nub kyi re mig gi dbusu sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma la snang ba mtha' yas kyi pad+ma dmar po'o// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtsham su sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje chos dang /
70a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje rgyu dang / rdo rje bsrung ba rnams kyi pad+ma dang / ral gri dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i lce'o// byang phyogs kyi re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i ral gri'o// dbang ldan
70a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs pad+mar zla ba rnams la rdo rje las dang / rdo rje bsrung ba dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshu ro rnamos kyi rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang / rdo rje go cha dang / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mche ba dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o//
70b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi re mig gi pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la spyan ma dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / mi bskyod pa dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod
70b2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i mtshan bzhin no// shar la sogs pa'i sgor sna tshogs pad+ma dong nyi ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'o// nang gi dkyil 'khor
70b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di las dkyil 'khor gnyis par shar phyogasu sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la sa bcu gnyis so// mos pa spyod pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od 'byed pa dang / 'od 'phro ba dang / sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du
70b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin dang / kun tu 'od kyi sa rnams kyi go rims bzhin du g.yas skor du pad+ma dmar po dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / sna
70b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang / ut+pa la dang / nor bu ma rA ga ta dang / pad+ma lnga gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang / sna tshogs chu skyes kyi steng du sna tshogs rdo rje yu ba dang bcas pa'i pad+ma dang / zla ba la
70b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po dang / ut+pa la'i steng du ral gri dang / chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang / pad+ma la bzhugs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
71a1(rgyud 'grel): sku'o// lhor sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rin po che pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gAtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang /
71a2(rgyud 'grel): stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis rnams kyi pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'bru sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i snye ma dang / lo ma dang bcas pa'i a
71a3(rgyud 'grel): sho ka'i me tog gi chun po dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / pad+ma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang / chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang / ut+pa la la gnas pa'i ral
71a4(rgyud 'grel): gri dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang / rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga dang / ut+pa la la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o// nub tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang / zla ba rnams la
71a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dang / yo byad dang / las dang / skye ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mos pa dang / smon lom dang / ye shes dang / chos la dbang ba rnams dang / de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste/ dbang bcu gnyis rnams
71a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi nor bu pad+ma rA ga la gnas pa'i ting 'dzin gyi phyog rgya dang ldan pa'i tshe dpag med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rdo rje dmar po rtse lnga pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / me tog dzA ti
71b1(rgyud 'grel): kha dog sna tshogs pa'i yal 'dab dang / pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang / pri yang ku'i me tog gi snye ma dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / ut+pa la la gnas pa'i ral gri dang / pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum pa bzang po dang / 'dam
71b2(rgyud 'grel): skyes dkar po dang / chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o// byang phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la dbyig gi blo gros ma dang / rin po che'i skar mda' dang / gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dang / 'od zer can dang ri
71b3(rgyud 'grel): khrod lo ma can dang / dzaM gu lI dang / sgo mtha' yas ma dang / skul byed mo dang / shes rab 'phel ma dang / las dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ma dang / ye shes mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
71b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi mdzod ldan ma rnams te/ gzungs bcu gnyis rnams kyi 'bras kyi snye ma dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu zla ba chu shel gyi bum pa dang / skud pa dang bcas pa'i kha ba dang / rma bya'i mjug sgro dang / dug gi
71b5(rgyud 'grel): me tog gi chun po dang / pad+ma dmar po la gnas pa'i mi zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa dang / ril pa s+yai blugs la phreng ba dpyangs pa dang / ut+pa la sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri dang / rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshon pa'i pad+ma dkar
71b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar dang / rin po che'i za ma tog dang // pad+ma la gnas pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'i dpe sgom mo// shar la sogs pa'i sgor chu skyes dang / nyi ma rnams la chos so sor yang dag par rig pa dang / don so so yang dag par rig pa
72a1(rgyud 'grel): dang du nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spongs pa so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rIn pa lI zhugs pa dang / mtha' gnyis su pad+mas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog dang /
72a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i dril bu'o// me la sogs pa'i mtshams su sgeg mo dang / phreng ba ma dang / glu ma dang / gar ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / pi wang dang / rdo rje'o// dkyil 'khor gsum par pad+ma dang
72a3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba rnams la shar phyogs su kun tu bzang po'i ut+pa la la gnas pa'i ral gri dang / blo gros mi zad pa'i ral gri dang / sa'i snying po'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang / na mkha'i snying po'i rin po che'o// lho phyogs
72a4(rgyud 'grel): su na mkha' mdzod kyi yod bzhin gyi nor bu dang / phyug nA rin chen gyi rin po che dang / blo gros rgya mtsho'i dung dang / rdo rje snying po'i rdo rje'o// nub tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma dang / mthu chen thob kyi ral gri dang / zla'o
72a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo dang / dra ba can gyi 'od kyi ral gri'o// byang du pad+ma dang nya ma rnams la 'od dpag med dang / spobs pa rtsegs pa dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / sgrib pa
72a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams kyi sna tshogs pad+ma dang pad+ma la gnas pa'i ral gri dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / ral gri'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgor pad+ma dang zla nyi ma rnams la gshin rje mthar byed dang / shes rab mthar
72b1(rgyud 'grel): byed dang / pad+ma mthar byed dang / bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgyogs dang / dril bu rnam so// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la 'jig rten gsum
72b2(rgyud 'grel): las rnam par rgyal ba dang / rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bor ba dang / he ru ka rdo rje dang / rta mchog rnams kyi ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / sna tshogs rdo rje rnam so// ga shin rje mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyir gtsug tor 'khor
72b3(rgyud 'grel): los sgyur ba'i 'khor lo ser po'o// pad+ma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyir gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bzhi'i phyi ngos su dkyil 'khor gsum po kho na'i zur gyi nang du
72b4(rgyud 'grel): re khA bya'o// de'i phyi ngos kyi gnas kyi me la sogs pa'i zur thig rnams kyi g.yas logs su gnas pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la me tog ma dang / bdug spos ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma rnams kyi me tog gi snod dang /
72b5(rgyud 'grel): spros por dang / rin po che'i sgrol ma'i mchod stong dang dung ngo // g.yon log su gnas pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje gzugs ma dang / rdo rje sgyu ma dang / rdo rje ro ma dang / rdo rje reg bya ma rnams kyi mye long dang / pi wang dang
72b6(rgyud 'grel): snod dang / gos sna tshogaso// phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la pad+ma rnams la sha ri la sogs pa'i phyogs su dbang po dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / lus ngan po rnams kyi rdo rje dang / dbyug pa dang / klu'i
73a1(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa dang / lcags kyu'o// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su dbang ldan dang / me lha dang / srin po'i bdag po dang / rlung lha rnams kyi rtse gsum pa dang / blugs gzar dang / ral gri dang /
73a2(rgyud 'grel): rlung ras so// de nas dbang ldan gyi phyi ngos dang nye bar dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te/ mtshan ma rnams rims kyis bar bya'o// de la tshangs pa'-i bgrang phreng ngo // khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'o// dbang phyug chen po'i
73a3(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum pa dang / gdong drug gi shag ti dang / tshangs mo'i phreng ba dang / drag mo'i rtse gsum dang / khyab 'jug ma'i 'khor lo dang / gzhon nu ma'i shag ti dang / dbang mo'i rdo rje dang / phag mo'i nya ro hi ta dang / tsa mun Da'i
73a4(rgyud 'grel): gri gug dang / 'bring gi ri ti'i phreng ba dang / tshogs bdag gi dgra sta dang / nag po chen po'i rtse gsum dang / dga' byed dbang phyug gi rdza rnga dang / nyi ma'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / zla ba'i kun ta ma la
73a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / mig dmar gyi gri skur dang / lag pa'i mda' dang / phur bu'i phreng ba dang / pA wa spangs kyi phreng ba dang / spen pa'i dbyug pa nag po dang / sgra gcan gyi zla ba dang / mjug
73a6(rgyud 'grel): rings kyi klu'i zhags pa dang / stobs bzangs kyi gshol dang / rgyal bar byed pa'i me tog gi phrad ba dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa'i chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang / dpyid kyi zla dang / mtha' yas dang / nor rgyas dang / 'dzeg
73b1(rgyud 'grel): po dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / dung spyod dang / rigs ldan rnams kyi thal mo sbyar ba 'am/ yang na rang rang gi pha'i mtshan ma dang 'dra ba'i mtshan ma'o// de la mtha' yas dang rig ldan ni bram ze ste
73b2(rgyud 'grel): me lha'i bu'o// nor rgyas dang dung skyong ni rgyal rigs te dbang po'i'o// 'jog po dang / pad+ma chen po ni rje'u'i rigs te rlung lha'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma ni dmangs rigs te chu lha'i 'o// thag bzangs ris dang / stobs
73b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan dang / rab tu tshim byed dang / rnam par snang byed la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi ral gri la sogs pa'i mtshan cha sna tshogs pa'o// nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i thal mo sbyar ba'o// mi 'am ci'i
73b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po ljon pa'i pi wang ngo // dri zla'i rgyal po zur phud lta ba'i pi wang ngo // rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po don kun grub pa'i me tog gI phreng ba'o// gang ba bzang pho dang / nor bu bzang po dang / nor sbyin dang / rnam thos
73b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi bu dang / tsaM bi kut+tA li dang / ki li mA li dang / sgo'i dbang po dang / spyod pa'i dbang po ste/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams kyi shing tog dzi pUr rnams so// 'phrog ma'i chang bu gnyis so// tha skar dang / bla nye dang /
73b6(rgyud 'grel): smin drug dang / snar ma dang / mgo dang / lag dang / nabs so dang / rgyal dang / skag dang / mchu dang / gre dang / dbo dang / me bzhi dang / nag pa dang / sa ri dang / sa ga dang / lha mtshams dang / snron dang /
74a1(rgyud 'grel): snrubs dang / chu sbyong dang / chu skad dang / zo bzhin dang / mon tha dang / mon gru dang / khrums spyod dang / khyams spyad dang / nam gru dang / byi bzhin rnams kyi ni lag pa thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgyu rnams so//
74a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dir yang sgro rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa la bum pa rnamaso// ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje phreng ba sngon po'i nang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad po'i dbus su chos kyi
74a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i phyag rgya sar bri'o// shar la sogs pa'i rtsibasdu rnams la sa gnon gyi phag rgya dkar po dang / mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya skyon b+h+yo dang / bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya dmar po dang / mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya ljang gu rnam
74a4(rgyud 'grel): so/ me la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams la nyi ma dang / yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / ral gri dang / gdug so// rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi'i me la sogs pa'i mtshams su sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'o// shir la
74a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i snam bu la sgo'i g.yon du mtshan ma gnyis te/ g.yas su yang ngo // der klu shing gi me tog dang / spyan dang bcas pa'i chu skyes dang / lcags kyu dang / dbyug pa dang / dung dang / ral gri dang / pad+ma la
74a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i chos kyi sgrom dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang / pad+ma la gnas po'i zla ba'i gzugs dang / rin po che dang / rdo rje gur dang / rdo rje dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la dang / bdud
74b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsi'i bum pa dang / mu skyes la gnas pa'i rin po che dang / rin po che'i sna ma'o// me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams la me tog la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams// sgra rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams so//
74b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma sum cu rtsa bdun po rnams sna tshogs pad+ma dang / zla ba la gnas pa'o// mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma ni bri ba yang ngo // 'byung ba 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor la rtsig pa lnga dang / shar
74b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i sa ni dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / nag po'o// thig gi re khA gsum ni dkar po dang / dmar po dang / nag po'o// thig gau ri/ pU gcig dang / rdo rje phreng ba'i re khA gnyis
74b4(rgyud 'grel): ni nag po'o// nang gi pho brang gi dbus kyi re mig la sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la bcom ldan 'das 'byung po 'dul byed kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po'o// shar du nyi ma la dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum pa'o// lhor nyi ma
74b5(rgyud 'grel): la khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'o// nub tu zla ba la tshangs pa'i phreng ba'o// byang du nyi ma la smin drug gi bu'i shig tr-I'o// dbang ldan du zla ba la tshogs bdag gi dgra sta'o// mer nyi ma la nyi ma'o pad+ma la gnas pa'i
74b6(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// bden bral du nyi ma la sgra gcan gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// rlung du zla ba la dga' byed dbang phyug go cang ti'u'o// rims pa gnyis par shar la sogs pa'i phyogasu dbang po dang /
75a1(rgyud 'grel): thog la mchogs dang / zla ba mo dang / da' ba zlog ma rnams kyi zla ba la bad+mad gar ba dang / spros par dang / mngam mtshad srung dang / gangangs ka'i rnam pa'i lag pa'o// ma la sogs par rin chan
75a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal mo dang / dbyangs can ma dang / lha madz+nyA sa ma dang / kun tu 'byor ma rnams kyi zla ba rnams la rim pa bzhin du dri'i dung chos dang / pi wang dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje rtse gsum pa'o// rim pa gsum par shar
75a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i phyogs su dbang po dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / lus ngan rnams kyi zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang / nyi ma la gnas pa'i thod pas mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dang / zla ba la gnas pa'i klu'i zhags pa dang /
75a4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la gnas pa'i dbyug to'o// me la sogs pa'i mtsham su me lha dang / bden bral dang / rlung lha dang / zla ba rnams kyi nyi ma la gnas pa'i phreng ba dang / nyi ma la gnas pa'i ral gri dang / zla ba la gnas pa'i rlung
75a5(rgyud 'grel): ras dang / zla ba dang / ku mu ta la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// zla ba'i mtshan ma dang nye bar dbang ldan gyi nyi ma la rtse gsum mo// rim+b+ha pa bzhi par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzinam
75a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyas pa dang / bang chen ma dang / rgyang 'phyog ma rnams kyi zla ba la seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / lcags kyu dang / mnga'i dang / ying bzhin gyi nor bu'o// dbang ldan lo sogs par mchog 'phrog ma byang
75b1(rgyud 'grel): chen dbang phyug ma dang / rgyal ma dang / 'gro skyeng ma rnams kyi zla ba la me tog gi snod dang / spos phor dang / dri'i dung chos dang / mar me'i mchod sdong ngo // 'dir nyi ma dang / zla ba thams cad ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o//
75b2(rgyud 'grel): rim pa bzhi par bum pa rnams so// mkha' 'gro lnga'i dkyil 'khor la dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su shes rab dang bcas pa'i kye'i rdo rje'i gri gug dang thod pa'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgor dkar mo dang / chom
75b3(rgyud 'grel): rkun ma dang / ro langs ma dang / za phod ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu rnams so// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su sbos mo dang / ri khrod ma dang / gtum mo
75b4(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yung mo rnams kyi byang chub sems kyi bum pa dang / ri rab dang / me khab dang / rgyal mtshan chen po'i ba dan no// de las shar gyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rtag pa'i thod pa'i la gnas pa'i rma bya'o// shar la
75b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i sgor skam pa mo dang / zhags pa ma dang / rol zlum ma dang / lcags kyu 'dzin ma rnams kyi skam pa dang / zhags pa dang / nya rgyu zlum po dang / lcags kyu'o// dbang ldan la sogs par me tog ma dang /
75b6(rgyud 'grel): bdug spos ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma rnams kyi me tog gi snod dang / spos phor dang / mar me'i mchod sdong dang / dri ser po gang ba'i dung ngo // lho'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rdo rje nyi ma'i thod pa la gnas
76a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byAk+Sha rAn da ka dang / shar la sogs pa'i sgor nyi lag ma dang / mar me ma dang / rin chen skar mda' ma dang / phyag+ha na glog thogs ma rnams kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / mar ma
76a2(rgyud 'grel): mched sdong dang / rin po che dang / glog gi phreng ba'o// dbang ldan la sogs par sgeg mo dang / phreng ba ma dang / glu ma dang / gar ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / mkhar rnga dang / rdo rje'o// nub kyi gzhal yas
76a3(rgyud 'grel): khang gi dbus su pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi thod pa la gnas pa'i dom dang / shar la sogs pa'i sgor pad+ma ma dang / chos 'byung ma dang / sgrog ma dang / rang mkhyud ma rnams kyi pad+ma dang / chos 'byung dang / sgrog dang /
76a4(rgyud 'grel): rje'o/ dbang ldan la sogs par gling bum dang / pi wang ma dang / rnga mu kuN+Da ma dang / rdza rnga ma rnams kyi rang rang gi rol cha rnamaso// byang gi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rta mchog gi thod pa la gnas pa'i gza' lhag
76a5(rgyud 'grel): dang shar la sogs pa'i sgor sgo lcags ma dang / lde sgrog ma dang / ske glags ma dang / yol ba 'dzin ma rnams kyi sgo lcags dang / lde skyog dang / sgo glegs dang / yol ba'o// dbang ldan la sogs par spya
76a6(rgyud 'grel): da mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mi dang / sgrol ma rnams kyi 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / yut+pa la'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo rnams su dkar mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnamadang / da
76b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs par spos mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams so// mtshan ma 'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// rtag pa kho na'i zla ba la gnas pa'o// dkyil 'khor so so la bdud rtsi'i bum pa rnams so// kha
76b2(rgyud 'grel): cig ni dkyil 'khor chen po kho na la'o zhes so// 'khor lo sgyur ba drug gi dkyil 'khor la mtshan ma rnams sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa ste/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro kho na'i zla ba la gnas pa'o// gzhal
76b3(rgyud 'grel): yas khang drug po rnams kyi grwa rnams su sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i thod pa rnams so// de la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi pad+ma la rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje'o// mtshams kyi pad+ma rnams la mkha' 'gro ma dang / lA
76b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / dumaM skyes ma dang / gzugs ca na ma rnams kyi rlung ti ru rnams so// 'dir dgod pa'i rim pan+ti shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su g.yon skor dang / me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su g.yas skor ro//
76b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rnams la thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab tu gtum mo dag dang / keng rus chen po dang / gtum pa'i mig can ma dag dang / keng rus dang / 'od ldan ma ngag dang / mche ba rnam par gtsigs ma dang / sna chen ma
76b6(rgyud 'grel): dag gi rdo rje bzhi'o// khor yug gi dbus su rdo rje'i phreng ba'o// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du dbus su pad+ma la 'khor lo dang / sgo'i pad+ma rnams la lha dgra dang / dpa' bo'i blo ma dag dang / 'od dpag med
77a1(rgyud 'grel): dang mi thung ma dag dang / rdo rje 'od dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dag dang / rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma dag gi 'khor lo rnamaso// khor yug gi dbus su 'khor lo'i phreng ba'o// rin chen mkha' 'gro'i
77a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la dbus su rin po che'o// sgra'i chu skyes rnams la nyu gu can+da dang / e ra pa ti dag dang / rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo dag dang / dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung shugs ma dag dang / rdo rje hUM mdzad dang /
77a3(rgyud 'grel): chang thung ma dag gi rin po che rnams so// khor yug gi dbus su rin po che'i phreng ba'o// pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su pad+ma'o// sgo'i pad+ma rnams lnga shin tu bzang po dang / lha mo sngo sangs ma dag dang / rdo rje bzang po
77a4(rgyud 'grel): dang shin tu bzang mo dag dang / 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta sna ma dag dang / mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma rnams kyi pad+ma rnams so// khor yug gi dbus su pad+ma'i phreng ba'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la
77a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'o// sgo'i pad+ma rnams la stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dag dang / rin chen rdo rje dang / dum skyes ma dag dang / rta mgrin dang / chang tshong ma dgA dang / na mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor
77a6(rgyud 'grel): mo'i go cha mi dag gi rdo rje rnamaso// khor yug gi dbus su rdo rje'i phreng ba'o// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor lo dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'o// sgo'i pad+ma rnams la he ru ka dang shin tu dpa' mo dag dang / pad+ma gar
77b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen mo dag dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los sgyur ma dag dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo dag gi sna tshogs rdo rje rnamaso// khor yug gi dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng
77b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ gzhal yas khang chen po'i sgo rnams la kha gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong ma dang / khyi gdong ma dang / phag gdong ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu'o// mtshams rnams su gshin
77b3(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje brtan ma dang / gshin rje pho nya ma dang / gshin rje mche ba ma dang / gshin rje 'joms ma rnams kyi me long dang / pi wang dang / dri'i dung dang / ro'i snod rnams so// bum pa rnams ni ji ltar rig par ro// de ltar brjod pa'i
77b4(rgyud 'grel): rjes su 'brangs te dkyil 'khor gzhan rnams la rdul tshon dgye ba yang shes par bya ste/ gzhung mangs pas 'jigs pas ma bstan to// dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la ni tshon gyi kha dog gi rim pa bshad pa dag dang phal cher mi
77b5(rgyud 'grel): mthun pas/ rdul tshon gyi kha dog gi rim pa brjod par bya'o// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis pa'i bar gyi nang gi sa thams cad ni nag po'o// thugs dang / gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi shar gyis thams cad
77b6(rgyud 'grel): ni nag po'o// lho ni dmar po'o// nub ni ser po'o// byeng ni dkar po'o// stegs bu ni dkar po'o// rin chen snam bu ni dmar po ste/ de la rin po che sna tshogs pas spras pa'o// dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i sa ni nag po ste/ de la dra ba dang
78a1(rgyud 'grel): dra ba phyed ni dkar po'o// sa nag po la rin chen shar bu dkar po'o// sa nag po la mnga' yab rnams dkar po'o// rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ser po'o// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la ni gtso mo'i pad+ma ljang gu'o// zhi
78a2(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa ni kha dog dkar po la sogs par 'gyu ro// rdo rje phreng ba dang / ka ba bcu drug ni nag po ste/ shar du ral gri nag po dang / lhor rin po che dmar po dang / nub tu 'khor la ser po dang / byang du pad+ma dkar ba rnams dang ldan pa'o//
78a3(rgyud 'grel): bum pa brgyad ni pad+ma la gnas shing dkar po ste/ pad+mas kha brgyan pa'o// thams cad du pad+ma'i gdan gyi sum cha ni lte ba'o// rdo rje phreng ba gnyis pa ni ljang gu'o// lha snum ni dkar po'o// rtsig pa'i r-i khA gsum ni nang nas
78a4(rgyud 'grel): brtsams nas dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po'o// de rnams kyi sa ni cha dgur byas te/ de la che re dor nas cha gnyis la re khA so so bya'o// sgo dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams su rdo rje dang rin po ches spras pa'o// rta babs bcu gnyis ni kha
78a5(rgyud 'grel): dog sna tshogs pa'o// gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dkar po'o// de'i pad+ma brgyad ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang bral ba ste/ phyogs rnamasu dmar po dang / mtshams rnamasu dkar po'o// re khA lnga'i kha dog ni nang nas brtsams te/
78a6(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu dang / nag po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po rnams so// de rnams kyis cha bco lngar byas te der sdo ma bzhin re khA bya'o// sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ni dkar po'o// de'i pad+ma rnams ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang
78b1(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'o// re khA lnga ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi no// rta babs kyi ka ba rnams kyi 'og gi stegs bu'i gnas rnams su sbrul gyi gdan rnams te/ so sor cha chung bcu gnyis so// de la shar gyi phyogasu nag po zlum po gnyis kyi steng du
78b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan gnyis so// lcer gru gsum dmar po gnyis la bkra shis kyis mtshan pa'o// nub tu gru bzhi ser po gnyis la rdo rjes mtshan pa'o// byang du zla ba phyed pa'o rnam par dkar po gnyis pa la pad+mas mtshan pa'o// shar
78b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi g.yas kyi zlum po'i g.yas su klu'i rgyal po rgyal ba zhes pa'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa'o// nub kyi g.yon gyi gru bzhi pa'i g.yon du rnam par rgyal ba zhes pa'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa'o// shar gyi rta babs kyi rim pa dang po'i myos pa
78b4(rgyud 'grel): srung ba'i steng gi dbus kyi gru bzhi pa la chos kyi 'khor lo nag po// de'i g.yas dang g.yon du ri dwags dang ri dwags mo nag po'o// lhor bum pa bzang po dmar po'o// de'i g.yas dang g.yon du dung dang / pad+ma dmar po'o// nub tu
78b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi shing ser po'o// de'i g.yas dang g.yon rag tu mi 'am ci dang mi 'am ci mo ser po'o// byang du rnga'o che dkar po ste dri'i g.yas dang g.yon du dbyug pa dang tho ba dkar po'o// mda' ya ba dang sa'i khor yug gi dbus kyi sa nau
78b6(rgyud 'grel): nog po'o// der ji ltar mdzes par mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bri bar bya'o// sa'i khor yug ni ser po'o// der dbang ldan gyi mtshams su zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba cha chung bcu gnyis pa dang / bden bral du nub bzhin
79a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyi ma cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o// chu'i khor yug dkar po'o// me'i khor yug dmar po'o// rlung gi khor yug nag po'o// me dang rlung gi khor yug de dag gi dbus su sa sor cha chung bcu gnyis pa'i
79a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs brgyud pa'i dur khrod kyi 'khor lo brgyad de/ phyogs su dmar po rnams dang / mtshams su dkar po rnams so// shar gyi 'khor lo'i phyi ngos su stong pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// nub kyi 'khor lo'i phyi ngos su yang stong pa'i
79a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ro// stong pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis 'dra ba ni sgrub thabs kyi le'ur gsung ba'i tshul gyis so// bcu char la yang mtshan ma ni gri gug go// rlung gi khor yug la mtshan ma sna tshogs pa bri bar bya ste/ 'dir 'dod pa
79a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa ni ma yin no// na mkha'i khor yug ni nag po'o// de'i logs gnyis su cha chung gsum gsum der ba der ri khA zlum skor gnyis so// dbus kyi cha chung drug la ni rdo rje phreng ba ljang gu byA'o// 'od zer 'bor ba rnams ni kha dog
79a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa lnga'o// yang nang gi dkyil 'khor du shar phyogs kyi tshe na nag po'i dpangs su nas kyi bzhi cha gcig no// lho'i dmar po ni gnyis so// nub kyi ser po ni bzhi'o// byang gi dkar po ni gsum mo// rtsig pa'i re khA rnams kyi
79a6(rgyud 'grel): dpangs su rdul tshon ser po sum 'gyur ro// rdo rje phreng ba rnams kyang ngo // re khA gzhan ni tshon ser po las nyis 'gyur ro// pad+ma rnams ni snam bu las nyis 'gyur gyis so// nyi zla dag ni chu skyes kyi re khA las so// de
79b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar brjod pa'i dpangs las gsung gi dkyil 'khor la dpangs ni nyis 'gyur ro// de rnams las nyis 'gyur ni sku'i dkyil 'khor lnga'o// mda' yab las kyi'i mchod pa'i sa la ni nas gcig go// sa la sogs pa'i khor yug dang re khA zlum skor
79b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi dpangs ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa'i re khA'i tshad du'o// sa thams cad du rdul tshon gzhan gyes pa thams cad ni nyis 'gyur gyi dbye bas mnyam pa'o// de la gtso bo'i lte bar lte ba dang mnyam pa'i dkar po dang dmar po dang nas
79b3(rgyud 'grel): popo dang dmar po'i zla ba dang nyi ma dang / sgra can dang dus kyi me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i rdo rje sten pa rtse gsul pa'o// shar gyi 'dab ma la spos phor nag po'o// lhor mar me dmar po'o// nug tu
79b4(rgyud 'grel): dung ser po'o// byang du lha ba shos dkar po'o// me la sogs par rta ya ba nag po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po'o// de'i phyi ngos su dbang ldan du chos kyi dung dka' po'o// mar yid bzhin gyi nor bu nag po'o// bden
79b5(rgyud 'grel): bral du chos kyi gan+ti dmar po'o// rlung du dpag bsam gyi shing ser po'o// rim pa gnyis par shar du pad+ma dkar por nyi ma la ral gri nag po'o// mer pad+ma dmar por zla ba la ut+pa la sngon po'o// lhor pad+ma dkar por nyi ma la
79b6(rgyud 'grel): rin po che cha dgu pa dmar po'o// bden bral du pad+ma dmar por zla ba la pad+ma dmar po'o// nub tu pad+ma dkar por nyi ma la 'khor lo ser po'o// rlung du pad+ma dmar por rmA le 'khor oM ser po'o// byang du pad+ma dkar por nyi ma la
80a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dkar po'o// dbang ldan du pad+ma dmar por b+hA ba la ut+pal dkar ba'o// rim pa gsum pa'i snam bul snyom sa'i logs gnyis su gnyis te de ltar pad+ma brgyud do// de la drug rnams nyi ma la'o// nub dang
80a2(rgyud 'grel): byang gi sgo'i g.yon dag tu zla ba gnyis so// mtshams rnams su pad+ma dang zla ba bzhi ste de rnams su dbang ldan nas brtsams te me long dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / gos dang rdo rje dang / rin po che dang rdo rje dang ro'i snod dang / chos 'byung dang /
80a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dang / dri'i dung dang pi wang dang / pad+ma rnams te/ dkor po dang / sngon po dang / nag po dang / nag po dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / ser po dang / ser po dang / sngon po dang / dkar po'o//
80a4(rgyud 'grel): shar sgo'i pad+ma dang nyi ma la ral gri nag po dang / lhor dbyug pa dmar po dang / nub tu pad+ma ser po dang / byung du tho ba dkar po'o// 'dir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni pad+ma dkar po la gnas shing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni pad+ma dmar la'o//
80a5(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi stegs bu la rta babs kyi ka ba'i rtsa ba'i g.yon du dung nag po dang / g.yas su me tog sngon po'i phreng ba'o// lhor spos phor dmar po dang / mar me'o// nub tu cod pan ser po dang / do shal ser po'o// byang du 'bras bu dkar
80a6(rgyud 'grel): po dang bdud rtsi dkar pos gang ba'i snod do// stegs bu thams cad la ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams so// shar gyi rta babs kyi mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas la dbus su gos so// lhor pad+ma'o//
80b1(rgyud 'grel): nub tu rnga pa Ta ha'o// byang du rdo rje'o// gsung gi dkyil 'khor la ni shar gyi pad+ma'i lte ba dang / 'dab ma rnams la gri gug nag po rnamaso// mer 'khor lo nag po rnamaso// gshin rjer dbyug pa dmar po rnamaso// bden bral du shag
80b2(rgyud 'grel): te dmar po rnams so// nub tu rdo rje ser po rnams so// rlung du tshangs pa'i dbyug gu rtse mo ser po can rnams so// byang du rtse gsum dkar po rnams so// dbang ldan du pad+ma dkar po rnamaso// sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu la pad+ma'i lte ba
80b3(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dab ma rnams la mtshan ma rnams so// de la shar gyi sgo'i g.yas su ral gri rnams so// mer dpag bsam g+ho shing rnamaso// lho'i sgo'i g.yon du rdo rjes mtshan po'i dbyug pa rnams so// g.yas su shag ti rnams so// bden bral
80b4(rgyud 'grel): du shag ti 'am yang na mdung rnams so// nub kyi sgo'i g.yon du rin po che 'am/ dbyug to rnams so// g.yas su rdo rje rnams so// rlung du khab rnams so// byang sgo'i g.yon du rtse gsum rnams so// g.yas su zhags pa rnams so// dbang
80b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan du dgra sta rnams so// shar sgo'i g.yon du 'khor lo rnams so// shwar sgor dbyug pa'o// de'i phyi rol tu rdo rje ljang gu'o// lho sgor mda' dmar po'o// nub sgor dbyug te ser po'o// de'i phyi ngos su rtse gsum sngon po'o//
80b6(rgyud 'grel): byang sgor gtun shing dkar po'o// dbyug pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'di rnams pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor dag gi phyogs kyi pad+ma rnams ni dmar po'o// mtshams kyi pad+ma rnams ni dkar po'o//
81a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dir gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi stegs du la shar du sgo'i g.yas su ut+pa la dang / gos dang / gri gug dang / 'khor lo dang / kha T+wAM ga rnams nag po'o// g.yon du gri gug dang / ral gri dang / gri gug
81a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams nag po'o// lho'i stegs bu la sgo'i g.yas su pad+ma dang / ro'i snod dang / dbyug pa dang / shog ti dang / pad+ma rnams dmar po'o// g.yon du mda' dang / dgra sta dang / gri gug dang / gri gug rnams dmar po'o// nub sga
81a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas su 'khor lo dang / dri'i dung tshes dang / rdo rje dang / khab dang / 'khor lo rnams ser po'o// g.yon du chos 'byung ljang gu dang / 'khor lo dang / gri gug dang / gri gug rnams ser po'o// byang du sgro'i g.ya su ut+pa la dang /
81a4(rgyud 'grel): me long dang / rtse gsum dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa la rnams dkar po'o// g.yon du pi wang sngon po dang / tho ba dang / gri gug dang / gri gug rnams dkar po'o// de ltar mtshan ma sum cu so drug po rnams ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi
81a5(rgyud 'grel): stegs bu rnams la yang ngo // de nas 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la rnam pa thams cad du bsal bar gyur par shes nas/ yi ge hUM dang / 'khyil pa 'das pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang / bcas pa'i
81a6(rgyud 'grel): dri'i chus dkyil 'khor gyi phyi ngos su byugs la de bzlas pa'i chus 'khor lo bsangs te rdul chen lhag ma rnams la/ oM AHhUM badz+ra muHzhes pas ye shes kyi tshon gau shegs su gsol te/ snod na gnas pa'i tshon rnams
81b1(rgyud 'grel): dben par gzhag par bya'o// tshe na dgye ba'i cho ga'o// // de nas sngar lhag par gnas par byas pa'i bum pa rnams g.yas skor du dgod par bya'o// de la 'khor lo'i dbang po'i rnam par
81b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i bum pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la g.yas skor byas nas rdo rje ra ba'i bdag nyid kyi khor yug dang / 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i sa'i phyi ngos su dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo'i thad ka'i gnas las cung zad g.yas su gzhag par bya'o//
81b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon logs su go rims bzhin g.yas skor du rnam par snang mdzad dang / spyan ma dang / las thams cad pa'i bum pa rnams so// g.yas su gzugs rdo rje ma dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma dang / gshin rje gshed ma rnams
81b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi'o// dalho'i g.yon du rin chen 'byung ldan dang / mA ma kI dag gi dang / gauyas su sgra rdo rje ma dang / shes rab mthar byed dag gi'o// nub kyi g.yon du snang ba mtha' yas dang / gos dkar mo dag gi dang / g.yasu dri rngo
81b5(rgyud 'grel): rje ma dang / pad+ma mthar byed ma ngag gi'o// byang gi g.yon du don yod grub pa dang / sgrol ma dag gi dang / g.yas su ro rdo rje ma dang / reg bya rdo rje ma dang / bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi'o// kha cig ni gshin rje gshed la saMg
81b6(rgyud 'grel): pa khro bo rnams kyi ni/ mau la sogs pa'i mtshoms rnams su'o// zhes so// gzhan ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de ma thag tu khro bo rnams kyi rigs kyi yum rnams kyi ni sgo'i g.yas phyogs rnams su'o// zhes so// 'di'i rjesu
82a1(rgyud 'grel): 'brangs te phyogs gzhan rnams su yang dgod pa shes par bya'o// bzhed pa gzhan yang yod do des ci zhig bya/ de lta bu de ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du bum pa dgod pa'i tshul lo// bsdus pa'i
82a2(rgyud 'grel): rim pa'i dkyil 'khor la g.yon du rigs kyi yum gyi de ma thag tu dang / g.yas su yang dang por byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa rnams kyi'o// zur gyi khro bo rnams kyi zur rnams su'o// gshin rje gshed kyi rjes la gtsug tor
82a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'o// pad+ma mthar byed kyi rjes la gnod mdzes kyi zhes pa/ khyad par ro// 'di'i rjes su 'brengs te dkyil 'khor gzhan rnams la bum pa dgod pa rtogs sla bas ma spros so// grwa'i bum pa rnams la sgro dang
82a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i mda' bzhi ste/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha hUM zhes pa'i sngags kyis dgod do// dus kyi 'khor lo'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la ni phyi ngos su shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su bum pa bzhi'o// rgyal ba'i bum pa yang shar
82a5(rgyud 'grel): du ste lnga pa'o// de'i steng gi rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i dung chos ni drug pa'o// de lta bu ni bum pa lnga pa'i phyogs la'o// bum pa bcu pa'i phyogs la ni phyogs brgyad du bum pa brgyad ngo // nub kyi bum pa las phyi ngos su
82a6(rgyud 'grel): sar gnyis spangs par rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o// shar gyi bum pa la phyi ngos su sor gnyis spangs par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o// de'i steng du rnam par rgyal po chen po'i bum pa dung chos ste bcu gcig pa'o// de ltar
82b1(rgyud 'grel): bum pa stong dang brgya rnams su yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang / las thams cad pa la rnam par rgyal ba chen po dung chos yin no// bum pa dgod pa'i cha ga'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor la phyongs su
82b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i dam pa'i chos bzhi klog tu gzhug par bya'o// ga pur dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka la sogs pa'i spos phor brgyad gzhag par bya'o// ma bza' sna tshogs pa steng la
82b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa 'am/ lho so so la re re 'am/ ji ltar nus pa gang yang rung ste/ slob mA la sogs par gzhag pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / rta babs dang / gos bzang po dang / dril bu dang bcwa/
82b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnga yab dang / bum pa gang ba dang / lo ma dang bcas pa'i chu shing gi sdong po'i ka pa rnams la yi ge hUM dang / bdag pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa/ oM badz+ra s+pha ra Na kham zhes pas phul te/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin gsheg par
82b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ de nas khrus byas te dri zhim po'i lus stong g.yogs dang gtsug tor dang rgyun dang / bcas pa yos 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i chus dkyil 'khor bsdangs te/ yi ge gsum dang 'khyil pa'i sngags kyi bsrungs nas rdo rje
82b6(rgyud 'grel): dang dril bu bzung ste/ shar gyi sgo dang / nye bar nub tu kha bltas te 'dug la 'khor lo'i dbang po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bris pa'i dkyil 'khor skad cig gis stong pa nyid kyi rjes la bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang / bgegs
83a1(rgyud 'grel): la phur bus gdab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga 'khor dang bcas pas bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du nges par brtags nas/ btsun mo mdzes shing mdangs bzang ba/ lo grangs bcu drug lon rnyed nas/
83a2(rgyud 'grel): dri dang me tog rgyan byas te// de yi dbus su 'dod pa bya// yon tan ska rags mA ma kI/ shes rab con gyis de byin rlabs// zhi ba spros byas sangs rgyas nas// na mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu brgyan// ces gsungs pas bsgrubs pa'i phyi
83a3(rgyud 'grel): rol gyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pas sam/ de med na ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pas kyong rung ste/ yang dag par bskyod pa'i dga' ba'i sgras ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la zhabs bsil dang / mchod yon
