161b5(rgyud 'grel): sdigs dkar po 'jigs su rung ba dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i zhal gsum mo// nub sgor rta'i gzugs dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po'i zhal gsum mo// byang sgor tshogs kyi gtso bo ljang gu ljang gu dang / dkar po
161b6(rgyud 'grel): dang dmar po'i zhal gsum mo// 'di dag ni 'gying ba'i khro bo 'gying ba'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs pa dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o// khyad par ni g.yas dang po'i phyag gi rim pa ji lta bar lcags kyu dang
162a1(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang dril bu 'dzin pa mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'o// 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i gzugs brnyan ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'i
162a2(rgyud 'grel): cod pan dang ldan pa'o// de las gzhan pa'i lha nyi 'u pa rnams ni rdo rje bdud rtsi dang po tis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i cod pan can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo lta bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis
162a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa la sogs pa'o// me tog ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis pa rnams kyi zla ba'i 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni haH'o// oM hAHbadz+ra a mr-i ta swA hA zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sngags so//
162a4(rgyud 'grel): las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di nyid yin no// rdo rje bdud rtsi gzhan rnam pa gsum gyi 'di ltar bsgom pa'i khyad par gyi rim pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud nyid las shes par bya'o// mongs pas 'jigs pas 'dir ma
162a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad ngo // / dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dgyes pa rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du gnas pa'i chos 'byung la gnas po'i gzhal yas khang ngo // phyag bcu drug pa la
162a6(rgyud 'grel): slar yang 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lta bu bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa yang yod do zhes pa ni phyogs gnyis pa'o// gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba'i nang du gan rgyal du gnas pa'i
162b1(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug dang / lha'i dbang po ste/ bdud rnam pa bzhi'i rab bzhin can gyi snying gar gnas pa'i nyi ma la zhabs bzhi pa gcer bu gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa/ zhabs gnyis kyis skyil krung phyed
162b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / zhabs gnyis kyis g.yon bskum pa dang / g.yas brkyang ba'i gar gyi tshul gyis gnas pa dang spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa dpral ba'i steng du pags pa dang grol ba'i mo
162b3(rgyud 'grel): mgo skam po lngas brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ sku mdog nag po phyag bcu drug pa zhal brgyad pa/ zhil re re la dmar zhing zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum yod pa rtsa ba'i zhal nag po g.yas pa rnams ni dkar
162b4(rgyud 'grel): po dang nag po dang nag po'o// g.yon pa rnams ni dmar po dang nag po dang nag po'o// stang gi zhal ni du ba'i mdog can mi sdug pa zhal thams cad nau smin+da ma skyog po dang bcas pa khro gnyer can mche ba'i myu gu gtsigs
162b5(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas pa'i phyag brgyad kyis bsnams pa'i thod pa rnams la glang po che dang rta dang bong bu dang / glang dang rnga mo dang mi dang sha ra b+hA dang byi la rnams 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa'i phyag brgyud pa'i thod pa rnams ni sa dang chu
162b6(rgyud 'grel): nga rlung dang me dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang / gshin rje dang nor sbyin rnams so// gtsug gi 'khor lo dang na cha dang mgul brgyan dang lag gdub dang ska rags dang thal ba rnams pa'o// mi mgo rlan pa khrag 'dzag pa lnga bdun
163a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba dang dpung rgyan dang rkang gdub rnams kyis brgyan pa'o// 'di'i yum bdag med ma nag mo gcer bu gri gug dang thod par ldan pa'i phyag gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par 'khyud
163a2(rgyud 'grel): pagayas bskum pa g.yon brkyang ba'o gar gyis gnas pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa dmar la zlum pa mche ba gtsigs pa dbu skya dmar ser 'bar bya gyen du brdzes pa dpral ba'i mtsham su
163a3(rgyud 'grel): thod pa lnga yis brgyan pa/ mgrin par mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba 'phyang ba dang / rkang gdub la sogs pas brgyan pa'o// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar gnas pa'i tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po
163a4(rgyud 'grel): dang drag po'i snying ga'i steng du zla ba rnams la gI rI la sogs pa'o// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dra ba mar gnas pa'i gshin rje dang lus ngan dong srin po dang hA/ thag bzangs ris kyi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
163a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i puk+ka sI la sogs pa'o// de la gAM rI nag mo g.yas nA gri gug g.yon na ro hi ta'i nya 'dzin pa'o// tsau rI dmar mo grayAs DA ma ru g+ha yon pheg pa 'dzin pa'o// ro langs ma gser gyi mdog can g.yas g+ha yon
163a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyag gnyis kyis rus sbal dang pad+ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o// g+hasma rI ljang gu phyag g.yas pa na sbrul g.yon pa na rnal 'byor gyi snod 'dzin pa'o// pu k+ka sI sngon mo phyag g.yas pa na seng ge g.yon pa na dgra sta 'dzin
163b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ sha bA ri dkar mo phyag g.yas pa na dge slong g.yon bA na bsil byung 'dzin pa'o// tsaN+Da lI ni nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs ma phyag g.yas pa na 'khor lo g.yon pa nA ga shol 'dzin pa'o// DoM bi nI khra mo phyag g.yas
163b2(rgyud 'grel): pa na rdo rje g.yon pa sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o// brgyud po 'di dag ni skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa'o// khyad par gzhon ni sngar brjod pa'i bdag med ma bzhin no// he ru ka dang bdag med maM dag go rigs kyi
163b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag po mi bskyod pa'o// gA rA la sogs pa rnams ni mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' ya so// puk+ka sI la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo // yang na dkyil 'khor gyi
163b4(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo phyag gany+tsau sa pA dasa? rdo rje gyen du 'phyar ba g.yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i thod pa 'dzin pas bdag med ma la 'khyud pa kha T+wAM ga dpung pa g.yon pa la brten pa'o// yang na dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo phyag bzhi pa sngon po phyag
163b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa g.yon pas thong pa khrag gis bkang ba 'dzin pa phyag lhag ma dag rang dang mtshungs pa'i rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'o// yang na dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo phyag drug pa ston po rtsa ba dang gal so
163b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi zhal gsum sngon po dang / dkar po dang / dmar po phyag g.yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang gri gug dang g.yon pa dag gis rtse gsum pa dang dril bu 'dzin pa lhag ma ngag gis rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la 'khyud
164a1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'odar rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma ni sku mdog dang zhal dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa rnams bdag med ma dang mtshungs par yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'i zhabs kyis gsungs so// phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa
164a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la ro'i snying gaR+Sha nyi ma la skyil krung phyed pos gar mdzad pa mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa sna tshogs rdo rje sna mtshan pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa mi mgo lngas dbu brgyan pa smin ma
164a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khyog pa dang bcas pa'i khro gnyer can mche ba gtsigs pa phyag bcu drug pa bzhin du gtsug gi 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa gau rI la sogs pa'o lha mo rnams kyis skor ba'o// lha mo thams cad ni thal bya dang
164a4(rgyud 'grel): bral pa'o// rdo rje phag mo dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma ni mi bskyod pos rgyas potab pa'o// kye'i rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i thugs kwa'i sa bon ni hUM ngo // AM de ba pi tsu badz+ra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni phyag bcu drug pa'i snying po'o//
164a5(rgyud 'grel): oM trai lo kyA k+She pa hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa ni phyag gnyis pa'o// oM dz+wa la dz+ra b+h+yo hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ phyag bzhi pa'o// oM ki Ti kI Ti badz+ra hUM hU~M hU~M phaT swA hU~M/ phyag drug pa'o// oM AHbadz+ri g+hasma rI oM hUM swA hA/
164a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni g+hasma rI'i sngags te las thams cad po'o// / sgyu 'phrul chen po'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang ni gnas pa'i chos 'byung gi dbus su gzhal yas khang ngo // kha
164b1(rgyud 'grel): cig ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung med par gzhal yas khang ngo // zhes so gzhal yas khang gi dbus su pad+ma dmar po 'dang brgyad pa'i ze 'brur nyi ma la sgyu ma chen mo las byung ba'i he ru ka nag po nyi ma lta bu'i 'od zer can 'bar
164b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phreng ba du mas 'khrigs pa 'gying ba'i khro bo dbu skra dmar ser 'bar ba gyen du brdzes pa thod pas brgyan po'i cod pan can rtsa bo dang g.yas dang rgyab dang g.yon gyi zhal bzhi sngon po dang ser po dang dkar po dad+ma ljang gu'o//
164b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal re re la dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum pa phyag bzhi pa'i g.yas gnyis na thong pa dang mnga'// g.yon gnyis na kha T+wAM gA dang gzhu 'dzin pa phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'i mi'i pags pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa/ skyil
164b4(rgyud 'grel): krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas mokha' 'gro ma ni sku mdog dmar mo gtso bo lta bu'i phyag mtshan can phyag gnyis kyis de'i mgul nas 'khyud pa/ dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po dang / ljang gu'i
164b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal lo// shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje mkha' 'gro mo sngon mo ser po dang dkar po dang ljang gu'i zhal rdo rje dang thod pa dang dril bu dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// lhor rin chen mkha' 'gro ma ser mo ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po
164b6(rgyud 'grel): ngang ljang gu'i zhal rin po che'i pa tra dang tri shu la dang mgrin pa btsir ba'i lce spyang dang ba ngan 'dzin pa'i// nub tu pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo dkar po dang rdzi po dang / ljang gu'o zhal sna tshogs pad+ma dang mngar dang thong
165a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// byung du sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma ljang gu dang ser po dang dkar po dang / sngon po'i zhal lo// ral gri dang DA ma ru dang zhags pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// thams cad kyang
165a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ zla ba'i glang na dang 'ong dang ldan pa'o// 'di rnams kyi khyad par gzhan rnams ni gtso bo lta bu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi padal po ni mi bskyod pa'o// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la
165a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rnams kyang go rims ji ltar rnam snang dang / mi bskyod pa dang rin tshon 'byung ldan dang ngag gi dbang phyug dang don yong grub pa rnamaso// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugaso ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo // oM hUM hUM snying po'i
165a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags so// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang / oM oM hU~M/ oM hUM hUM/ oM swA hU~M/ oM AHhUM/ oM haM hUM/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni lus thams cad pa 'o//
165a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa lha dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang gi chos 'byung la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'o// de'i ze 'bru la re'i snying gar nyi ma'i
165a6(rgyud 'grel): gdan la shes rab ma dang bral ba'i bcom ldan 'das sku mdog la sogs pa phyi nas 'chang ba'i 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thod pa bzhin no// shar dang byang dang nub dang lha'i 'dab ma la
165b1(rgyud 'grel): rim pa ji lta bas sna tshogs sde ma dang 'dod ma dang sa 'og na gnas ma dang legs bzang mo rnams ni sku mdog sngon mo g.yas bsku ba g.yon brkyang ba stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can phyag g.yas gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod
165b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ g.yon gnyis kyis kha T+wAM ga dang DA mA ru 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan dang me dang bden bral dang rlung gi 'deb ma la chang tshong ma dang / 'byung mo dang phyag bzhi ma dang namakha' la gnas ma rnams ni ser mo na bza' ser po gon pa 'od ser
165b3(rgyud 'grel): po gon pa 'od ser po 'phro ba zhabs gnyis kyis g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pa klu brgyad kyi brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis gri gug dang DA ma ru/ g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga dang pad+ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o// brgyad po 'di dag
165b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang nyi ma'i 'o dkyil 'khor lnga gar gyi tshul gyis gnas pa dbu skra ser po gyon du brdzes pa/ dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang ldan pa phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa/ mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu mgul du 'phyong ba mche ba
165b5(rgyud 'grel): cung zad gtsigs pa zhal gcig phyag gzhi pa spyan gsum pa'o// bcom ldan 'das la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas lngas rgyas btab pa'o// sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa rnams la mI bskyod pa dang rna snang dang rin
165b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung dang snang mtha' rnams kyis so// chang tshong ma la sogs pa rnams kyis yang de dag rnams so// yang na bcom ldan 'das 'di dang phyogs kyi lha mi rnams kyang mdog dkar mo mtshams kyi lha mo rnams dmar po
166a1(rgyud 'grel): 'do ni yum dang bral ba 'am yum dang bcas pa'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dbus su gzhal yas khang ngo // de'i dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du
166a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan g.yon bskum g.yas brkyang bas mnan pa'i 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i bcom ldan 'das khro bo ni bskal pa 'jigs dus kyi me lta bu'i 'od zer 'bar zhing 'gro ba ma lus pa'i
166a3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad rab tu bsal bar mdzad pa sku mdog sngon po dang ser po dang ljang khu'i nal rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi mi bsngags pa gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa rab tu gtum pa ljags bsgril
166a4(rgyud 'grel): ba 'jigs su rung ba'i zhal gsum pa re re zhing spyan gsum gsum dmar la zlum pa smin ma g.yo ba khro gnyer dang bcas pa/ dpral ba'i steng ni thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang ldan pa khrag 'dzal pa'i ma mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba
166a5(rgyud 'grel): mgul bar 'phyang ba yum dang bcas pa klu mtha' yas sngon pos dbu skra 'bar zhing dmar ser gyen du bcings pa/ klu 'jog po dmar pos rna rgyan byas pa/ klu pad+ma chen po pad+ma'i rtsa ba lta bu dkar pos mgul rgyan byas pa/
166a6(rgyud 'grel): klu kar ko Ta dur ba lta bur ljang gus mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ nor rgyas dkar pos ska rags byis pa/ pad+ma dkar pos kun ta'i me tog lto bur mdzes pas rkang gdu bo byas pa/ dung skyong ser pos log gdub
166b1(rgyud 'grel): byas pa/ rigs ldan du ba lta bu khra bos dpung rgyan byas pa/ rdo rje sems dpas dbu la rgyas btab pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag gnyis kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya la rat+na si yum
166b2(rgyud 'grel): la snyoms par zhugs pa g.yas gnyis kyis lca gos kyu dang zhags pa dang g.yon gnyis kyis thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// 'di'i shar phyogs su rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu ni rtsa ba dang
166b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal lo// g.yas pa gnyis kyis rdo rje tho ba dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gyen du 'phyar ba/ g.yon pa gnyis kyis thod pa dang khaM T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// byang du rdo rje nyi ma ser po ser po dang
166b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo// khyad par ni phyag dang pos rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ khyad par du rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams kyang rdo rje dbyug pa lta bu'o// 'og nas 'chang po rnams kyang de ltar shes par
166b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// byang du rdo rje gtsug tor dmar po dmar po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo// pad+ma dam+bAr pos mtshan po'i phyag go// lhor rdo rje 'khyil pa ljang gu ni ljang gu dang dkar po dang sder po'i zhal lo// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i bya'o//
166b6(rgyud 'grel): mer rdo rje gnod sbyin du ba'i mdog dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo// lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// srin por rdo rje bdud rtsi dus dmor po dmar po dang / ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo// dgra sta 'dzin pa'o// rlung du nag po
167a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal tI shul 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan du rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba nag po mi g.yo ba nag po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal ral gri 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje dbyug pa
167a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa brgyad po 'di rnams ni rim po dza ltar gshin rje mthar byeng dang shes rab mthar byed dang pad+ma mthar byed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa sngon po dang stobs po che dang mi g.yo ba rnams kyi ming gzhan no// snying du
167a3(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dkar po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og gnod mdzes kyi ming rnam grangs can sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal rol pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gtun
167a4(rgyud 'grel): shing 'dzin pa'o// 'di'i phyag g.yon gnyis kyis klu'i zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa dang kha T+wAM ga'o// rdo rje dbyug pA la sogs pa'i khro bo 'di rnams ni phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo dang thod pas mtshan pa'i phyag gnyis
167a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis rlung dang mtshungs pa'i yum dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o// dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du 'khyil pa rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos cod pan mdzes par rgyan pa smin ma g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i khro gnye ro can mche ba
167a6(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs pa'i zhal re re la spyan gsum gsumo dang ldan pa dmar zhing zlum pa mi mgo'i phreng ba dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa dang klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i phyogs skyong/
167b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dang steng du tshangs pa dang 'og tu thag bzangs ris rnams la g.yas brkyang gis mnan nas bzhugs pa rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan pa ste/ ji ltar 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsibs bcu pa'i bsrung ba'i 'khor
167b2(rgyud 'grel): lhor bshad pa bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo // oM kha badz+rI d+h+r-ig badz+ra hUM ka ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ ces bya ba ni rdo rje hUM mdzod kyi snying po'i sngags so// las thams cad pa'i sngags ni oM badz+ra kuN+Da
167b3(rgyud 'grel): li badz+ra hUM phaT ces bya ba'o// yang shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang steng dang 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gang ni rnams lA g.yas skor gyis gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu'o// 'di
167b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi gnas dang sku mdog la sogs pa bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bani na no// yang ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu pa bzhin no// yang na kun tu kha sbyor gyi rdo rje sems
167b5(rgyud 'grel): dngapa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no// phyogs 'di gsum ka lA yang oM AHbig+h+nAn+ta kri hUM zhes bya ba bgeg mthar byed kyi sngags te las thams cad pa'o// / bAde mchog gi dkyil
167b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi mang du ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la gnas po'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la gnos pa'i lazhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba'i steng du nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'jigs byed dang dus
168a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mo g.yas brkyang gi zhabs gnyis kyis mnan pa'i bcom ldan 'das sku mdog nag po shaR+Sha dang byang la sogs pa'i zhal bzhi nag po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang ser po zhal re re la
168a2(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum gsum pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ phyag bcu gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud ba/ phyag gnyis kyis rgyab tu glang po che dkar po'i phigs
168a3(rgyud 'grel): pa khrag dang bcas pa brgyangs nas 'dzin pa/ de las gzhan po'i g.yas pa'i phyag rnams kyis Da ma ru dang dgra sto dang gri gug dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa/ g.yon rnams kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha T+wAM ga dang khrag gi
168a4(rgyud 'grel): gang ba'i thod pa dang rdo rje zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams so// mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul du 'phyang ba/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'i mi'i sgyu mas mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ dpral ba'i steng du
168a5(rgyud 'grel): thod pa lnga dang ldan pa/ nor bu dang g.yon ngos su gnas pa'i zla ba phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan po'i ral po'i thor tsog nag pa rnam par 'gyur zhi gling gdangs po/ mche ba gtsigs pa'o zhal can gar
168a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi nyams dgu'i tshogs dang ldan pa'o// rdo rje phag mo ni dmar mo zhal cig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa sgra'i tshogs grol ba gcer bu thod pa'i dum bu'i ska rags bcings pa 'khyud pa'i phyag gis bzung
168b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o thod pa khrag gos bkang ba 'dzegs pa'i rgyun gtso bo la stob pa/ sngogs mdzub dang bcas pa rdo rje steng du 'phyar ba'i phyag g.yas pas gdugs pa rnams la bsdogs par byed pa khrag dang bral ba'i mi man
168b2(rgyud 'grel): skam po'i phreng pa can nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa cung zad bzhud pa zla mtshon 'bab pa dang bcas pa spu gyen du langs pa'o// de nas sher la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams la g.yon
168b3(rgyud 'grel): skor gyis dang me la sogs pa'i phyogs bral rnams la g.yos skor gyis dgod do// de la phyogs kyi mngab ma la mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / dum+b+ha skyes ma dang / gzugs can ma rnams kyi nag mo dang ljang gu
168b4(rgyud 'grel): ngadang dmar mo dang / ser mo'i mdog can rnams zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa dbu skra grol ba phyag bzhi ma g.yon pa gnyis kyis kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa ngag gis DA mA ru dang gri gug 'dzin pa/
168b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa rnams so// mtshams kyi 'dab mar byang chub kyi sems dang khrag dong bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga rnams grub pa'i bcung lta bu'i bdud rtsir gyur pas gang ba'i pad+ma'i snod rnams so// yang na
168b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi car yong bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'o// de nas thugs kyi 'khor lo'o shar gyi rtsibs su thong pa'i dum bu dang rab tu gtume mi'o// byang du keng rus chen po dang gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// nub tu keng rus dang 'od
169a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan mo'o// lho ru mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma'o// mar chang dgra dang dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o// srin por 'ong dpag mang dang mi'u thung ma'o// rlung du rdo rje 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o//
169a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan du rdo rje'i lus dang shing grib ma'o// rim pa de bzhin du gsung gi 'khor lo la myu gu can dang sa bsrungs pa'o// rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo'o// dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shu kha nas 'o/ rdo hUM mdzad dang ma 'bubs lo//
169a3(rgyud 'grel): bzang po dang lha mo sto bsangs ma'o// rdo rje 'od drang shin tu bzung mo'o// 'jigs byed chen mo dang rta rna ma'o// mig mI bzang dang bya gdong ma'o// de bzhin du sku'i 'khor lo la stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can
169a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ da rin chen rdo rje dang dum skyes ma'o// rta mgrin dang chang 'tshong ma'o// na mkha'i snying po dang 'khor lo'i go cha 'dzin ma'o// dpal he ru ka dang shin tu bzang mo'o// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma'o//
169a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor los sgyur ma'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo'o// de la thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa dpa' bo rnams zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa rol pa'i thor tshugs can dpral ba'i
169a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i rdo rje phreng bas mtshan pa'i dpa' bo'i ngar dpyangs can phyag bzhi pa 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu g.yon pas kha T+wAM ga dang g.yas pa DA ma ru bsnams pa/ tshangs pa'i skud pa dang dpung
169b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan can mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa g.yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o// rab tu gtum mo la stsogs pa'i lha mo rnams zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa drag po'i gzugs can ma/ dbu skra grol ba'i gcer
169b2(rgyud 'grel): bu ma/ phyag gnyis pa 'khyud ba'i phyag gis thod pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa gdug pa rnams bsdigs pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa'o// sgo rnams la khwa gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma dang khyi gdong ma dang / phag gdong ma rnams ni mkha'
169b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhin no// khyad par du 'di rnams kyi zhal ni ming gi rjes su 'thun pa'o// mtshams rnams su gshin rje brtan ma dang / gshin rje pho nya dang / gshin rje mchi ba ma dang gshin rje 'joms ma rnams ni mi'i
169b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal lo// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs kyi lha mo gnyis kyis g.yas dang g.yon gyi sku phyed phyed 'dra ba'o// brgyad po 'di rnams ni ro'i gdan can no// DA kI ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni mi mgo'i phreng ba can rdo rje phreng bas
169b5(rgyud 'grel): dpral b.rA brgyan pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa ska rags la sgra dang bcas pa'i g.yer ga la sogs pas brgyan pa'o// rigs kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mi bskyod pa'o// rdo rje phag mo'i rnam par snang mdzad ngo // DA ki ma la
169b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i rin chen 'o byung ldan dang / thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lor gnas pa rnams ni mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang rtag pa rnams so// dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gnas pa rnams ni don yod grub pa'o// bcom
170a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo // oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dza la saM baM ba rAM swA hA/ snying po'o// oM khaN+Da ro he hUM hUM phaT ces bya ba ni dumu skyes ma'i sngags te/ lus thams
170a2(rgyud 'grel): cad pa'o// lha gzhan rnams kyi ni kho bos dpal bde mchog gi mngon par rtogs pa'i sgrub thobs su bshad pa'o// yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la sogs paM nas gshin rje 'jo mos ma'i bar thams cad ni zhal
170a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa phyag gnyis pa de la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga ni 'khyud pa'i g.yas g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa/ DA ki ma la sogs pa bzhi dang khwa gdong ma la sogs pa rnams ni g.yon pas thod pa dang dpung pa
170a4(rgyud 'grel): la brten po'i kha T+wAM ga dang / g.yas pa DA ma ru 'dzin pa gzhan thams cad ni gong bzhin no// yang na 'dir 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa phyag gnyis pa nyid kyi phyogs la dpal bde mchog dang rdo rje phag mo gnyis kyi
170a5(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi mdog gi ma sngon pos yang ste/ bcom ldan 'das ni phyag g.yas pas rdo rje sor ba la mchog tu brtson pa/ g.yon pas thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa 'am/ yang rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud byas
170a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o// DA ki ma la sogs pa bzhi ni ser mo g.yas pa DA ma ru 'dzin pa rnams so// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams nag po rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o// dpa' mo rnams da/ ri mo phyag g.yas pas rdo
170b1(rgyud 'grel): rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub can rnams so// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dmar po pad+ma dang pad+ma'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o// D+ha ki ma rnams ni nag mo phyag g.yas pa na pad+ma dang bcas pa'i stegs mdzub mdzad pa'o// skur/
170b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dkar po 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o// lha mo rnams ni dmar mo g.yas pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa rnams so// dpa' bo thams cad ni yul 'khyud par
170b3(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa rnams so// dpa' mo rnams ni de'i brla gnyis la mkhril ba'i tshul lo// khwa gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi g.yas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa'o// lha mo
170b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin pa'o// ga shrIn rje brtan ma la sogs pa ni g.yas pas DA ma ru g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i mi mgo 'dzin pa'o// D+ha kri ma la sogs pa rnams dang kha gdong ma la
170b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rnams kyi g.yon pa'i dpung pa la kha T+wAM ga'o// bcu gnyis po 'di rnams ni skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas pa khyad par gzhan thams cad ni gong bzhin no// 'di ni bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnam pa
170b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum mo// / gang gi tshe 'di rnams la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga mi bsgom par rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gyur pa de'i tshe rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor gsum mo// rdo rje
171a1(rgyud 'grel): phag mo'i snying ga'i sa bon ni baM mo// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa ni ye hUM hUM hUM phaT ces pa ni snying po'o// bde mchog gi phyag gnyis pa la sogs lha 'di rnams ni phyag g.yas su gnas pa'i phyag mtshan ni bri bya'i
171a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// / bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dbus su gnas po'i gzhal yas khang gi
171a3(rgyud 'grel): du 'khor lo rtsi bas brgyad pa nag po la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi ze 'brur ro// gan rgyal gyi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka sku mdog nag po skyil krung phyed pa gar gyi nyams
171a4(rgyud 'grel): dgus gar byed pa zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum dmar li zlum pa g.yas kyi phyag gnyis na TI ma ru dang gri gug/ g.yon gyi phyag gnyis na thod pa dang kha T+wAM gA 'dzin pa'o// phyag rgya drug po mi mgo rlon pa'i lnga bcu'i phreng
171a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la 'phyang ba/ gnyis 'thung gi lcogs pa'i rishom thabs cung zad rgyab na nyil ba sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog nag po can dpral ba'i steng du thod pa lngas porgyan pa sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu brgyan
171a6(rgyud 'grel): can no// mnga' bdag 'di'i btsun mo ni sna tshogs sde ma gcer bu mi mgo'i phreng ba tsan sil bur grol zhing gyen du 'bar ba thod pa lngas dbu brgyan pa/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis
171b1(rgyud 'grel): pa spyan gsum pa/ yab kyi mgrin pa la chags pa'i phyag g.yon pas thod pa khrag gi rgyun 'dzag pa yab lnga stob pa/ g.yas kyi phyag gis gri gug brdegs pa'i tshul lo// shar gyi rtsibs nag po'i steng gi 'dab ma la legs phrang can/
171b2(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dir byang du thod pa can ma'o// nub tu 'jigs can mo'o// lhor mi thub ma'o// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la rnams la g.yas sgror gyis byang sems dkar ba dang dmar ba dang bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron me lngas gang ba'i thod pa rnam po
171b3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa dang po 'di ni rdo rje phreng ba sngon pos bskor ba'o// de nas rim pa gnyis pa ni rtsibs brgyad dmar po la gnas pa'i pad+ma brgyad kyi phyi rim rdo rje dmar po'i phreng bas bskor ba'o// de'i shar gyi rtsabs la dge ba'i sku rags ma'o// byang
171b4(rgyud 'grel): du ni gzugs can ma'i// nub tu rnam rgyal ma'o// lhor 'dod can ma'o// dbang ldan du dus can ma'o// mer ni mtsho chen ma'o// bdon bral du byed ma'o// rlung du bsod ma'o// de nas rim pa gsum pa la ni 'khor lo dkar po
171b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs brgyad pa la gnas pa'i pad+ma brgya de rdo rje dkar po'i phreng bas bskor ba'o// de'i shAr gyi rtsibs la sgrol ma'o// byang du 'jigs mthong ma'o// nub tu legs mthong ma'o// lhor thub dka' ma'o// dbang ldan du dge ma'o//
171b6(rgyud 'grel): mer grib non ma'o// bden bral dris mchen ma'o// rlung du grag chen ma'o// shar gyi sgo'i pad+ma la mdzes ma'o// byang gi sgo'i pad+ma la nor 'dzin ma'o// nub tu sgo'i pad+ma la bskal bzangs ma'o// lho sgo'i pad+ma la mthong
172a1(rgyud 'grel): ba yid 'ong ma'o// 'di rnams thams cad g.yas g.yon gyi phyug gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa po cung zud ston pa zhal gtsug ma spyan gsum ma rus pa'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa mi mag
172a2(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba dang bral ba/ dbu skra sil bu dmar ser gyi tshogs gyen du brdzes ma byad sems 'jig pa nyi ma'i gdan la skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyi tshul gyi gnas pa rnamaso// sgo skyong ma rnams ni g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang ba'o//
172a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyang stag gi lpags pa gyon ma sku mdog sngon mo'o// yang na legs phreng can ma la sogs pa bzhi nag mo'o// rim po gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams dkar ser ro// rim pa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams ljang gu ma'o//
172a4(rgyud 'grel): sgo'i lha mo rnams nag mo'o// bcom ldan 'das la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngas rgyas btab pa'o// sna tshogs ste ma ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis so// legs phreng can ma la sogs pa bzhi ni rin 'byung
172a5(rgyud 'grel): gis so// rim pa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams ni snang ngo mtha' yas kyis so// rim pa gsum pa la gnas pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis so// sgo'i lha mo rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis snying ga'i
172a6(rgyud 'grel): sa bon ni ts+tsha // oM pra tru ka bA li nI ma hrIHhUM la ni snying po'o// sngags 'di nyid kyis dkyil 'khor 'di'i las thams cad zin/ dpe 'i rnal 'byor nam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni
172b1(rgyud 'grel): gur gyi nang du rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgya mtsho chen po la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang rdo rje rgya gram gyi lte ba la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dkyil du dbus kyi rim pa'i
172b2(rgyud 'grel): lte bar seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la sems dpa'i spyi la klung g+hi bcu ba'i brjes dang la na khyor nas klanag po rtsa ba dang ga lpa gak+ko kyi 'as gtsunag po dar lnga po dang shA pogs ra la spyan gsu' rgyan cu drug dang ldan pa bul gAg ng+gA sathod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang nor bu dang rna ba skyed pa dang bloT rdo NAm nA spyi ral ba nag bI dz+ra pa? d+ha de ni Ta lnga 'gro ni bu rgyan TI sa khI shaM h+ya su Sh+Ti
172b3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra phyag drug pa/ rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis ye shes kyi DA ki ma nag po 'am dkar mo la 'khyud pa/ lag pa g.yas pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang mnga' 'dzin pa g.yon pa gnyis kyis pad snod dang gzhu
172b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin po'o// de nas shar gyi re mig la glang po che'i rgyal po la 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i rdo rje DA kri ma dkar mo/ byang du rma bya la skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa'i 'jigs byed DA ki ma ser mo sbrul gyis brgyan pa/
172b5(rgyud 'grel): nub tu byu khyung la tsog pur gnas pa'i ro langs ma dmAr mo lhor khol po'i gdan la byin pa'i skyil krung gis gnas pa'i gtum mi sngon mo dbu skra dmar po bkram pa grol zhing spyi baur thal mo sbyar ba'o// 'dir ye shes kyi DA
172b6(rgyud 'grel): ki ma la sogs pa lnga ni g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams ni glang po che la sogs pa la gnas po'i pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa glang po che'i
173a1(rgyud 'grel): pags pa smad la glon pa mi'i pazlas pa stod la gon pa'o// dbang ldan du seng ge la 'gying tshul gyis gnas pa'i seng ge ma dkar ser phyag gnyis ma g.yas pa steng du 'phyar ba'i kha
173a2(rgyud 'grel): DA ga 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang btsos pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// mer rdo rje phag chu ma zlum po'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'i stag mo kha dog dkar nag mo phyag g.yas pa dang cig shos kyis lca gos kyu dang
173a3(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// bden brel du ma ha la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa ce spyang ma ce spring gi gdod can sku mdog dmar nag dgra sta drang zhugs pa 'dzin pa'i phyag gnyis so// rlung du ce spyang gi gdan la tsog bur
173a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'i 'ug pa ma 'ug pa'i gdong can dmor ser moM phyag gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang zhogs pa 'dzin pa'o// 'di rnams ni rang rang gi chibs rnams la pad+mo dang nyi mar gnas pa'o// shar du rdo rje DA ki ma'i
173a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyab tu DA ki ma dkar mo phyag gnyis rtse mo khar bcug pa'o// byang du 'jigs bying DA ki ma'i rgyab du mar me ma ser mo// spro borA mar me lta bur thal mo sbyar ba dang bcas pa'o// nub tu ro langs ma'i rgyub tu 'dzugs
173a6(rgyud 'grel): byed ma dmar mo snyim pa khrag gis bkang ba zhal du gsol ba'o// lhor gtum mo'i rgyab tu skam po 'dzi nag mo// phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar gton shing 'phyar ba'o// bzhi po 'di rnams dang pad+ma dang nyi ma dang
173b1(rgyud 'grel): ro la gnas pa'o// de nas rdo rje phreng ba dang 'od zer gyi zlum po'i rim pa bskor ba la pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la shar phyogs puk+ka sI dang DA mi DA dang gtum mo rnams phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsi'i snod 'dzin pa'o// byang du 'jigs
173b2(rgyud 'grel): byed ma dang grags ma dang sha ma rnams ni sha lngas bkang ba'i pad+ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o// nub tu drags shul mo dang 'bar ma dang mi sdug pa rnams gtor ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o// lhor thod pa ma dang rdo rje ma dang bum pa ma rnams
173b3(rgyud 'grel): btung ba'i snod 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan du sgeg mo bsnyems pa'i phyag rgya can dang dri chab mo dri'i snod 'dzin pa'o// me'i mtshams su pi wang ma pi wang bsgreng ba dang me tog ma me tog 'thor ba'o// bden bral du glu ma kha'i
173b4(rgyud 'grel): thang khar mdzub mo g.yo ba dang / bdug spos ma spos dang bcas pa'i spos phor 'dzin pa'o// rlung du gar ma gar gyi tshul gyis steng du thal mo sbyar ba dang / mar me ma mar me dang bcas pa'i mAr me'i snod 'dzin pa'o// ye
173b5(rgyud 'grel): shes DA ki ma la sogs pa'i lha mo sum cu rtsa gsum po 'di dag ni zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa dbu skra grol ba/ dbu lo thod pa lnga'i phreng ba can no// 'jigs byed DA ki ma ni dbu skra gyen la brdzes
173b6(rgyud 'grel): pa seng ge ma la sogs pa ni gos dmar po gyon pa'o// puk+ka sI la sogs pa dang me'i mtshams kyi lha mo rnams dkar mo'o// 'jigs byad TI ka ma la sogs pa dang dbang ldan gyi lha mo dag ser mo'o// drag shul
174a1(rgyud 'grel): ma la sogs pa dang rlung mtshams kyi lha mo dag dmar me'o// thod pa ma la sogs pa dang bden bral gyi lha mo dag nag ma'o// de nas rdo rje phreng ba zlum par phyi rol gyi rim pa'i sgo rnams dang snum du
174a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la chu skyes dang zla ba'i gdan rnams so// de la shar sgor khyab 'jug nag po dang / byang du tshangs pa ser po dang / nub tu dbang phyug chen po dkar po dang / lhar gdong drug dmar po dang / dbang ldan du dbang
174a3(rgyud 'grel): po ser po dang / mer lus ngan ser po dang / srin por gshin rje nag po dang / rlung du chu lha dkar po'o// lho'i snam bu la shar du keng rus 'jigs byed dang kha T+wAM ga'i srin blo dang tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang / dril bu'i
174a4(rgyud 'grel): rna ba can rnams dkar po'o// byang du gtum mo'i dbang phyug dang medu na sa'i lha dang rigs kyi dbang phyug dang / dzA kA ra 'jig su rung ba rnams se rau po'o// nub tu drag po'i 'dod pa dang Sha Na DI la'i dbang phyug dang DA mu
174a5(rgyud 'grel): ru'i 'dul byed dang rnga sgras 'jigs byed rnams dmar po'o// lho ru gtum bu ri'i dbang phyug dang s+tha ra na dang / mche ba gtsigs pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa rnams ni nag po'o// khyab 'jug la sogs pa nyi 'u rtsa bzhi po
174a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis kha T+wAM ga dang rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa gnyis kyis lha mo la 'khyud pa dang thod po 'dzin pa'o// ral pa nag po'i thor cog
174b1(rgyud 'grel): can rnams thod pa lnga'i phreng ba sdu dbu la brgyun pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ stug gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can no// 'dri rnams kyi yum lha mo rnams kyang phyag g.yas pa dang cig shos kyis kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// 'dir/
174b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal rnal 'byor na mkha' la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngas rgyas btab pa'o// ye shes kyisku mkha' 'gro ma la mi bskyod pa 'am/ rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyus btab pa'o// rdo rje DA ki ma la
174b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bzhi dang / DA ki ma la sogs pa bzhi la rtag pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' ya sA dang / don yod grub pa rnams kyis so// seng ge ma la sogs pa bzhi ni mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad
174b4(rgyud 'grel): dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas rnams kyis so// tshangs pa la rnam par snang mdzad kyis so// dbang phyug chen po la snang ba mtha' yas kyis so// lha gzhan dkar po rnams la rnam par snang
174b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyis so// ser po rnams kyi ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyis so// dmar po rnams la snang ba mtha' yas kyis so// nag po rnams la mi bskyod pas so// dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi snying ga'i sa bon ni hUM ngo //
174b6(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM haHswA hA/ zhes pa ni snying po'i sngags so// oM g+hu g+haHswA hA/ ro lings ma'i las thams cad pa'i sngags// zhes bya ba rim pa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gnal yas kha
175a1(rgyud 'grel): bu la DA ki ma la sogs pa bzhi po rnams ni sgo rnams su'o// zhes pa gzhan no// rim pa gnyis pa yang gzhal yas khang gi dbyibaso zhes pa ni gzhan no// de yang zlum pa'o// zhes bya ba ni kha cig/
175a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das gshin rje bshed kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi dbus su chos 'byung gi lte bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs mtsho skyes dang nyi ma'i steng du gnas pa'i ma he nag po khros pa rus pa'i rgyan
175a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan pa'i rgyab tu sna tshogs chu skyes drang nyi ma la gnas pa'i gshin rje'i gdan la g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bas mnan nas bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gsheng nag po sgron ma dang ag tshom gyen du langs shing dbu
175a4(rgyud 'grel): skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa sku madrag bong thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang ba dregs pa mi mgo'i phreng ba mgul par 'phyang ba/ ljags 'gyur ba mche ba 'bar ba gtsigs pa/ rtsa ba dang g.yA dang
175a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po dang / phyag drug pa gri gug dang thod par ldan pa'i g.yas dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis kyi rang 'od ky-i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa g.yas pa gnyis kyi rdo rje dang ral gri/ g.yon pa
175a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ma 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba bzhin du mtha' yas la sogs pa'i klus brgyan pa'o// 'di'i shar du rnam par snang mdzad dkar po ste/ rtsa ba dang g.yas dang cig
175b1(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi zhal dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po phyag g.yas gnyis na 'khor lho dang ral gri'o// g.yon gyi phyag gnyis ni rin po che dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// lho phyogs su rin chen 'byung ldan gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu zhal gsu
175b2(rgyud 'grel): ser po dang sngon po dang / dkar po g.yas kyi phyag dag ni rin po che dang ral gri'o// g.yon pa dag na 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dmar po zhal gsum dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po'o// g.yas
175b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dag na pad+ma dang ral gri'o// g.yon pa dag na nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// byang phyogs su phrag dog ga shin rje ba shed ljang gu zhal gsum ljang gu dang nag po dang / dkar po g.yas pa dag na 'khor lo dang ral gri/
175b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa dag na nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// bzhi char yang khro be 'khor lo'i bdag pa'i mtshan nyid can g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi rtsa ba'i phyag dag gos gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin cing rang dang 'dra ba'i yum la 'khyud pa'o//
175b5(rgyud 'grel): me'i mtshams su rdo rje tsar tsi ka ma ni skam zhing gzugs dang phyag mtshan rnams ni gti mug gshin rje gshed lta bu'o// bden bral du rdo rje phag mo phag zhal can ma zhe sdang gshin rje gshed lta bu'o// rlung du rdo rje dbyangs
175b6(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dod chags ga shin rje gshed lta bu'o// dbang ldan du dkar mo phrag dog gshin rje gshed lta bu'o// 'dir rnam par snang mdzod la sogs pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i rwa'i rtsa ba rnams su'o// rdo rje'i ra mtshoms rnams su
176a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje tsar tsi ka la sogs pa bzhi ni rang dang 'dra ba'i thabs dang bcas pa'o// shar sgor tho ba gshin rje gshed nag po zhal gsum ni nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'o// g.yas drag gis rdo rje tho ba
176a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ralA gri/ g.yon dag gis nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// lho sgor dbyug pa gshin rje gsheng dkar po zhal gsum dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po'o// g.yas pa dag gis dbyug pa ral gri/ g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang
176a3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// nub sgor pad+ma ga shin rje gsheng 'dod chags gshin rje gA shang lta bu'o// byang sgor ral gri gA shin+da rje gA shing phrag dog ga shin+da rje gshed lta bu la cung zad sngo ba'o// thams cad kyang klu ma rungs pa 'jigs
176a4(rgyud 'grel): pa gang rgyangs can dbu skra dmarari ser 'bar ba gyen la brjes shing mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal con rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin cing rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o// 'dir rnam par snang mdzad dang /
176a5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'o// lha gzhan rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhir sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i thod pa bzhi na
176a6(rgyud 'grel): byang sems dkar ba dang dmar ba dang bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lngas bkang ba'o// gshin rje gshed nag po'i rigs kyi bdag po ni spyi bor mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid do// rnam par snang mdzod la sogs pa bzhi yang de bzhin
176b1(rgyud 'grel): de rnams ni go rims ji lta bar spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi dang tho bA gA shin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams kyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni ltung ngo // oM hrIHSh+T+r-i b+h+r-i kr-i tA na nA d+hU hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes
176b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni snying po'i sngags dang las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di'o// / rdo rje sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dkyil 'khor du gzhal yis khang gi
176b3(rgyud 'grel): lte ba la sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje sgrol ma gser btso ma lta bu sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang rgyu ba dang g.yon gyi zhal bzhi gser mdog
176b4(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar po dang sngon po dang / dmar po phyag brgyad ma g.yas kyi phyag rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang mda' dang dung rnams 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyi ut+pa la sor po dang gzhu dang lcags kyu dang sdigs
176b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzub bo// sharI gyi 'dab mar me tog sgron ma d+ho kar mo ni phyag gonyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa/ lhor bdug spos sgrol ma nag mo nr-i phyag gnyis kyis bdug spos 'dzin pa'o// nub tu mar me'i sgrol ma
176b6(rgyud 'grel): ser mo ni phyag gnyis kyis mar me'i skong bu 'dzin pa'o// byang du dri'i sgrol ma dmar mo ni phyag gnyis kyi dri chab kyi dung 'phyar ba'o// lha mo bzhi po 'di rnams ni zla ba la gnas pa'o// me la sogs pa'i 'dib ma
177a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i mdog lta bu 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang pad+ma dang ral gri'o// rim pa gnyis pa'i shwa ru sgor rdo rje lcags kyu mra dkar mo ni g.yas pa na lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o//
177a2(rgyud 'grel): lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ma ser mo ni phyag g.yas pa zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog la rdo rjes michin pa phyag g.yas su'o// byang du rdo rje dril bu ma ljang gu ma ni phyag g.yas pa rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin
177a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ me la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma rnams la spyan ma la sogs pa rnam par drag po'i byang sems kyi bum pa dang / ri rab dang me thab dang rgyal mtshan chen po'o// steng du gtsug tor rnam par
177a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ma dkar mo ni 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i phyag g.yas pa'o// 'og tu gnod mdzes ma sngon mo nI g.yas pa klu'i zhags po 'dzin pa'o// lha mo drug po 'di rnams ni phyag g.yon pa sngags mdzub dang bcas pa sna tshogs
177a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o// bcu po 'di rnams kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o// bcu gcig po rnams kyang zha bas rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa gser gyi sna cha g.yo bas brgyan bya gis sna tshogs dang rin po
177a6(rgyud 'grel): tshechetshe'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa pad+ma rA ga'i 'od zer phro ba'o// rdo rje sgrol ma'i rigs bdag ni rin chen 'byung ldan no// me tog sgril ma la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dang / snang ba mtha'
177b1(rgyud 'grel): yas dang don yang grub pa rnams te rdo rje skyugs kyu ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo // gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i rin 'byung ngo // gnod mdzes ma mi bskyod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying gA'o sa ban ni d+h+wa dza/
177b2(rgyud 'grel): tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes pa ni snying po'i sngags te dang las thams cad pa'i yang sngags s+ho// / 'od zer can ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ rdo rje gur gyi nang du gnas pa'i chos
177b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gi nang du gzhal yas khang ngo // kha cig gi lugs la chos 'byung med do// ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khyud ngo zhes so// gzhal yas khang gi lte bar mchod rten gyi phug gi dkyil du sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas
177b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zla ba 'am nyi ma la g.yas bskum pa g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'od zer can ma ser mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi cod pan+da can dbu sgra la mchod rten gyi brgyanA pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs
177b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa rtsa ba'i zhol ser po g.yas dkar po g.yon zhal nag po phag pa'i zhal khros pas khro gnyer dang zur mig tu ldan pa ljags 'dril bya 'jigs par byed ma phyag drug ma
177b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yos pa rnams kyis mda' dang rdo rje dang khab 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyis gzhu dang skud pa dang / mya ngan med pa'i shing me tog dang bcas pa'i yalaM ga 'dzin pa'o// smad gos sngon po gyon pa stong
178a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yogs rnam par bkra ba'i gos sngon po can/ gser mdog lta bu'i phag pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa rang gi mdog lta bu'i phag pas yongs su bskor ba/ mya ngan med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba dbu la
178a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ shwar phyogs su arku ma si zhes bya ba me tog bAM du ka'e mdog lta bu khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa g.yas glayon gyi phyag go// lho ru marka ma sI zhes bya ba'i lha mo gsor gyi mdog lta bu'i g.yas pas skud
178a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcas pa'i kho ba dang / g.yon pas mya ngon med pa'i shing gau yAl grwa 'dzin pa'o// nung tu an+ta r+ya d+hA na mA sI ser mo na g.yas pa mya ngan med pa'i yA lau ga g.yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa
178a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// byang du te dzo ma sI zhes bya ba sku mdog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o// me'i mtshams la sogs pa rA u da yA ma sI dang / gul mA ma sI dang / pa nam+b+ha sI dang / tsI ba ra
178a5(rgyud 'grel): ma sI rnams rimo pa ji lta ba bzhin du oMrka mA la sogs pa'i mdog dang phyag mtshan bzhin no// rim pa gnyis pa'i shwar gyi snam bu la ma hA tsI ba ra mA sI dang / ba ra hA mu khi ni nag mo mche ba gtsigs pa 'jig su
178a6(rgyud 'grel): rung ba/ g.yas pa rdo rje lcags kyu dang g.yon pas rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// lho ru dA kra ma sI dang ba ra li ser mo ni g.yas pas mya ngan med pa'i yal ba dang g.yon pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// nub tu pa ra kra ma sA
178b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bi da li dmar mo ni g.yas pa dang g.yon mda' dang glazhu 'dzin pa'o// byang du Ur ma ma s+thi dang / bA ra li ljang gu kha ba dang skud pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa dang g.yon gyi phyag go/ me'i mtshams su ba tA laM dmyur mo
178b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa'o// bden bral du ba dI li ser mo nI g.yas pa skud pa dang bcas pi'i khab dang g.yon pas yal 'dab dang bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i me tog gi chun po 'dzun
178b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ rlung du ba r-I lI sku mdog dkar mo g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gnyis kyis mya dun med pA'i yal gla dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan du bA rA ha mu khi dmar mo ni phyag gnyis kyis ma rA dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o//
178b4(rgyud 'grel): sha ra la sigs pa'i sgo ra A lo dang tA lo dang kA lho dang s+yAta tsa lo sngam ba mu d+ha TI rnams nI rim+ba pa ji lA ba bzhin du dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu phyag gnyis ma rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhag sa pa dang
178b5(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o// arka ma~M si la sogs pa'i lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams ni mngon par gsar du byung ba'i lang tshwa can mchod rten gyis dbu la brgyan po rin po che sna chags kyis brgyan
178b6(rgyud 'grel): pasna tshogs pa'i gos sngon pos stod g.yogs byas pa phag zhal cig ma phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa gser mdog lta bu'i phag pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang ldan po gser mdog lte bu'i phag pa la
179a1(rgyud 'grel): ci ngus pa'o// sgra srung ma rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dadA ny+tsi ma la g.yon bskum pa g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa'o// gzhan nyi shu po ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla bya la g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bsdu
179a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o// 'od zer can ma'i rigs pa gi rtag pa'o// shir la srog sa de'i phyogs la gnas pa rnams kyis mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yis dang don yod grub pa rnams so// mo la sos
179a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bral rnams su yang de bzhin kha cig go// yat+na nA dkar po rnams la rnam snang / nAg po rnams la mi bskyod pa/ ser mo rnams la rin chen 'byung ldan+tu/ dmar mo rnams la snang mtha'/ ljang gu rnams
179a4(rgyud 'grel): na yod sgrub hU~Mnanas pa ni gzhan ni// 'ang zer can gyi snying gA'i spyi bon nr-in+ti m+b+ha dz+nye// oM mA ri ts+tshi swA hA Sh+Tas pan+de s+yAng b+hU'i sngags so// oM m+bA r-i ts+tshe hU~Msarba bag+h+nAnA n+ye du ye hUM n+da s+t+wa~M d+hu/ zhes pa ni las mas
179a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyigs so/ / bsrung ba la 'khot+pa la rdo rje hU~M sbyin du rab kyi snying drugal la yas khe g-i rjes su skye chog ste rdo rje'i skye bar gnas pa'i sna chags pa
179a6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das mas sor 'brang ma chen mo ni 'od zer dmar ze'i dkyil 'khor rtsen ni po bzhi pa phyig bcu gnyis pa rtsa bar zhal ser po g.yas dkar po nub sngon po g.yon dmar ba'o// gal
179b1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi rin po che'i pa tra dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang mnga' dang ral gri dang / mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rnams kyi rdo rje dang zhags pa dang rtse gsum pa dang / gzhu dang dgra sta dang dung rnams 'dzin pa'o//
179b2(rgyud 'grel): dbu la mchod rten gyis brgyan pa rdo rje'i skyil krung can ma'o// de'i shar phyogs su stong chen mo rab 'joms ma ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la rol pa'i kun nas skyod pas bzhugs pa sku mdog dkar po zla ba'i 'od kyi
179b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor can zhal bzhi ma rtsa ba'i zhol dkar po g.yas sngon po rgyab ser po g.yon pa ljang gu'o// de'i g.yas pa rnams kyi pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang mchog sbyin pa dang lcags kyu dang
179b4(rgyud 'grel): mda' dang ral gri rnams so// g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub dang / zhags pa dang gzhu dang dgra sta rnams zhes bya ba'i phyag bcu'o// lho ru sna tshogs pad+mo dang / nyi mA ri nyi ma'i 'od can gyi gsang
179b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags rjes su 'dzin ma chen mo ni rdo rje skyil krung can mA nag mo dang dkar po dang dmar po ni rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yen pa'i zhol lo// phyag bcu gnyis paM g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis chos
179b6(rgyud 'grel): 'chad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa/ gzhan rnam pa gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i gzhan rnams kyis rdo rje dang mda' dang / mchog sbyin dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rnams kyi
180a1(rgyud 'grel): sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / gan+d+ha drung rin pa tshe rab tra dang pad+mas mtshan pa'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o// nubA N+ya sna tshogs pad+ma da sha ma la sbrul krung phyung byas bzhugs pa/
180a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od can gyi bsil ba'i tshe la chen po ni dmar mo dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po ni rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang giyon pa'i zhal lo// phyag brgyad pa'i g.yas rnams kyis pad+ma dang bcas po'i mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya
180a3(rgyud 'grel): dang mda' dang rdo rje dang ral gri'o// g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang snying gir gnas pa'i po ti 'dzin pa'o// byang du sna tshogaso pad+ma
180a4(rgyud 'grel): dang zla ba la zla ba'i 'od can sem stu dpa'i s+thi lI klung can/ rma bya chen mo ljang gu ni ljang gu dang nag po dang dkur po ni rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal lo// phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rma
180a5(rgyud 'grel): gtsug sgo dang mda' dang mchog sbyin dang ralci gri'o// g.yon po rnams kyis lhung bzed la gnas pa'i dge slong dang gzhu dang pang du gnas bya'i bum pa rin po che 'obar po 'bab pa can dang / sna tshogs rdo rje
180a6(rgyud 'grel): la rin po ches mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// rim pa gnyis pa la me'i mtshams su nag po phyag gnyis kyis dung 'dzin pa'o// bden bral du dus mtshan mo ser mo ni phyag gnyis kyis
180b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyu lta mtshan 'dzin pa'o// rlung gi mtshams su rU ba nag mo dmar mo phyug gnyis kyis dag sta 'dzin pa'o// dbyung ldan gyi mtshams su dkar mi sgyu mngog
180b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o// bzhi po 'di rnams ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o// dgu po 'di dag ni rang na sna tshogs kyis rgyan dang gos dang rin po che'i cod pan can/ zhal re ri la spyan
180b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsum pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan dang / rnam par snang mdzod dang / mi bskyod pa dang / snang ba mtha' yi sna dang / don yod grub pa dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung
180b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / rnam par snang mdzod kyis rgyus btab paM'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgor sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi me lA rdo rje lcags kyu mu dang rdo rje zhagasde pa ma dang / rdo rje lcags
180b5(rgyud 'grel): sgyosgrog ma dang rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi yad+na stAr bzhin no// sau sod+yo 'brang mya la sogs pa rnams kyi sa bon+da ni b+h+r-i // oM ma NaM d+hA r+yA bAdz+ra Ni mya hI prA tI sa ri hUM hUM phaT phaT ces bya b+hA nI sIng bi/ sa bon nI
180b6(rgyud 'grel): bu mo de oM AHma hA sa hA sra pra ma ra da ni buM hUM snying po'o// sa bon ni hUM ngo // oM AHma hA man+ta nu sA ra Na hUM hUM snying po'o// sa bon ni dz+nyAM ngo // oM A ma hA shi ta pa tau dz+riM hUM snying po'o// sa bon
181a1(rgyud 'grel): ni maM ngo // oM ma hA mA yu ra bid+yA rA dzA hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes pa snying po'o// dgos pa'i dbang gis 'di rnams gang yang rung bas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ma bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi
181a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug ma'i snying po'i sngags kyis ni las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang bya'o// / rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la/ rdo rje gur gyi nang du gling dang nye bo'i gling phran dang rgya mtsho dang
181a3(rgyud 'grel): ri bdun la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i ri rab kyi steng gzhal yas khang ste de'i dbus su seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dkar po rdo rje stsol krung gis
181a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa nyi ma'i 'od can/ sangs rgyas lngas spras pa'i ring na'i cod pan gyis rgyan pa'i ral po'i thor cog can rad+hi sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang go sla dang ldan pa zhi ba'i zhal bzhi dkar po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang
181a5(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu dang / phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gnyis kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad pa'o// gzhan gnyis kyi bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o// g.yas pa gnyis
181a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis bgrang phreng dang mnga'i 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// yang na 'di ni zhalo gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang bcas pa'i byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya
181b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo ldangs pa la g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'o// shar gyi 'dab mA la sems ma rdo rje ma sngon mo g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po 'dzin pa g.yon
181b2(rgyud 'grel): pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pas zhugs pa 'dzin pa'o// lhor rin chen rdo rje ma ser mo g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan ma pa'i rin po che 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas sdigs par byed pa'i sdigs mdzub bo// nub tu chos kyi rdo rje ma
181b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyud pa dkar dmar g.yas pas 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// byang du las kyi rdo rje ma ljang gu g.yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa de bzhin gshe
181b4(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga'i kha dog can 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub bsdigs par byed pa'o// de nas rushar phyogasu glang po che'i dbang po'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba rA mi bskyod pa sngon po rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas pa/
181b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas kyis gung mos rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon pa bzung nas sa genon gyi tshul byed cing phyag g.yon po gan rkyal du pad+ma du gzhag pa'o// shar gyi 'dib mar rdo rje sems dpa'i dkar po phyag g.yas pa'i gung
181b6(rgyud 'grel): mos snying gar 'gying ba'i tshul gyis rdo rje gsor ba'i sbyor ba'o// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i dril bu dkur brten pa'o// lhor rdo rje rgyal po ser po g.yas par gnas pa'i rdo rje lcags
182a1(rgyud 'grel): kyus 'gugs pa'i tshul byed cing phyag g.yon pas zhugs pa 'dzin pa'o// kha cig ni phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pas 'gugs pa'i tshul byed pa'o// zhes so// byang du rdo rje chags
182a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dmar po phyag g.yon pa dang cig shos rnam pa gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o// nub tu legs pa mar god kyi mdog lta bu rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis snying gar legs so sbyin pa'i tshul byed pa'o//
182a3(rgyud 'grel): lhor rta'i rgyab tu sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bA ra rin chen 'byung ldan ser po rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ g.yas pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che gung mos bzung ste/ mchod sbyin gyi tshul byed pa/ g.yon pa mnyam
182a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhag go/ shir gyi 'dab mar rdo rje rin chen ser po ni g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtha' gnyis la rdo rje gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'o ching bar byed cing g.yon
182a5(rgyud 'grel): pas rdo rje dril bu bsnyems pa dang bcas pas dkur brten pa'o// lho ru rdo rje gra za brjid dmar po snying gaR+Sha phyag gnyis kyis 'dzin pa'i nyi mas gsal bar byed pa'o// byang du rdo rje tog ljang gu g.yon gyi bar du
182a6(rgyud 'grel): lhur gnas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing 'phyar ba'o// nub tu rdo rje gzhang pa dkar po g.yas pas so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas kyang de bzhin te so'i
182b1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba dang ldan+da pa'i rdo rje gnyis par gzhag pa'o// nub tu rmya bya'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la snang ba mtha' yas rdo rje skyil krung can dmar po phyag g.yon pa dang cig shos gan rkyal du byas pa pad pA'i steng
182b2(rgyud 'grel): du bzhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyu'i g.yas pa'i gung mos rdo rjes mtshon pa'i pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje tshwas dmarA skra g.yon pa 'gying ba'i tshul dang bcas pas pad+ma'i yu bya 'dzin cing
182b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas kha 'byed pa'o// lho ru rdo rje gnon po na mkha' lta bu sngon po g.yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa g.yas pas ral gri 'phyar ba'i tshul du 'dzin pa'o// byang du rdo
182b4(rgyud 'grel): rje rgyu gser btso mo'i mdog can g.yon par gnas pa'i 'khor l-i rtsi byas brgyad pa g.yas pa'i gung mo mgal me lta bu bau sbyor zhing chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya 'dzin po'o// nub tu rdo rje bsrung ba dam ro po
182b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yo nA pha chos kyi dung dang g.yas pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i lce 'dzin pa'o// byung du khyung gi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar don yod grub pa ljang gu rdo rje sgrol krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i gung
182b6(rgyud 'grel): mo sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul byed cing g.yon po gan rgyal du pang par bzhag pa'o// shar gyi 'dab mir rdo rje las ljang gu g.yas pas snying gar bslang ba'i sbyor bas sna tsho
183a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu dkur brten pa/ yang nA lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin pa'o// lhar
183a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bsrung ba ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje'i go cha 'dzin pa'o// byung du rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po phyag gnyis kyis mthe chung gnyis kyi rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon gyi rtse mo gaunyis rang gi khar bcug pas gdug pa rnams bsdigs
183a3(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa'o// nub tu rdo rje khu tshur ser po khu tshu rA mtshams su rdo rje ste/ rdo rje khu tshur dag gis bzung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsdams pa'o// dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi me'i pad+ma la rdo rje sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje dku re brten
183a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag rgya'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa'o// bdan bral du pad+ma la phreng ba ma ser mo phyag gnyis rang na'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// rlung du pad+ma la glu ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis pi wang gi rgyud bsgreng ba'o//
183a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan du pad+ma la gar ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis bzung nas phyag gnyis kyis gar byed pa'o// dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi phyi ru snam bu li shar du pad+mo rnams la byams pa dang mthong ba don yod
183a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ngan song kun 'dren dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros rnams ni mi bauskyod pa lta bu'o// lhor pad+ma rnams la spos kyi glang po dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / ye
183b1(rgyud 'grel): shes rtog rnams rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o// nub tu pad+ma rnams la 'od dpag med dang / zla ba'i 'od dang bzang skyong dang dra ba can gyi 'od rnams ni 'od dpag med lta bu'o// byang du pad+ma rnams la rdo rje snying po dang / blo gros
183b2(rgyud 'grel): mi zad pa dang / spobs pa rtseges pa dang / kun tu bzang po rnams ni den yod grub pa lta bu'o// yang na sha ri la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa la sogs pa
183b3(rgyud 'grel): stong du bzhis ma tshung ba bsgom par bya'o// de'i mtshan rnams mangs pas 'jigs pas ma bshad do// / mtshams kyi pad+ma la rdo rje bdug spos ma dkar mo dang b+h+r-i na bral gyi pad+ma la rdo
183b4(rgyud 'grel): tig ma ser mo dang / rlung gi pad+ma la rdo rje mar me dkar dmar dang / dbang ldan gyi pad+ma la rdo rje dri chab ma ljang gu'o// bdug spos ma la sogs pa 'di rnams gong bzhin du phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o// shar la
183b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i sgo'i pad+ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje zhugs pa dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams rim pa bzhin du dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu rnams ni gong bzhin du phyag
183b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan 'dzin pa'o// 'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings las gzhan po'i lha rnams ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gos dang rad na sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa rang na'i cod pan rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ma
184a1(rgyud 'grel): gtogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la sngon du phyogs pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug ni/ rang gi rigs kyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa la
184a2(rgyud 'grel): ston du phyogs pa'o// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi lha rnams ni ji ltar gsungs pa'i lte bo dang 'dab ma rnams la gnas shing nyi ma'i 'od zer can no// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
184a3(rgyud 'grel): las gzhon pa'i lha bzhi bcu zhe brgyad ni sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o// 'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings rnam par snang mdzad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid
184a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga rang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpes rgyas btab pa'o// me l-i de lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin ga shegs pa bzhi'i rigs kyi baudag po ni rnam par smang mdzad do// /
184a5(rgyud 'grel): sems ma rdo rje ma dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhi dang sgeg mo dang bdug spos ma dang byams pa la sogs pa bzhi dang / rdo rje lcags kyu rnams kyis mi bskyod pa'o// rin chen rdo rje ma dang rdo rje rin chen la
184a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bzhi dang / phreng ba ma dang me tog ma dang spos kyi glang po la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje nags pa rnams kyis rin chen 'byung ldan no// chos kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje chos la sogs pa bzhi dang glum dang / mar
184b1(rgyud 'grel): me ma dang / 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog rnams kyis snang ba mtha' yas so// las kyi rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje las la sogs pa bzhi dang / gar ma dang dri chab ma dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs
184b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyis don yod grub pa'o// 'dir rlung gi gzhal yas khyang gi sgo rnams la'ang rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa sgo skyong bzhi bsgom par bya'o// zhes pa phyogs gzhan no// rnam par snang
184b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyi snying ga'i sa bon+da AHoM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA gI sho ra hUM zhes pa nI snying po'o// oM badz+rA yak+Sha hUM zhes pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi las thams cad pU'i sngags so// gang yang rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i
184b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud gzhan gyis kyang lha'i rnam pa'i khyad par gsungasde ba de ni 'dir mangs kyis dogs pas ma bshad dA// / bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyis bdag nyid can/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la
184b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gur gyi nAng la sogs pa gzhol yas khang gi bar du dang por bshad pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no// 'on kyang 'dir khro bo rnams ni 'og nas 'chad pa'i gzugs can no zhes pa ni phyogs
184b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig gi/ rdo rje gur gyi nang na ri rab kyi steng na sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar gzhal yas khang zhes pa ni phyogs gnyis pa'o// phyogs gnyis ka la yang mchod rten dkar tsa
185a1(rgyud 'grel): nang du gzhal yas khang ngo // de'i lte ba la seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin
185a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam pa'i rdo rje sku mdog gser btso ma lta bu sdug cing yid du 'ong ba me tog sna tshogs kyi mdzes pa'i gtsug pud gsum gyis rnam par brgyan pa rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal se ri po dang sngon po dang dkar
185a3(rgyud 'grel): po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ralA gro dang mchog sbyin dang mda' dang / gri yon pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang chu skyes sngon+da po dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// bdag lta bu'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbung
185a4(rgyud 'grel): phyu gau ma l-i snyoms par zhugs pa'o// de'i shar phyogs kyi le tshe la glang po che'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la mi bskyodadau pa sngon po 'gyid pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal sngon po dang /
185a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang / dmar po phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa'i gung mos snying garA rdo rje gyen du bsgreng ba/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dril bu dku la brten pa/ g.yas pa gzhan rnams kyis ral gri dang lcags kyu dang
185a6(rgyud 'grel): mda' rnams so// g.yon pa rnams kyis nu ma dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// lho ru rta'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan ser po sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ ser po
185b1(rgyud 'grel): dang sngon po dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lo// phyag drug pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya byas pa/ g.yas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa gnyis kyi nu ma dang
185b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// nub tu rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dong nyi ma la sems dpo'i skyil mo krung gis gnas pa'i snang po mtha' yas dkar po dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lo// phyag
185b3(rgyud 'grel): drug pa g.yon pa sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i pad+ma'i yu ba snying gar gzung ste/ g.yas pas kha 'byed pa'o// g.yas pa gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// byung du
185b4(rgyud 'grel): khyung gi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la don yod grus sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa kha dog dramar po dmar po dang sngon po dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lo// phyag drug pa dang po gaunyis
185b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgyo bcing ba'o// g.yas gnyis kyis ral gri dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa gnyis kyis ru ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan du spyan ma ser mo ni sems dpa'i skyil krung can phyag
185b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyis mchog sprin dang mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda' 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyis sngags mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / rin po che'i snye ma dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin
186a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// mer mA ma kI sems dpa'i skyil krung can ma sngon mo ni khro ba dang bcas pas rgod pa phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda' dang g.yon pa rnams kyis
186a2(rgyud 'grel): sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin po'o// bden thul du gos dkar mo dri mar mo ni phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda'o// g.yon pa rnams kyis pad+ma dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu
186a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin cing 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o// rlung du sgrol ma mar gang+gA lta bu'i mdog can ma sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas pa/ phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda'
186a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang ut+pa la dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rim pa gnyis pa la shwa ro la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su sems ma rdo rje ma dang rin chen rdo rje ma dang chos kyis rdo rje ma dang lngas
186a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis rdo rje ma rnams rim pa bzhin du skye mdog dang phyag dang phyug mtshan ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhin no// 'on kyang nu ma 'dzin pa med pas sems ma rdo rje ma rin chen rdo rje mA las kyis rdo rje ma rnams sdigs
186a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzub 'dzin pa'o// chos kyi rdo rje me ni zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan du tsun da dkar mo zla ba'i mdog can phyag nyi shu rtsa drug ma rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis snying gar rtse ba'i phyag rgya dang g.yas pa rnams
186b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis mi 'jigs pa dang ral gri dang rang na'i phreng ba dang bi dza pu ra dang mda' dang dgra sta dang mdung thung dang tho ba dang lcags kyu dang rdo rje dang ba dan gsum gyi tshul dang bgrang phreng ngo // g.yon pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nor
186b2(rgyud 'grel): bu'i rgyal mtshan dang pad+ma dang spyi blugs dang zhags pa dang gzhu dang sha ka ti dang 'khor lo drang ral gri dang sdigs mdzub dang bum pa bzang po dang bi daM ba la dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti'o// kan tAM/
186b3(rgyud 'grel): ka'i stong g.yogs btsongs po bla gos phrag pa la gzar ba glur gyi nyams dgu'i rang bzhin rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po g.yas pa'i sngon po ljags 'gul zhing mche ba bag tsam gtsigs po/ g.yon pa ser po ma
186b4(rgyud 'grel): mchu mnan pa/ thal mo sbyar te mdzub maM gnyis gung mo'i tshogs parA zlum po rnam par bzhag ste mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i rtsa ba'i logs la bzhag par bya ste/ snying gar gzhag pa 'dri ni rtsa ba'i phyag
186b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya'ide dam+ba ra ni rin chen skor mda' ser mo phyag drug pa gnyis kyis snying gar rin po che khA sbyor 'dzin pa'o// g.yas pa gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang / mda' 'dzin pa g.yon bla gnyis kyis sdigs mAdzub
186b6(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// bden bral du khro gnyer can dkar mo phyag drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mda' 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyi sdigs mdzub dang spyi blugs dang / gzhu 'dzin pa'o//
187a1(rgyud 'grel): rlung du rdo rje lcags sgrog mA ljang gu phyag drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang rdo rje lu gu rgyad dang mda' 'dzin+da pa g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub drang zhags pa drang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// spyan
187a2(rgyud 'grel): mA la sogs pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis po 'di rnams ni ral pa'i kun tu bskyod pa dang ldan pa zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing 'od dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ rlung rlung gi rigs kyi bdag po bzhin du zhal gsum pa'o//
187a3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa gsum pa'i dkyilha 'khor du shar gyi snam bu la byams pa gsor gyi mdog lta bu phyag dang po gnyis chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya dang / g.yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang / g.yon pa me tig dang bcas b+ha'i
187a4(rgyud 'grel): klu shing gi yal gA 'dzin pa'o// 'jam dpal ni brjod zin pa'i gzugs tsAn te// khyod par du shes rab ma dang bral ba'o// spos kyi glang po ljang gu g.yon pas bum par gnas pa'i glang po che'i sna 'dzin
187a5(rgyud 'grel): baiSh+To dugayas kyi mchog sbyin no// ye shes tog ser po g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// g.yas mchog sbyin no// lho ru bzang skyong sku mdog dmar paM/ g.yon bI radA na
187a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o g.yas pas mchog sbyin no// blo gros rgya mtsho dkar po phyag gnyis kyis sor mo thams cad brkyang bas chu rlabs kyi tshul byed po'o// bla gros mi zad po gser me ge lta bu g.yon pa'i khu tshur
187b1(rgyud 'grel): snying gar bzhag ste/ g.yas byas mchog sbyin no// spobs pa brtsegs pa ljang gu g.yon pas khu tshur mkhrul khung du bzhag pa'o// g.yas pas se gol tog pa'o// nub tu mthu chen thob dkar po g.yen pas
187b2(rgyud 'grel): bAg tsam kha phye ba'i pad+ma dkar po'o// g.yas pas mchog sbyin no// ngan srong kun 'dri ni dkar po phyag gnyis kyis sdigs pa sprug pa'i tshul lo// mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad ngeste par 'joms pa'i blo gros gser
187b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdog lta buM phyag gnyis kha sbyar bsdabs pa'i tshul lo// dra ba can gyi 'od dmar po g.yon pas ut+pa la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// g.yas pas mchog sbyin no// byang du zla 'od sku mdog zla
187b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'od lta bu me/ yin pas ut+pa lhar gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin no// 'od dpag med dmar po phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i blam pa 'dzin po'o// na mkha'i mdzad sde
187b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog gser lta bus g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur 'gying bas dkur rten pa'o// g.yas byas na mkha' la bskor ba'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sngon po 'am dkar po g.yon pas su la reg pa/ g.yas
187b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe bong dang sdigs mdzub sbyar te/ dri ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o// byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams ni zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od can no// sems dpa'i skyil
188a1(rgyud 'grel): klung gis bzhugs pa spyan gsum pa rang phyogs kyi bdag po bzhin du zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa/ phyag gnyis kyis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya byas pa/ gnyis kyis gzhu dang /
188a2(rgyud 'grel): mda' 'dzin pa'o// byams pa dang 'jam dbyangs gnyis lan mnyam po zhag gri phyag rgya med do// 'jam pa'i rdo rje l-i sogs pa'i lha thams cad gos sna tshogs pa dang rin po che'i rgyan dang ralA pa'i thor tshugs
188a3(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i zhal drung stug po'i nyams dang ldan pa'o// shur gyi sgor mo he'i steng du gu shin+da rje mthar byed nag po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mda' 'dzin pa'o// rgam
188a4(rgyud 'grel): pas zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub gyen du bsgrengs pas bsdigs par byed pa/ g.yon pa'i gnyis pos 'khyud pa'i lha mo'i nu ma 'dzin pa'o// de yang zhal gcig pu phyag gnyis pa sku
188a5(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar po g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa phyag giyas pas yeb la 'khyod par brtson pa'o// g.yon pa'i gsum pas dngul gyi gzhu 'dzin pa'o// mArar+ya gang lta bu'i lho mo ljang gu phywa gnyis
188a6(rgyud 'grel): ma g.yas ut+pa la sngon po 'dzin pa phyag g.yon po yab kyi rke la 'khyud pas g.yas pas phyogs su brgyan pa/ zhal drug pa gsus pa 'chang ba/ zhal drug ni sngon po rtsa ba'i zhal dgyes po'i gang
188b1(rgyud 'grel): mos bzhad pa/ gnyis pas 'jigs par byed pa gsum pa'i zhal gdangs pa bzhi pa 'jig su rung ba/ lnga pa rdo rje mche ba can/ drug pa mgo'i steng du gnas pa ljags mgul ba'o// yang na steng gi
188b2(rgyud 'grel): sngon po rtsa ba la stsogs pa'i zhal rnams ni g.yos skor gyis sngon po dang dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu rnams so// lho sgor gzhan gyis mi thub pa ser po ser po dang nag po dang dkar po rtse ba
188b3(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lo// phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug tho dang mda' 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyis sngags mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu
188b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// nub tu rta mgrin dmA ra~M bI dmar po dang sngon pa dang dkaR+Sha po rtsa ba dang / g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lo// phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang ka na ya dang mda' rnams
188b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu mA dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sngon po rkang pas bgegs mnan pA/ phyag drug pa ga ya s+t+ra pA
188b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis ral gri dang dgra sta dang mnga' rnams 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan gyi mchims su rang na'i ri
189a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'i steng du mo gso ba sngon po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gyi dang zhags pa dang mnga' 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhugs pa dang rum
189a2(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// g.yon ngos su 'phyang ba'i gso sngon po 'dzin pa'o// khrug gis rlan pa'i lcags mgul ba'i zhal gdangs pa'o// mer 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngon+da po phyag drug pa dang po gnyis kyis
189a3(rgyud 'grel): rlung gis phyag rgya byas pa gsus pa gnyis kyis rdo rje dang mda' dang g.yon pa gnyis nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis phan tshun rgyub sbyar te mthe chung gnyis bsnol te sdigs mdzub gnyis
189a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir brkyang nas bzhags pa'i tshul byas pa na 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// bden bral du dbyug pa sngon po sku ma dag sngon po 'di phyag drug pa g.yos pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dribyug po dang mnga'// g.yon
189a5(rgyud 'grel): po rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang btsos pa'i zhags pa dong nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rlung du stobs blo che sngon po phyug brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang ral gri dang mnga'o// g.yon
189a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang tho ba dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi steng du gnod mdzes rgyal po sngon po phyag drug pa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje
189b1(rgyud 'grel): hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings pa g.yas pa gnyis kyis ral gri dang mnga' 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// 'dir 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis gyen du bsgreng ba ni gnod
189b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes kyi phyag rgya'o// 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og sngon po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang / mda' 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyis nu ma dang zhags pa dang bcas pa'i rtse gcig pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o//
