189b4(rgyud 'grel): khwa phye ba/ g.yos pa'i zhal gdangs pa/ g.yon pa'i zhal ma mchu mnan pa mche ba gtsigs pa stag gi lpags pas smad dang steng la gon pa thod pa'i phreng bsau dbu la brgyan pa/ dbu skra 'bar ba gyen la
189b5(rgyud 'grel): bcings shing 'khyil pa/ sma ra dmar ser rol pa'i kun tu bskyod pa tsan/ klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pA/ phud kyi sgra sgrogs pa dang bcas pa'i gdengs ka can rnams kyis 'jigs pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang / nyi
189b6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gdan la g.yon brkyang bis gnas pa'o// gshin rje mthor byed ni g.yas brkyang ba'am rdo rje skyil krung gis kyang bzhugs pa'o// dkyil 'khor 'di la gnod mdzes rgyal po'i gzugs kho nas rnam par
190a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i phyir gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni dkyil 'khor nyid du tha dad du ma bshad de/ dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las rnal 'byor rgyas par bstan pa la'o// 'bring por bstan pa la ni
190a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i spyi bo'i steng du rong na'i ri l-I gnas pa'i pad+ma dang nyi ma la rdo rje skyil krung gos gnas pa'i gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ser po ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi
190a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal lo// phyag porgyad pa'i phyag gnyis kyis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya byas pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang bgrang phreng dang mda' 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyi 'khor lo dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin
190a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ sna tshogs pa'i gos ngong rin po che'i rgyan can/ ral pa'i thor cig go cod pan can gzhog gnyis su spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi po rnams kyis brgyan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de'i rjes su dra
190a5(rgyud 'grel): nas rnal 'byor rgyas pa la yang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur bla ni dkyil 'khor pa tha dad du dang de'i steng du gnod mAdzes rgyal po shes par bya'o/ zhes pa ni kha cig ga/ lha bzhi bcu zhe gsum po rnams
190a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang zhal re r-i la spyan gsum gsum pa'o// 'dir nu ma 'dzin par bstan pa de yang mi bskyed pa la sogs pa bzhi bdag lta bu'i shes rabo la snyoms par zhugs rnams kyi'o// khro bo rnams kyis ni bdag
190b1(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i shes rab ma g.yon ngos su gnas pa'i nu ma 'dzin pa'o// zhes shes par bya'o// gshin rje mthar byed las gzhan rnams lA shes rab ma med kyang / de'i nu mar 'dzin pa'i tshul gyi bdag gi nu mar 'dzin pa'o
190b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni gzhan no// 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin 'jam pa'i rdo rje chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid lta bu'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa/ me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs
190b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang / spyan ma dang tsu ne d+ha rnams la 'jam pa'i rdo rjes rgyas btab pa/ mA ma kI dang sems ma rdo rje ma dang byams pa lnga stsogs bzhi dang /
190b4(rgyud 'grel): khro bo bcu la mo skyong pos rgyas byatab pa'i rin chen rdo rje ma dang rin chen+da skar mda'o ma dang / bzang skyong ma la sogs pa bzhi la rin 'byung gis rgyas btab pa/ gos dkar moM dang chos kyi rdo rje ma dang khro
190b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyer ma dang mthu chen tho bo la sogs pa bzhi la snang ba mtha' yas kyis rgyas btab pa/ sgrol mo dang lhas kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang / zla 'od la sogs pa bzhi la don yang grub pas rgyas
190b6(rgyud 'grel): btab pa'o// 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i thugs ka ra sa bo ni muH'o// oM AHzhes pa snying po'i sngags so// oM a mr-i ti kuN+Da li big+h+nan+ti ka hAM zhes pa las thams cad pa'i sngags so//
191a1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur la sogs pa bsgom par rnam par bzhag pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no// khyad par du gshin rje gshed
191a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i khro bo rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can no// mchod rten ni 'dir med do// gzhal yis khang gA lte ba la sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la gnas pa'i steng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la 'jam
191a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbyangs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa nyi ma 'char ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang ldan pa sku mdog gser lta bu/ in+d+ra nI la lta bu'i gtsug phud dang ldan pa/ rdo rje dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng
191a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i cod pani gyi stong du sangs rgyas lnga dang rin po che'i cod pan can/ rad nA sna tshogs kyi rgyun dang na bza' sna tshogs bsnams pa/ sgeg pa'i nyams kyi tshogs dang ldan pa/ ser po dang sbyin po dang dmar po dang
191a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po ni rtsa ba dang g.yas dang nub dang g.yon gyi zhal lo// phyag brgyad pa'i phyag gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o// g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang rdo rje bsnams pa'o// g.yon
191a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang gzhu dang rdo rje dril bu bsgoms pa'o// 'dab ma brgyad la gnos pa'i seng ge'i steng du gnas pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la shar la sogs
191b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyogs rnams su gtsug tor chen po dang gdugs dkar po dang gzi brjid phung po dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor rnams dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba dang
191b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa dang cher 'phags pa dang rgyal ba rnams so// gtsug tor brgyad pa 'di rnams ni rdo rje skyil krung dang rIn pA che'i cod pan sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis pa'o// phyag g.yas pas 'khor lo gyen du bzung
191b3(rgyud 'grel): ba g.yon pas rang gi gdan la mnan pa rnams so// de nas shar gyi re mag gi dbus su glang po tshwa'i rgyal po la mi bskyod pa sngon po// zhal bzhi po rtsa ba'i zhal sngon po bag tsam khro ba dang bcas pa'i rol pa dang
191b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa g.yas pa dkar po kha gdangs pa drag po'o// nub kyi ser po dpa' bo g.yon pa dmar po mche bas ma ma chu mnan pa phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gI dang rdo rje dang mnga' dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa/

191b6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su rta mchog gi steng du rin chen 'byung ldan ser po ser po dang / nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i'o zhal bzhi po phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu'o// g.yon pa
192a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang rdo rje dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rin chen dang rdo rje nyi ma dang rdo rje tog dang rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o//
192a2(rgyud 'grel): nub kyi re mig gi dbus su rma bya'i steng du snang ba mtha' yas dmar po dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal bzhi'o// phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyi rdo rje dang mda' dang la gI dang lcags kyu
192a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyis pad+ma dang gzhu dang zhags pa dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje ches dang rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje rgyu dang rdo rje bsrung ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o// byang gi re mig gi dbus su
192a4(rgyud 'grel): khyung gi steng du don yod grub pa ljang gu zhol bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal ljang gu mche ba gtsigs pa g.yas ser po zhi ba/ nub dmar po sgregs pa dang bcas pa/ g.yon dkar po zhi ba phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas pa rnams
192a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mnga' dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon paM rnams kyi sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang gAzhu dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje las dang rdo rje bsrung ba dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje khu tshur rnam
192a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis yongs su bskor ba'o// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang rang gi chibs kyi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ rang na sna tshogs dang
192b1(rgyud 'grel): gos kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan can no// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bcu drug po 'di rnams ni dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa rdo rje
192b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyis dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang bzhin can rnams so// 'di dag kyang phyogs su gnas pa'o// zhes pa'i phyogs kyang yod do// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang
192b3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba rnams la sems dpa'i sgyid krung can/ sangs rgyas spyan ma dang mA ma kI dang gos dkor mo dang sbrel ma rnams rim pa ji lto ba bzhin du 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang mi bskyod pa dang / snang ba mtha' yis dang don yod
192b4(rgyud 'grel): grub pa lta bu'o// shar gyi sgo ru rdo rje lcags kyu dmar ser rdo rje lcags kyi 'dzin pa/ g.yas rkyang gis bzhugs pa'o// lho ru rdo rje zhags po ser po rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa g.yon brkyang gis gnas pa'o//
192b5(rgyud 'grel): nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar po rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag gnyis kyis 'dzin pa sA ga'i stang stabs kyis gnas pa'o// byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang bu phyag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa/
192b6(rgyud 'grel): zlum pa'i stang stabs kyis gnas pa'o// bzhi po 'di dag sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa dbu spro dmar ser gyar du berdzes pa sma ra dmar ser dang ldan
193a1(rgyud 'grel): pa klu chen brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// nang gi dkyil 'khor 'di las dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la/ shar gyi phyogs kyis dbang ldan nas brtsams nas g.yas bskor du rim pa bzhin du
193a2(rgyud 'grel): sa bcu gnyis kyi lha mo rnams zhal cig phyag gnyis mA/ grayas pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rang rang gi phyag myo chen 'dzin pa'o// de la mos pa spyod pa'i sa ma pad+ma bzhin du dmar ba
193a3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dmar po 'dzin pa'o// rab tu dga' bo dmar po yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'o// dri ma med ma dkar mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa'o// 'od byed ma dmar mo sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i
193a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// 'od 'phro ma ma rA ga ta lta bu'i mdog ut+pa la sngon po 'dzin pa'o// spyang dka' ma ser mo pang par gnas pa'i phyag gan rkyal gyis ma ra ga ta'i nor bu bsnams pa'o// mngon
193a5(rgyud 'grel): du gyur pa'i sa ma gser gyi mdog can pa'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa'o// ring du song ba ma na mkha' ltar sngo bsangs sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o//
193a6(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo ba ma ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog lta bu zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga po dmar pos mtshan pa'i pad+ma'i yu ba 'gying ba dang bcas pas 'dzin pa'o// legs pa'i blo gros ma dkar mo ral gris mtshan
193b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ut+pal 'dzin pa'o// chos kyi sbyin ma ser ma chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i rashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ba tI 'dzin pa'o// kun tu'ang ma nyi ma phyed kyi nyi mA'i mdug can pAd+ma'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa rje
193b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mngon par byed pa'i bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'dzin pa'o// lho ru pha rol tu phyin ma bcu gnyis ni phyag gnyis pa g.yas pa thams cad kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'i// g.yon pas rang rang gi phyag
193b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan 'dzin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ni phyag gnyis kyis lhag pa'o// de la rin po che pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin mA dmar mo pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma dkor
193b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar gyi mdog can 'byas so ba'i snye ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkirI mo mya ngan+ta ma pa'i yal ga dang bcas pa'i me tog+ni gi chun po 'dzin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinA ma sir mo chu/
193b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes dkar mo 'dzin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ma ra ga te lta bu'i mdog tsan+do ut+pa la sngon po 'dzin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ma na mkha' wAr s+t+waM bAsangs pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa'o// shes
193b6(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gser mdog lta bu yid du 'ong ma pad+ma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin ma/ phyag gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o// thabs kyi pha
194a1(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin ma me tog pri yang khu lta bu ljang khu pad+ma ser po la gnas pa'i rnal bri dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma ut+pa la sngon po'i mdog can ut+pa la sngon po la gnas pa'i
194a2(rgyud 'grel): ral gyi 'dzin pa'o// stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dmar mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa'o// ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo rad na sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi ya
194a3(rgyud 'grel): gag 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ni sku mdog sna tshogs pa ut+pa l-i sngon po la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// nub tu dbang bcu gnyis ma ni phyag gnyis g.yas pa rnams kyis pad+ma 'dzin pa/
194a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa rnams kyis snyems pas rlung rang gi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o// de lta tshe la dbang ba ma ni dkar mar gyi mdog can nor bu pad+ma sha la gnas pa'i ting rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can gyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag mod kyi sku
194a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// sems li dbang ba ma ni dkar mo rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po 'dzin pa'o// yo byad la dbyung ba ni ser mo snod bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// las la dbang ba ma ni ljang khu sna tshugs rdo rje
194a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// skye ba la dbang ba ma ni sku mdog sna tshogs me me tog 'dza' ti kha dog sna tshogs pa'i yal 'dab 'dzin pa'o// rdzu 'phrul lo dbang ba ma ni nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla
194b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// mo snga pa la dbang ba ni pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba'i pri yang ku'i me togi snye ma 'dzin pa'o// smon lham la dbang ba mA ni ser mo ut+pa la sngon po 'dzin pa'o// ye shes la dbang ba ma spen mo ut+pa
194b2(rgyud 'grel): la sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o// chos la dbang ba ma sku mdog dkar mo pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum pa bzang po 'dzin pa'o// de bzhin gshags nyid ma dkar mo phyag g.yas pas pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa/
194b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas rdo rje rin po ne'i snye ma 'dzin pa'o// spangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma gser bzhu pA lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yas kyis pad+ma ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga po 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa yid bzhin gyi
194b4(rgyud 'grel): non bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi steng du 'khyor lo 'dzin pa'o// byung du gzugs ma bcu gnyis ni phyag gnyis ma g.yos pa rnams kyis sna tshogs rdo rje dang g.yon pa snyems pa dang bcas pas rang rang gi mtshan ma
194b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa ste/ de la dbyig g+hi blo gros ma ster mo 'bras kyi sku mi 'dzin pa'o// rin chen dkar mang ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor buM'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dkar mo nor bu
194b6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba chu shil gyi bum pa 'dzin pa'o// 'od zer can dkar dmar srung pa dang bcas pa'i khab 'dzin pa'o// ri khrod lo ma can ljang khu rma bya'i mjug sgo 'dzin pa'o// dug sel ma dkar mo dug gi me tog
195a1(rgyud 'grel): gi chun po 'dzin pa'o// sgro mtha' yas ma me tog pri yang ku ltar ljang khu skyes dmar po la gnas pa'i mi zad pa'i gte chen po'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o// tsun d+ha ma dkar mo bgrang phreng 'phyang ba'i ril
195a2(rgyud 'grel): pa spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// shes rab 'phel ma dkar mo ut+pa la sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o// las dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ma ljang khu ste rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma dokar dmar
195a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// ye shes mi zad pa'i za ma tog dmar mo rang na'i za mA tog 'dzin pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod ma ser mo pad+ma la gnas pa'i rang na sna tshogs kyi dpe sgrom 'dzin pa'o// shar phyogs kyi sgor
195a4(rgyud 'grel): chos so so yang dag par rig pa ma sku mdog dkar dmar phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor de ni so so yang dag par rig ma pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis rin po che'i
195a5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa 'dzin pa'o// nub kyi sgor nges pa'i tshigs s+yo sau yang dag par rig pa dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis mtha' gnyis su pad+mas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrogs 'dzin pa'i// byang gi sgor spobs pa ste so yang dag par
195a6(rgyud 'grel): rig pa ma ma ra ka ta lta bu ljang khu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o// me'i mtsham su sgeg mo ser mo sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa'o// bden
195b1(rgyud 'grel): bral du phreng ba ma dmar ser phyag gnyis kyis rangadwa na'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// rlung du glu ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis pi wang bsgreng ba'o// dbang ldan du gar ma ljang khu phyag gnyis kyis gar byeng ba'i tshul gyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa
195b2(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o// mos pas spyod pa'i sa le sogs pa'i lha mo 'di rnams thams cad nI rad na'i rgyan sna tshogs drang gos dang rang na'i cod pan dang ldan pa dang cung zad 'dzum pa dang sgog pa'i nyams dang ldan pa sna tshogs
195b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil krud kyis bzhugs pa'o// khyad par du sgo skyong ma rnams ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'o// gzhan de rnams kyang zla ba la gnas pa'o zhes so// dkyil 'khor
195b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa dbang ldan nas brtsams nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams te/ dau lA shar phyogs kyi snam bu la kun tu bzang po ser po phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin/ g.yan pas ut+pa la la gnas pa'i ral gri 'jan
195b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// blo gros mi zad pa ser po g.yas pa ral gri dang g.yon pas mi 'jigs pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// sa'aM snying po ser po g.yas pas sa gnon ma dzad pa/ g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i dpag bsam
195b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi shing 'dzin pa'o// na mkha'i snying po ljang khu g.yas pas rang na sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa/ g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'o// lho phyogs kyi snam bu la na mkha'i mdzod ser po g.yas pas
196a1(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas bum pa bzang po la 'phyang ba'i dpag bsam gyi rwa shing 'dzin pa'o// phyag na rin chen ljang khu phyag g.yas pas rin po che dang g.yon pas pad+ma la
196a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho dkar po g.yas dung dang g.yon pas rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje snying po ut+pa lu sngon po'i lo mau lta bu'i mdog can g.yas pas rdo rje dang g.yon pa
196a3(rgyud 'grel): mdo sde sa bcu pa'i po ti 'dzin pa'o// nub tu stan ras gzigs dbang phyug g.yas pas mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya gA yon pas chu skyes dkar po 'adz+ran pa'o// mthu tshon thob ser po g.yas pas ral gri g.yen pas
196a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'adz+ronA pa'i// zla 'od dkar po g.yas pas rdo rje 'khor lo dang g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// dra ba can gyi 'od dkar dmar g.yas pas ral gri dang g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas
196a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// byang du 'od dpag med dkar po g.yas na sna tshogs pAd+ma dang / g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o// spobs pa brtsegs pa ser po g.yas pas se gal
196a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o// mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros gur kum lta bu g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang g.yon pas shag ti 'dzin pa'o// sgrib pa thams cad
196b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par sel ba sngon po g.yas pas ral gri g.yon pas sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ba dran 'dzin pa'o// bcu drug po 'di dag ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa rin
196b2(rgyud 'grel): po che'i ceng pan can rin po cheng ngan bza' sna tshogs pas brgyan pa zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa rnams so// shar sgor ma he la gi shin rje mthar byed rlag po zhal drug pa gsus pa 'phyang ba zhabs drug pa phyag drug gi
196b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa rnams kyis lcags kyu dang ral gri dang mnga' 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhugs pa dang dril bu dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// zhil dang zhabs rnams kyi bye brag gang bzhi no// lha
196b4(rgyud 'grel): sgor shes rab mthar byed ser po zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba'i nal sgeg dang bcas pa'i g.yas gdangs pa/ nub drag po chen po g.yon zhi bI yA na 'di rnams ni go rims ji lta bas ser po dang sngon paM dang dmar po dang ljang
196b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams so// 'di ni phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis zhags pa dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang mnga' rnams 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyi snying kar lcags kyu dang rdo rje dril bu dang mdung dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// nub tu pad+me
196b6(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed dmar po zhal bzhi pa dmar ba sgeg pa dang drag po dang bzhad pa dang zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa ni/ rtsa ba dang g.yas dang rgyab dang g.yon pa'o zhal rnamaso// yang na 'di rnam sa ni dmar po dang nag po dang ser
197a1(rgyud 'grel): po dang dkar po rnams so// phyag brgyud pa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mnga' 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang sdim
197a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// gsum po 'od dag ni rol ba'i gum tu bskyod pas gnas po'o// byung du bgegs mthar byed ston po zhal ba ni sngon po 'am yang nA sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po
197a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ljang gu rnams so// phyag brgyad pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje dril bu dang g.yas pa rnams nI ralo gri dang mda' dang lcags kyi 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams kyis sngogs mdzub dang bcas pa'i
197a4(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa dang gzhu dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o// tshogs kyi bdag po g.yon brkyang bas kun nas mnan nas bzhugs pa'o// dbang ldan gyi mtshams su 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rtul ba sngon po zhal bzhi sngon
197a5(rgyud 'grel): po rtsa ba'i zhal khro ba dang bcas pa'i sgeg pa g.yas drag po rgyab dpa' ba g.yon mi sdug pa'o// ya dan+da 'di dgra sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams so// 'di ni phyag brgyad pa phyag gnyis kyis rje
197a6(rgyud 'grel): rje dang dril bu dang ldan pa thugs kar bzungs nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri deng lcags kyu dang mabar dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// g.yon
197b1(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ba'i stang stabs kyis zhabs g.yon pas dbang phyug chen po'i mgo mnan pa/ g.yas pas u ma'i nu mA rA mnan pa'o// mer rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba nag po sgeg pa dang dpa' ba dang 'jigs su rung ba dang / snying
197b2(rgyud 'grel): rje'i ro dang ldan pa'i zhal bzhi nag po 'am yang na 'di dag ni sngon po dkar po ser po dmar po rnams so// 'di ni phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa
197b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa dang / gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga la 'brel pa'i ba dan 'dzin pa'o// chung ma dang bcas po'i khyab 'jug g.yas brkyang gis mnan pa'o// bden bral du he ru ka rdo rje sngon po sngon po'i zhal bzhi pa
197b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i zhal drag po g.yas sa rab tu dga' bas bzhud pa/ rgyab ni za bar rngam pa g.yon pa sgeg pa'o// yang na 'di dag ni sngon po dang dmor po dang ljang gu dang dkar po'o// 'di ni phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams
197b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang mang+ga' dang khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa dong / g.yon pa rnams kyis snying gar pad+ma kha bye ba dang / gzhu dang dril bu dang ba dan dang bcas pa'i kha T+wAM 'dzin pa'o// phyag gnyis kyis pags pa
197b6(rgyud 'grel): rlung gis gos 'dra ba 'dzin pa'o// chung ma dang bcas pa'i tshangs pa g.yon brkyang bas mnani nas gnas po'o// rlung du rta mchog ljang khu ljang gu'i zhal bzhi pa rtsa be khro ba dang bcas pa'i sgeg pa g.yas pa drag
198a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i zhal tshangasmra pa lta bu ste/ yang na ni 'dri ni ljang gu dang sngon po dang dAkarA po rnams te/ spyi bo rA rta mgo ljang gu'o// 'di ni phyag brgyad pa g.yas drang po sna tshogs rdo rje dang bA ngan gsum
198a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ldan pas phyag bsgreng ba'i tshul byas pa gnyis pas bA dan gsum pa'i tshul byas pa/ phyag gnyis kyis ral gri dang mdo' 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pas phub dang btsos pa'i phyag gis sna tshigs chu skyes 'dzin pa/
198a3(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma gsum gyis sha ga ti dang dbyug pa dang gzhu rnams 'dzin pa'o// zhabs g.yon bskum po g.yas brkyang ba dang g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs bzhi'o// gauyas dang po gcig gis dbang mo dang dpal
198a4(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis pas dga' mo dang tshim mo// g.yon pa gcig gis dbang po dang sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / gnyis pas rgyal bar byed pa dang / dpyid kyi lha mnan na sna gnas bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i steng du na mkhwa
198a5(rgyud 'grel): la gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ser po zhal bzhi ser ba'am yang na ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o// phyog brgyad pa'i g.yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang mnga'o//
198a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu bsnams pa/ rol pa'i kun tu bskyod pas gnas pa'o// 'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po nag po zhal bzhi pa drag po dang zhi ba dang / bzhad pa
198b1(rgyud 'grel): dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i nag po'o// yang na zhal bzhi ni nag po dang dkar mo dang / dmar po dang ser po'o// phyag brgyud pa'i g.yas pa rnams ni rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang mnga'o// g.yon pa
198b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa gsal shing rtse gcig pa drang guzhu rnams 'dzin pa g.yon blarkyang gis gnas bya'o// khro bo bcu po 'di dag ni sna tshogs chu skyes drang nyi ma la gnas pa zhal re re zhing spyan gsuM
198b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum dmar ba smin ma 'khyog pa stag gi lpags pas sku'i stod spyod la dkris pa thod pa'i phred pas gtsug tor byas pas dbu skra 'bar ba dmar serarA gyenA~M du bcings pa sma rA dmar ser dung ldan pa kr-i'i
198b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po brgyad kyis 'dzags su rung bya'o// dkyil 'khor gsum pa kho na'i grwa bzhi'i nang ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa khyo bo bzhi'i phyi'i re khA'i phyi rol gyi gnas su ma la sogs pa'i
198b5(rgyud 'grel): zur thig bzhi po rnams kyi g.yas ljags su mye tog ma la sogs pa bzhi'o// g.yon log sa su gzugs rdo rje mya la stsogs pa bzhi'o// de la me tog ma sarA mo phyag na me tog gi snod 'dzin pa'o// bdug
198b6(rgyud 'grel): skyes ma nag mo phyag na bdug spos kyi phor pa 'dzin pa'o// mar me ma dmar mo phyag na rad na'i sgron mo'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa'o// dri chab ma ljang gu phyag na dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gzugs ma ser
199a1(rgyud 'grel): mo phyag na me long 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje sgyu mu ljang gu phyag na pi wAng 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje ro ma dmar mo phyag na ro'i snod 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje reg bya ma sna tshogs pa'i kha dog can phyag na gos sna tshogs 'dzin
199a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'od rwa brgyad po 'di dag ni zhol gcig phyag gnyis ma rang ni'i cod pan+da dong ldan pa gos sna tshogs dang rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o// bzhi pa rdo rje
199a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la dbang po'i phyogs su dbang po ser po glang po ches bsrungs dkar po'i steng na gnas pa phyag g.yas na rdo rje g.yon pas nu ma 'dzin pa'o// gshin rjes mai he la gshin rje nag po phyag gnyis
199a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis dbyug pa dang rtse gcig pa 'dzin pa'o// chur chu srin la chu bdag dkar po sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka bdun pa klu'i zhags pa dang dung kar 'dzin pa'o// lus dAn du mi lA lus ngan ser po lcags kyu dang dr-i byug tA
199a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan du dbang ldan dkar po gling gi sted+ha na gnas pa rtse gsum pA dang thod pa dang rul pa'i b+h+yo ri cog dang zla ba phyed pas dbu bla rgyan pa/ sbrul gyi mched phyir thogs dang ldan pa mgrin pa sngon po'o//
199a6(rgyud 'grel): mer ra la me lha dmar po blugs gzar dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// bden bral du srin po'i bdag po sngon po ro la gnas pa ra l-i gri dang phub 'dzin pa'o// rlung du rlung lha sngon po ri dwags la gnas pa rlung ris 'dzin
199b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ brgyad po 'di dag ni phyag bzhi pa phyag g.yas pas phyag mtshan dang po 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas phyag mtshan gnyis 'dzin cing rang rang gi btsun mo la 'khyud pa phyag 'og ma gnyis gtso bo la 'dud pa'i tshul gyis
199b2(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor thal mo sbyor ba'o// dbang ldan dang nye ba'i phyi rol du dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams nas rim pas tshungs pa la sogs pa ste/ de la tshangs pa ni ngang pa la zhon pa ser po zhal bzhi ni ser po'o// phyag bzhi pa
199b3(rgyud 'grel): dngo po gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// 'og mra gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang spyi blugs bzung nas thal mo sbyar ba'o// khyab 'jug nag po khyung la zhon pa phyag bzhi pa dang po gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang dung 'dzin pa/
199b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mdung thung dang raM kha'i gzhu 'dzin pa spyi ber thal mo sbyar ba'o// dbang phyug chen po dkaR+sha po glang la zhon pa ral pa'i thar cog can zla bo phyed pasnga mtshan pa/ phyag bzhi pa spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba
199b5(rgyud 'grel): drang rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// gdong drug dam po rma byA la zhon pa / dong drug pa phyag drug pa g.yas pa gnyis sha ka ti dang rdo rje 'dzin pa g.yon pa gnyis kyis khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o// lhag ma gaunyis
199b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'o// 'di rnams kyang gang bzhin du rong gi btsun mo la 'byung po'o// tshangs ma ni tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa'o// drag me ni drag po dang mtshungs pa'o// khyab 'jug ma ni khyab 'jug dang mtshungs
200a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu ma ni gdong drug dang mtshungs pa'o// dbyang mo ni dbang po dang mtshungaso// phyag mo nag mo ni 'ug pa la zhon pa phyag bzhi pa phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis ro hi ta'i nya dang thod pa 'dzin par/
200a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// tsa mun DI dmAr me ri dwags la zhon pa/ phyag bzhi ma g.yas g.yon gyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin po gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// 'dri dA gi ri ti nag mo shin tu skem pa phyag bzhi
200a3(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis kyis phreng ba dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa gnyis kyis phal mo sbyar ba'o// tshogs bdag dkar po byi be la zhon pa glang po che'i gdong can sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can phyag bzhi'i g.yas pa gnyis kyis rtse gsum pa
200a4(rgyud 'grel): dngal du g.yon gnyis kyis dgra sta dang phug 'dzin pa'o// nag po chen po nag po rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// dga' byed dbang phyug nag po rdza rnga la zhon pa rdza rnga brdung ba la brtson pa'o// nyi ma dmar be rta bdun gyis
200a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dren pa'aM shing rta la zhon pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// zla ba dkar po ngang pa la zhon pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pas ku mu da la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil
200a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'dzin pa'o// mig dmar dmar po ra la zhon pa g.yas na gri skur g.yon pas mi mgo za ba'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa'o// lhag pa ser po pad+ma'i steng du mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// phur bu dkar po thod pa 'am sbal pa
200b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga zhen pa phreng b+ha dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// pa ba sangs dkar po pad+ma la gnas pa phreng ba dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// sbron pa nag po rus sbalnga la gnas pa dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o// sgra gcan dmar nag phyag gnyis kyis
200b2(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o// mjug rings nag po ral gri dang klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// stobs dri bzangs dkar po glang po la gnas pa ral gri dang gshol 'dzin pa'o// rgyal bar byed pa ljang gu bya kau ki lA'i shing
200b3(rgyud 'grel): rta la zhon pa ljang gu phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa gnyis na me tog gi phreng ba dang mda' g.yon pa gnyis kyi btung ba'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// spyang rtsir byed pa ngakaR+Sha po na co'i shing rto la gnas pa phyog bzhi pa g.yas
200b4(rgyud 'grel): na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshon dang mda' g.yon pa gnyis na btung ba'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// dpyid kyis lha dkar po spre'u la gnas pa phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa gnyis kyis mda' dang ral gri g.yon pa gnyis btung
200b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// klu mtha' yas dang nor rgyas dang 'jog po dang stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dang dung skyed dang rigs ljon rnams sbrul mgo bdun dang ldan pa thal mo sbyar ba'o// yang na rang rang gi
200b6(rgyud 'grel): yab kyi g.yas pa'i phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo dang ldan pas thal mo sbyar ba'o// thag bzangs ris dang stobs ldan dang tshe mo byed dang / rnam par snang byed la sogs pa lha me yin gyi dbang po chen po rnams mdog nag
201a1(rgyud 'grel): po g.yul 'gyed pa'i go cha sna tshogs bgos pa ral gri dang pe ta kA la sogs pa'i mtshon tshwa sna tshogs phyag gis 'dzin pa'o// na mkha' lding gi dbang po gshog pa brkyang ba pus mo'i bar du dkar
201a2(rgyud 'grel): po de'i steng du lte bar du ser po de'i steng du mgrin pA'i bar du dmar po// de'i steng du mgo'i bar du nag po phyag gnyis thal mo sbyor ba'o// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dmar ser phyag gnyis kyis pi wang gi sgra sgrogs pa'o/
201a3(rgyud 'grel): dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa ser po phyag gnyis kyis pi wang gi sgra sgrogs pa'o// rigs pa 'dzin pa rgyal po don kun grub pa dkar po mye tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// gang ba bzang po sden po// nor bu bzang pA ser po//
201a4(rgyud 'grel): nor sbyin dmyur po/ rnam thos kyi bu sor po/ bI tsa kun d+hu lI dmar po/ ki lI mA lI ljang gu sgo'i dbang po ser po/ spyod pa'i dbang po ser po ste/ gang po bzang po la sogs pa'i gned sbyin gyi bdag po 'dri dag ni phyag gnyis
201a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi g.yas kyis shing tog bi dza pu ra dang g.yen ne'u la 'dzin pa'o// 'phrog ma stor mo phyag gnyis kyis zan gyi chango bu gnyis 'dzin pa bu dang bcas pa'o// tha skar dkarA po dang / pra nya ljang gu dang / smin drug ste bsangs
201a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / snar ma dmar skya dang / mgo nag po dang lag ser po dang / nabs so ser po dong / rgyal sngo bsangs dang / skag dkar po dang / mchu ser po dang / gre me tog pri yang ku lte bu ljang ser dang / sngo ljang gu dang /
201b1(rgyud 'grel): me bzhi dkar po dang / nag pa ljang gu dang / sa ri ser po dang / sa gnag po dang / lha mtshams ljang gu dang / snron ser po dang / snabs ser po dang / chu stong nag po dang / chu smang dkar po dang / gru bzhin dkar ser dang / mon gre
201b2(rgyud 'grel): nag po dang / mon gru ser po dang / khrums stong ljang gu dang / khrums smad ser po dang / nam gru dkar ser dang / byi bzhin sngo bsangs so// tha skar la sogs pa'i lha mo 'di rnams ni stong g.yogs g.yo ba drang bcu
201b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams thal mo sbyar ba'o// gzhan yang lha rnams ni shing rta l-i gnas par shes par bya'o// dbang po la sogs pa'i lha rnams pad+ma la gnas pa re re'ang 'khor dpag tu med pas bskor ba'o// sbyor ba ji lta ba
201b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du rin po che dang gos sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi badrug po bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing / bkra shis kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra phyogs thams cad du sgregs pa'o// shar la
201b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma l-i sogs pa'i sgo skyong rnams na nad gi dkyil 'khor bzhin no// 'dir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i blodog nyid 'jam pa'i dbyings shin tu rnam par
201b6(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin la bdag nyid lta bu'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa'o// me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes kyis ngo bo mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
202a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi dang gtsug tor brgyad dang / spyan ma la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyas btab pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhi dang mA ma kI dang / rdo rje lcagras kyu dang sa bcu gnyis
202a2(rgyud 'grel): dad chos so so yang dag par rig pa mya dang / sgeg mo dang kun tu bzang po la sogs po bzhi dang / khro bo bcu dang me tog ma dang rdo rje gzugs ma dang shar phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la moM bskyod pas so//
202a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje zhags pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis don+ya so so yang dag par rlig pa mya dang phreng bye ma dang / na mkha' mdzod la sogs pa bzhi dang / bdug spos ma dang rdo rje
202a4(rgyud 'grel): sgra ma dang lho'i phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la rin chen 'byung ljon gyis so// rdo rje chos la sogs pa bzhi dang gos dkar mo dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang tshel dbang pa ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis drang
202a5(rgyud 'grel): nges pa'i tshogs so so yang dag par reg ma dang / glu ma dang spyan ras gzigs la sogs pa bzhi dang / mar me ma dang / rdo rje ro ma dang / nub phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la 'od dpag med kyis
202a6(rgyud 'grel): so// rdo rje las la sogs pa bzhi dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa dang / gzungs bcu gnyis dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ma dang / gar mo dang 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi dang dri chab ma
202b1(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje reg bya mA dang / byang phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la don yod grub pas rgyas btab pa'o// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi thugs ka'i sa byon mu'o// A A sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta hrI dA ya ha ra hA ra oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga wan
202b2(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na mur ti b+haM gi shwa r-I/ mau hA wa tsa sarba d+harmA ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AHzhes bya bau nI snying po'i sngags so// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da la big+h+nan+ta ka hUM zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa
202b3(rgyud 'grel): ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so// / ngani so yongasu sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du rlung dang me dang chu dang sa da ri rab kyi stong du gzhal yas khang gi dbu
202b4(rgyud 'grel): su nang gi dkyil 'khor la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ser po rdo rje phreng ba sngon pos bskor ba ste/ 'ga' zhig tu 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad po sngon por gsungs so// gzhan ni 'di'i 'khor lo'i lte ba sngon po
202b5(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi rtsibs dkar po lho nag po nub dri mar kyang ljang gu'o// zhes gsungs so// 'khor lo'i lte ba la sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du bcom ldan 'das shAkya seng ge rnam byar snang
202b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad chen po shin tu gser gyi mdog can chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o// shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje gtsug tor dkar po sa gnon gyi phyag rgya can no// lho'i rtsibs la rin chen gtsug tor sngon po mchog
203a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa'o// nub kyi rtsibs la pad+ma gtsug tor dmar po bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya can no// byang gi rtsibs la sna tshogs gtsug tor ljang gu mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o// ma
203a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs la gtsug tor gzi badz+rod sku mdog dkar dmar phyag g.yas gnyis kyis nyi ma 'dzin pa phyag g.yon pa dkur brten pa'o// bden bral gyi rtsibs lnga gtsug tor rgyal mtshan sku mdog dmar nag 'dres po phyag
203a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// rlung gi rtsibs lha gtsug tor rnon po ni mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag g.yas pas ral gri 'dzin pa g.yon pos po ti 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la
203a4(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor gdugs dkar sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis kyis gdugs 'adz+nyAn pa'o// rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol me la sogs pa'i mtshams su sgeg mo dang phreng ba mA dang glu ma dang gAr ma rnams sku mdog dkar mo dang
203a5(rgyud 'grel): ser mo dang dam raM mo dang sna tshogs can ma phyag gnyis pa'o// snam bu la sgo'i g.yon logs su byang chub sems dpa' gnyis dang g.yas logs su gnyis so// de la shar gyi snam bu la byims pa ser po/
203a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i phyag gis klu shing gi me tog dang / g.yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// mthong ba don yod ser po phyag g.yas pas spyan dang bcas pa'i pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o// ngan
203b1(rgyud 'grel): song kun 'dren dkar po phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros dkar ser 'dres pa'i mdog can phyag g.yas dbyug pa 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o// lho
203b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi snam bu lnga spos kyi glang po dkar ljang g.yas kyis dri'i dung phor 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o// dpa' bar 'gro ba dka po g.yas pas rwal gri g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o// nam
203b3(rgyud 'grel): maukha' mdzod dkar ser g.yas pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa'o// ye shes rtog sngon po phyag g.yas kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa g.yon pa
203b4(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur dkur brten pa'o// nub kyi snam bu la bdud rtsi'i 'od dkar po g.yas pas cod pan gyi stong du bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o// zla bo'i 'od dkar po g.yas pas pad+ma
203b5(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i zla ba 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o// bzung skyong dkar po g.yas pas rin po che 'byur ba dang bcas pa 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dgur brten pa'o// dra ba can gyi 'od dmar po gla yas
203b6(rgyud 'grel): pas rdo rje'i gur 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o// byang gi snom bu la rdo rje snying po sngo skya g.yas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la sngon po 'dzin po g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o// blo gros mi zad
204a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dkar po phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o// slebs pa rtsegs pa dmar po g.yas pasna chu skyes la gnas pA'i rang na brtsegs bsnams pa g.yon pas khu ra
204a2(rgyud 'grel): dkur brten pa'o// kun tu bzang po gsor gyi mdog can phyag g.yas pas rin po che'i ske m+b+ha 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu d+hir dkur brten pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi me la stsogs pa rnamasA la ma tog ma dang bdug sras ma
204a3(rgyud 'grel): dang mar me ma dang / dri chab ma rnams ni dkar mo dang nAg ma dang dmar mo dang ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis me tog la sogs pa 'dzin pa'o// shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu dkar po phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// lho ru
204a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zhags pa sngon po phyag gnyis kyis zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgeg 'dzin pa'o// byang du rdo rje 'bebs po ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin
204a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ rAlha sum cu sgo bdun po 'di dag kyang glos sna tshogs dang rin po che'i rgyun sna tshogs kyis brgyan pA rang na'i cod pan can zhal gcig spyan gnyis pa phyag gnyis pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la sems
204a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o// 'dir rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni rang nyid dang mtshungs pa'i rnam snang gis rgyas btab pa'o// rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa bzhi la rnam snang mdzod chen pos so// shar
204b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyogs dang me'i mtsham snyan gnas pa'i lha rnams la rdo rje gtsug tor gyis so// lho phyogs dang bden bral gyis mtshams na gnas pa rnams lnga rin chen gtsugA tor gyis so// nub phyogs dang rlung gi mtshams nA gnas
204b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la pad+ma gtsug tor gyis so// byang phyogs dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas po rnams la sna tshogs gtsug tor gyis so// 'dir phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gnas kyi snamo bu la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu
204b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsa brgyad po lha'i zhes rgyud las gsungasau pa'i phyir 'dod yon gyi snam bu rnams la byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dgod par mi rigs so// 'ga' zhig ni nang gi dkyil 'khor zhes rgyud du gsungs pas phyi rol gyi
204b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang gi nang du gzhal yas kha gnyis pa'o zhes smra'o// 'ga' zhig tu ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgu gtsug tor dang bcas pa dge slong gi cha lugs 'dzin
204b5(rgyud 'grel): par gsungs so// pad+ma'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba dang / khor yug gi nang du dbang ldan gyi mchims nas brtsams nas/ g.yas skor gyis mgrin pa sbyin pa la sogs pa bskyed par bya ste/ de la dbang ldan
204b6(rgyud 'grel): du glang la mgrin pa sngon po dkar po mchod phyir thogs pa can phyag g.yas gnyis na rdo rje dang mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya g.yon gnyis na rtse gsum pa dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o// mgrin sngon ma mgron pa sngon po lta bu'o//
205a1(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' lding la khyab 'jug nag po g.yas gnyis na dbyug tho dang rdo rje/ g.yon gnyis na dung dang 'khor lo'o// gser gyi rdo rje ma khyab 'jug lta bu khyad par gser gyi mdog can no// rma byA la
205a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dz+wal buzhal drug pa dAmar ba g.yes pa gnyis ni shig ti dang rdo rje g.yon pa g+hon+tisan khyim bya dang rdo rje dril bu'o// rdo rje gzhon nu ma rdo rje dril bu lta bu'o// dang po la mo sme rdo rje ser po zhal byan+ti pa g.yas pa ga
205a3(rgyud 'grel): nardo rje dang sngags bai b+hA ba'i phreng ba g.yon gnyis na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs so// rdo rje zhib mo rmongs pa lta bu'o// glang po che mtsho bri drug pa'i dbang po dkar b+h+yo dang b+hA ba lA rdo rje mtshon cha // r+ya bo rol pa'i kun tu bskyod
205a4(rgyud 'grel): bas gnas pa phyag gi yas nI rdo rje rtswa lnga pa g.yon paste rdo rje rje gsum dkuR+Sha brten pa'o// lha mo dz+nye dz+dza b+hu ra ma ni rdo rje mtshon cha ji lci b+ha'o// rta bdun gyi shing rtu la rdo rje 'khyil pa dmar po khros pa gas pA na pud+ma
205a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi ma rdo rje 'khyil pa bzhin no// dad pa la rdo rje 'od dkar po khro bo phyag g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa pad+ma lnga gnas pa'i zla ba 'dzin pa'o//
205a6(rgyud 'grel): rje mdog mi rdo rje 'od lta bu'o// ral pa rdo rje dmar ser khro bo g.yas kyis rdo rje dmar po 'dzin cing g.yon pas mi bzung nas za ba'i tshul lo// rdo rje ska rags ma rdo rje dmar ser bzhin no// pad+ma la rdo rje ni pa khro bo ser
205b1(rgyud 'grel): mngar dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje zhi ba mA rdo rje zhi ba bzhin no// sbal pa la rdo rje bla ma khro bo ser po g.yas bgrang phreng dang g.yon spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje bla ma ma rdo rje bla ma bzhin no// pad+ma la rdo rje pa ny+tsa sangs khro bo dkar
205b2(rgyud 'grel): po g.yas na bgrang phreng dang g.yon na spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje pa wa sad+ma se mA rdo rje ba wa sangs bzhin no// rus sbrul la ji rje dbyug pa khro bo nAg paM g.yas pa na rdo rje g.yon pa na dbyig pa'o// rdo rje dbyug pa min rdo rje
205b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa dang 'dra ba'o// rdo rje sgra gcan khri bro dmar nag g.yas pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang g.yon pas nyi ma 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje lha min ma rdo rje sgra gcan dang 'dra ba'o// rdo rje mjug rnyings khro bo mdog nag po g.yas
205b4(rgyud 'grel): pas ral gri g.yon pas sbrul zhags 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje glu ma rdo rje mjug rings bzhin no// bzhi po 'di dag dang rdo rje zhi bA la sogs pa drug rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa ltar bdag gis bris so// glang po che la rdo rje
205b5(rgyud 'grel): gleng sku dkar po g.yas rdo rje g.yon pa sta ga shol 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'dul ba ma rdo rje glang sna bzhin no// de'i khyad par ni g.yon pas khA T+wAM gr-i 'dzin pa'o// byA ka kI la'i shing rta la rdo rje phreng ba can ljang gu gAyas
205b6(rgyud 'grel): pa na rdo rje g.yon pa na me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje brtan ma rdo rje phreng ba ji lta ba las khyed par ni phyag g.yon pa na mdung ngo // ne tse'i shing rta la rdo rje dbang can ser po g.yas na rdo rje/ g.yon pa ni chu srin gyi
206a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje dbang can ma rdo rje dbang can dang 'dra'o// khyad par ni sku mdog dmar ba'o// sprul pa la rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba dkar po rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gdan ma rdo rje rnam
206a2(rgyud 'grel): par rgyal ba dang 'dra ba'o// me tog la rdo rje gtun shing ser po g.yas g.yon gyis rdo rje dang gtun shing 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje pho nya mo rdo rje gtun shing lta bu'o// khyad par ni g.yon pas kha nAM 'dzin pa'o// rwa la rdo rje me
206a3(rgyud 'grel): dmar po g.yas gnyis kyis rdo rje dang gi cha g.yon gnyis dbyug to dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'bar ma rdo rje me lte bu'o// ma he la rdo rje nag po sku mdog nag po rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// ro ldangs
206a4(rgyud 'grel): la rdo rje nag mo sku mdog nag mo rdo rje dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// klu lhag paM li rdo rje lcags kyu sngon po phag pa'i zhal rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// mi la rdo rje gdong ma sngon ma phag gdong rdo rje dang ral gri
206a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// chu srin la rdo rje klu dkar po sbrul mgo brgyad dang ldan pa g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas klu'i zhags pa'o// chu srin lnga rdo rje chu srin ma dkar mo sbrul mgo brgyad dang ldan pa g.yas pas rdo rje dang
206a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'o chu srin 'dzin pa'o// ri dwags la rdo rje rlung sngon po g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas rlung sgrib pa'i gos 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje shugs can ma rdo rje rlung lta bu'o// ro langs la rdo rje 'jigs
206b1(rgyud 'grel): byed sngon po rdo rje dang dbyug to 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rnam par rtsigs ma rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu'o// khyad par ni g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// byi ba la rdo rje log 'dren dkar po glang po che'i zhal phyag g.yas pa gnyis
206b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis rdo rje dang dgra sta g.yon pa gnyis kyis rtse gsum pa dang / dbyug to 'dzin pa sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa'o// pra ba byi ba la sbrul mo sngon mo g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas phyag shing 'dzin pa'o// bsdigs ma/
206b3(rgyud 'grel): ljang khu g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas ral gri'i bye brog phe Ta ka 'dzin pa'o// dpal mo sku mdog ser mo g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas+t+ra pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// dbyangs can ma dkur mo g.yas na rdo rje g.yon pa ni pi wang
206b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// seng gre la bgrod dka' ma ljang gu phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rdo rje dang tsakra g.yon pa gnyis na lde mag dang ral gri 'dzin po'o// 'di na mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa'i lha 'di dag gis phyag g.yas
206b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams na ji ltar rig par rdo rje rtse gsum par reg par bya'o// nub tu rdo rje klu dang nye bar pad+ma la gnas pa'i lha mo gser gyi mdog lta bu phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa bsnams pa'o// lha ma yin
206b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni sku mdog sna tshogs pa go cha sna tshogs pa bgos nas ral gri 'dzin pa ras bal gyi gdan 'jam pa la gnas pa'o// klu rnams ni nor bu dang ldan pa'i gdengs ka can btsun mo dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar
207a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// 'khor yug gi phyi rol tu me'i mtshams su mA nar med pa'i dmyal ba la sogs pa rnams so// bden bral gyi mtsham su yi dwags rnamaso// rlung gi mtshams su dud 'gro'i 'gro ba rnams so//
207a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan du mi'i 'gro ba rnams so// rim pa 'od ni rgyud gzhan gyi tshul gyis bris pa'o// gzhan ni rdo rje 'jigs byed dang nye bar sa'i lha mo dang gnod sbyin rnams so// rdo rje nag mi dang nye bar lha ma yin rnams so// zhes bya ba
207a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa brjod par byed do// dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i thugs kar zla ba la aM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu nA yaM swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags dgod // de nyid ni stong po'i sngags so// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ sarba du rko ti pa
207a4(rgyud 'grel): ri sho d+ha nI rA dzA ya ta thA gI ta ya/ Ar+ha twe s+yamyAk+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ au sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sArbaM pAM paM bau shau d+hAn+te/ shud+d+he bi shr-id+d+hi/ sarbe kar+m+ma ba rA Na bi shud+d+he sA hA/ zhes bya ba ni phreng bya'i sngags sau// rdo rje 'bebyas pa'i snuH
207a5(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba bi sar+b+ba prA ya ga ti ga hA na bi sho d+hi ni hUM haMHphaT ces bya ba ni las thams cad pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra yak+Sha hUM zhes pa gzhan dag go// 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor la/ rdo rje
207a6(rgyud 'grel): gur gyi nang du ri rab kyi nang du sna tshogs pad+ma'o ze'i 'bru la gnas po'i rdo rje rgya gram gyi lte ba'i dbus su gzhal yas khang po lte ba la glang po che'i rgyal po'i steng ngam de med kyang rung ste sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la 'byung ba
207b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i 'od zer dang ldan pa ral pa'i thor cog can+d+ra skA ra dmar ser thod pa lnga dang ldan pa mig gsum pa mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung ba gsus pa 'phyang ba sbrul gyis
207b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod phyir thogs pa can stag gi lpags pas phyed dkris pa/ lag pa bzhi pa g.yas pa gnyis gri gug dang Da ma ru g.yon pa gnyis kyis thod pa dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa drag po/ g.yon brkyang gis mnano pa'i bcom ldan
207b3(rgyud 'grel): 'das 'byung po 'dul byed drag po chen po sku mdog sngon po thod pa lngas mtshan pa'i cod pan la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar bas bcings pa gos sngon po gyon pa zhal mche ba
207b4(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs pa spyan gsum dmar ba sgeg po'i gang mo mdzod pa/ phyag bzhi pa'i g.yas pas rdo rje sngon po 'jigs pa gsor zhing g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa phyag gnyis kyis phyag rgya mdzad pa'o//
207b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya ni srin lag gnyis bsnol nas mdzub mo gnyis bskum par bya'o// mthe chung dang gung mo yang mthe bong rgan pos mnan par bya'o// zhes pa 'di gsungs so// klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pa ste ngo la kwa ko Ta spon
207b6(rgyud 'grel): pos dbu skra bcings pa/ 'dzag po dmar pos mgul brgyan byas pa/ dga' ba dang nye dga' bo ser pos rna ba brgyan pa ser por gcig pas gcig tu bgrang ngo do// mtha' yas dkar pos chings skung / nor rgyas dkar
208a1(rgyud 'grel): bas sku rags/ phyag rgya bcings pa'i phyag gnyis kyis dpung par rigs ldan phug ron gyi mdog lta bus brgyan pa/ dud skyong dkar pos phyug gzhan gnyis kyis dpung pa la brgyan pa/ pad+ma pa
208a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma chen po dmar pos rkang gdub byas pa'o// mdog gcig pos gcig nyid do// shar phyogs kyis re mig la glang dang nyi ma la dbang phyug cheri blo mtshan ma gyen du langs pa thod pa tsan thal ba'i mdog spyan gsum
208a3(rgyud 'grel): pa zla ba phyed kyis mtshan pa'i ral po'i thor cog can sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyag bzhi pa phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis gri gug dang Da ma ru She dzin pa g.yon gnyis kyis thod pa dang rtse gsum
208a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'id lho ru na mkha' lding gi steng du nyi ma la khyab 'jug nag po cod pAn dmar po can/ phyag g.yos pa gnyis kyi swA rnga ya ba dang dung 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa gnyis kyis khor lce dang du byug to 'dzin pa'o// nub
208a5(rgyud 'grel): tu ngang pa dang zla ba'i steng du tshangs pa dkar po zhal bzhi pa yas pa gnyis kyis baglang phreng dang gdugs kyi u ba 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa gnyis kyis pad+ma dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// byang du rma bya dang nyi ma'i steng du
208a6(rgyud 'grel): sprin drug gi bu dmar po gtsug phud gsum dang ldan pa g.yas pas rnga yab g.yon pas sha ka ti 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan du pra ba byi ba dang zla ba la tshigs bings dkar po glang po che'i zha lo spyan gsum pa spyi
208b1(rgyud 'grel): bor zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i phyag g.yas pa gnyis na la phug dang dgra sta g.yon gnyis na rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// mer nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nyi ma dmar sde g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gnyis kyis mtsho skyes la gnas
208b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyi mo'o dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// bden bral du shing rta'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i sgra gcan dmar nag dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa smin ma dang mig dang sma ra dmar ser 'bar ba mche ba bzhi po zhal gdangs
208b3(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis nyi ma dang zla bar bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar ba'o// rlung du zla ba'i steng du dga' byed dbang phyug ser po gar byed cing spyi bor zla ba phyed pa can sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa/ g.yas
208b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang cig shos dag gis DA ma ru dang rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o// rim pa gnyis pa la shar gyi phyogs su zla ba la dpal mo dkar mo thugs kaur thal mo sbyar bsau me tog pa d+mo 'dzin pa'o// lho'i phyogs su zla ba la thig le
208b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog ma dmar mo gar byed cing spos snod 'dzin pa'o// nub tu zla ba la zla ba mo dmar mo mar mo 'dzin pa'o// byang du zla ba la dka' zlog ma ser mo gdengs ka'i lag pa bAzlo gre naswa spyi bor pA zhag nas gar byed pa'o// mer zla
208b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la rin chen dpal mo dmar mo dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa'o// bden brel du zla ba la dbyangs can ma ljang gu pi wa gi sgo sgrogs pa'o// rlung du zla ba la lha mdzes ma nag me rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan du zla ba la
209a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang po 'byor ma ser mo gar byed ma phyag na rdo rje rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o// rim pa gsum pa'i shar du glang po sa bsrungs dkar po dang zla ba la brgya byin ser po mig stong dang ldan pa rin po che'i cong
209a2(rgyud 'grel): pan can phyag g.yas pa skyabs sbyin g.yon pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// lhor ma he dang nyi ma la gshin rje nag po gsus pa 'phyang ba spyan gsum dang smin ma dang sma ra dang ral pa dmar se ro can na bza' ser po snams pa phyag g.yas pas
209a3(rgyud 'grel): thod pas mo chen pa'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// nub tu sbrul dang zla bo lA chu lha dkar po sbrul gyi gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa/ g.yas pas michog sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad
209a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas sbrul gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// byang du gnod sbyin gyi steng du lus ngan po ser po sha rgyas shing gsus pa 'phyang ba rin po che'i cong pan can g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gnyis kyis dbyug to dang ne'u le 'dzin pa'o//
209a5(rgyud 'grel): mer rA dang nyi ma la mo lha dmar po ral pa gsum dang ldan pa sgo dang sma raM ser zhing 'bar ba gsus po 'phyang ba phrag pa la phyog tshang sku ba btags pa mchod phyir thogs pa can g.yas pa gnyis kyis mchog sbyin dang bgrang
209a6(rgyud 'grel): phreng 'dzin pa g.yon pa gnyis kyis dbyug pa rtse gsum pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// bden bral du ro langs dang nyi ma la srin po nag po/ smin ma nag po dang // sma ra dmar ser 'bar ba dang ldan pa phyag g.yas kyis ral gri
209b1(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon gyis mi shas gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o// rlung du ri dwags dang zla ba la rlung lha sngon po gtsug phud gsum dang ldan pa phyag gnyis kyis rlung ras 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan du dad pa dang zla ba la zla ba dkar po g.yas pas ku mu ta la
209b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor g.yon pas mchog sbyin no// dbang ldan yang dbang phyug chen po lta bu'o// rim pa bzhi pa'i shaR+Sha du zla ba la seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin ma dkar mo seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// lhor zla ba la
209b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i rnam par rgyal ma dmar mo lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// nub tu zla ba la pad+ma ldan ma chen mo dkar mo gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o// byang du zla ba la chang 'phrog ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o//
209b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan du zla ba la mchog 'phrog ma ser mo thugs kar me tog dang bcas pa'i thil mo kha sbyar ba'o// mer zla ba la rin chen dbang phyug ma sor mo spos phor 'dzin pa'o// bden bral du zla ba la rgyan ma sor mo dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa'o//
209b5(rgyud 'grel): rlung du zla ba la 'gro skyong ma ser mo mar me'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa'o// 'dir gang la khyad par gyi tshig med pa de rnams la nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o// lha thams cad sems dpa'i skyil krung can
209b6(rgyud 'grel): gos dang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i rigs kyi bdag po ni mi bskyod pa'o// thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo // hUM badz+ra phaT tsis pa ni snying po'o// yang na oM b+hu ta Da ma ra b+hU ta a ti pa ta
210a1(rgyud 'grel): ak+Sho b+hu kI rI Tin sArba b+hU tA pre ta pi shA tsA na sa d+ha ya hUM phaT ces bya ba nI las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang de nyid do// yang nA bgegs mthar byed kyis so// / mkha'
210a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro lnga'i dkyil 'khor la/ ji rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa nas bzung nas gzhol yas khang gi bar du sngar gyi 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du shes par bya'o// de la dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su
210a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnamasu gau rI la sogs pa rnams dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su puk+ka sI l-i sogs pa'o// de la gau rI dkar mo g.yas pas lcags
210a4(rgyud 'grel): kyu 'dzin pa'o// tsau rI dmar me zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// pe ta lI dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o// g+hasma rI ljang gu rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o// puk+ka sI sngon mo phyag na byang chub sems kyi bum pa 'dzin
210a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// sha ba rI dkar mo rI rab 'dzin pa'o// tsat+tA lI sngon mo me thab 'dzin pa'o// DoM b+hi ni sku mdog sna tshogs ma rgyal mtshan chen po'i ba dan 'dzin pa'o// shar phyogs kyi gzhal-i ya sau khang gi dbus su zla ba'i stestong
210a6(rgyud 'grel): du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro dkar po ste/ rtsa ba'o zhal dkar po g.yon pa dmar po gzhan thams cad sngon po'o// g.yas pa'i phyag brgyad kyi thod pa na rma byA dang ma he dang / chu srin dang nya dang rgyal po dang rus sprul
210b1(rgyud 'grel): dnga' lhag pa'i klu dang ngang pa rnams so// g.yon pa brgyad kyi thod pa rnams na da byid dang srog chags dz+yeSh+Ti dang sbrul hA la ha la dang a dza nA b+h+ye dang byi pa dang g.yag dang dri can dang lcogs rnamaso// shaR+Ya la sogs pa'i sgo rnams
210b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa rnamasu rim pa bzhin du skom pa me la sogs pa'o lha mo rnams so// de la skam po me ste n+da me phyag g.yas paM na skom pa 'dzin pa/ zhag sde ldan ma ser mo zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// dol zlum me dmar
210b3(rgyud 'grel): mo nya rgya zlum po 'dzin pa'o// lcags kyu ma ljang gu lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// me tog ma dkararA mo me tog gi za ma tog 'dzin pa'o// bdug spos mA nag me spos pher 'dzin pa'o// mar me ma ser me mar me'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa'o//
210b4(rgyud 'grel): dri chub mo ser mo dri ser pos kang ba'i dung 'dzin pa'o// lho phyogs kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rin chen mkha' 'gro ser po s+t+waM/ 'di'i rtsa ba dang g.yon pa gnyis ser po dang dkar po lhag ma rnams ni sngon po g.yas
210b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thod pa rnams na byA ka ran d+ha dang / ngur pa dang lug dang byA tsi ke ra dang khra dang hor pa dang 'o lnga pa dang byA ku ra'o// g.yon pa rnams nA stobs kyi rgyu dang / dung skyong dang rigs ldan+da dang pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dang / 'jog po dang
210b6(rgyud 'grel): nor rgyas dang mtha' yos rnams// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshamos su lha mo rnams te/ de la ni phyag ma dkar mo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// mar mo ma sngon mo mar me'i mchod
211a1(rgyud 'grel): stong 'dzin pa'o// rin chen dkar mda' mu ser mo rin po che 'dzin pa'o// glog phyag ma ljang gu glog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// sgeg mo dmar mo snyems pa dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje 'dzin
211a2(rgyud 'grel): papa'od phreng ba ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// glu ma dmar skra phyag gnyis kyis ting ting shags 'dzin pa'o// gar ma sna tshogs pa'i mdog phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang bcas pas gar byed
211a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'odan nub kyi gzhal yas kau bang gi dbus su pad+ma mkha' 'phro dmar po ste/ 'da'i rtsa ba'i zhal dang g.yon pa ni dmar po dang dkar po dang lhag ma rnams ni nag po'o// phyag g.yas pa'i thod pa rnams na dom dang bya rgod dang
211a4(rgyud 'grel): bse dang ba men dang stag dang spre'u dang / chu spyan ni kra dang ce spyang rnams so// g.yon pa rnams na kha dang 'ug pa dang so bya dang seng ge dang / bya sa ra swa dang ni dwags dang phyog pa rnams// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams
211a5(rgyud 'grel): dang dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams la lha mau rnamaso// de la'i shar phyogs su pad+ma dkar mo pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// chos 'byung ma ser mo ches 'byung 'dzin pa'o// lcags sgrog ma nag mo phyag gnyis kyis lcags sgrog
211a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// rang mkhyud ma ljang bu sangs rgyas thams cad la rjesau su chags pa'i phyag na rdo rje dang thod pa bzung bse rang la 'khyud pa'o// gling bu ma dmar me phyag gnyis kyis gling bu bzung nas sgra sgrogs pa'o// pi
211b1(rgyud 'grel): wang ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis pi wang bsgreng ba la brtson pa'o// mu kun Da mA dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis rnga bo che brdung ba'o// rdza rngam du ba'i mdog can phyag gnyis kyis rdza rnga brdung ba'o// byang gi gzhal yas khang gi
211b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su sna tshogs mkha' 'gro dur ba ltar ljang gu ste/ 'di'i rtsa ba'o zhal ni rta'i gdong ljang gu'o// gzhan rnams ni lha'i zhal lo// phyogs gcig lo rtsu ba'i zhal yang lha'i zhal lo// g.yon pa dkar po lha ga ma rnam
211b3(rgyud 'grel): nag po'o// phyag g.yas pa'i thod pa rnams ni gza' lag pa dang phur bu dang mjug rings dang sgra gcan 'dzin dang mig dmar dang pa wa sangs dang spen pa dang khyab 'jug rnams so// g.yon pa rnams la dbang po dang
211b4(rgyud 'grel): chu lha dang tshangs pa dang drag po dang 'dod pa'i lha dang stebs bzangs drang thag bzangs ris dang stobs can rnams so// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang dbang ljon+da la sogs par lha mo rnams so// de la sgo lcags
211b5(rgyud 'grel): ma kar mo nI sgro lcags 'dzin pa'o// lce rgyug m+b+ha sorar+ya me lce rnyog 'dzin pa'o// smyo glegs ma daMm+bAr mo sgo glegs 'dzin pa'o// yol ba 'dzin ma nAg mo phyag gnyis kyis rol ba'adzin pa'o// spyan ma dkar mo
211b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// mA ma kI sngon mo rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// gos dkar mo dmar mau phyag na pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// sgrol ma ljang gu phyag na ut+pa la sngon po 'dzin pa'o// gzhal yas khang chen po'i sgo rnams dang dbang
212a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan la sogs pa rnams su gau rI la sogs pa dang puk+ka sI lA sogs pa ste sngar bzhin no// 'dir rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni gdan dang mdog dang dbyibs dang zhal dang phyag lnga sogasu pa rnams ni hUM
212a2(rgyud 'grel): ru ka lha dgu'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor lu ji ltar phyag bcu drug pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang 'khyud pa'i yum bdag med ma yang de bzhin no// 'khor lo'i mkha'o 'gro ma la sogs po bzhi po 'di ni bshad pa'o/
212a3(rgyud 'grel): khyad par rnams las khyad par gzhan rnams ni rdo rje mkha'o 'gro dang mtshungs pa'o// de rnams la 'khyud pa'i lha mo rnams ni go rims ji lta baR+Sha spyanA ma drang mA ma kI dang gos dkur mo dang sgrol ma rnams ni dkar mo
212a4(rgyud 'grel): drong ser mo dang dra mar mau dang ljang gu de gri gug dang / sdigs mdzub drung ldan pa'i phyag gnyis pa rnamaso// mkha' 'gro ma lnga po rnams kyang re re zhing de bzhin ga shogs pa lnga'i cod pan can no// gzhal yas khang
212a5(rgyud 'grel): gi lha mo rnams ni gcer bu spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa mche ba gtsigs pa zhol gcig pa phyag gnyis pa dbu skra 'bar ba gyen du brdzes pa dpral ba'i dbyes la thod pa lnga dang mi mgo skam po'i do shal dang
212a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa'o// sna tshogs pad+ma dang ro dang nyi ma rnams la g.yas bskum g.yon po rkyang gi gar gyis gnas pa'o// gang khyad par ma bshad pa rnams ni g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis sdigs mdzub snying
212b1(rgyud 'grel): gar 'dzin pas bsdigs par mdzad do// 'khyud pa'i lha mo rnams la ni gdan tha dad pa med do// gau rI la sogs pa brgyad la rim pa bzhin du ro'i gdan gyis gnas su tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang drag
212b2(rgyud 'grel): po gshin rje dang lus ngan po dang sbyin po dang thag bzangs ris rnams zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no// mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang gau rI la sogs pa rnams rdo rje mkha' 'gro la zhal mngon par phyogs pa'o// lha gzhan
212b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni rang rang gi bdag po lnga mngon par phyogs pa'o// dgyes pa rdo rje'i spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa dang rdo rje'o// sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams la/ thugs dang / rtag pa dang / rin 'byung dang / 'od dpag med rnams so//
212b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa'i spyi bor 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang 'khor lo'o// sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams la thugs dang / rin 'byung dang / 'od dpag med dang / don yod grub pa rnams so// rdo rje nyi ma'i spyi bor rin 'byung dang yid
212b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bu'o// de'i sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams kyi ni sku dang thugs dang / 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pA rnams so// pad+ma glar gyi dbang phyug gi spyi byor pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje pad+ma'o// de'i sgo dang mtsham
212b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi lha mo rnams kyi ni sku rdo rje dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang mi bskyed pa dang / tshe dpag med rnams so// rta mchog go spyi bor ral gri 'dzin pa dang ral gri'o// sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams kyi ni sku rdo rje dang gsung
213a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang / 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnamaso// phyi rol g+hi gau rI la sogs pa rnams sngar dang mtshungs pa'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro rnams kyis thugs ka'i sa bon ni rga
213a2(rgyud 'grel): rims bzhin du hUM oM traM AHkhaM zhes bya ba rnams// snying po'i sngags rnams ni/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/ marda marda/ badz+ra d+h+r-ika phaT swA hA/ oM shA shwa tA pa ra ma shwA shA ta aM h+ye hi dza nA dzi ka hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra
213a3(rgyud 'grel): sUr+ya ta mo bri d+ha ma na~M sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM rot+na d+h+ri ga phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra d+harma sa ma ya s+t+waM hu lu hu lu a ro l-ig phaT swA hA/ oM phu phu hi hi pradz+nyo d+h+r-i ga phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ ni mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya maH
213a4(rgyud 'grel): daMSh+Ta~M ti ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ badz+ra san de ha darbA yAM mA ta kun+d+ha laM hUM zhes bya ba ni bgegs mthar byed kyis sngags te/ las thams cad pa'o// / mkha' 'gro lnga po 'di dag gang yaMngang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
213a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus su bsgom par bya ba de re re yang so so'i dkyil 'khor du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ sangs rgyas mgon po gang zhig nyid/ dbus su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor gsungs//
213a6(rgyud 'grel): snying po lon phyir dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor re re bsgom pa 'am// yang ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes gsungs so// // 'khor lo sgyur ba drug gi dkyil 'khor lo// rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa
213b1(rgyud 'grel): dang 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'i bar du 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa ji lta ba'i rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo'o// khro bo bcu ni gzhan te 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor las
213b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i rdo rje dbyug pa la sogs pa nas rdo rje sa 'og gi bar lta bu'o zhes pa ni khyad par ro// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa 'di'i lte ba'i nang gi chos 'byung gi dbus su rlung dang me dang chu dang gser gyis gzhi'i dkyil 'khor
213b3(rgyud 'grel): dang du ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la gzhal yas khang chen po'o// phyogs gzhan la 'di'i chos 'byung med do zhes pa'o// gzhal yas khang chen po'i lte bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas
213b4(rgyud 'grel): khang gi dbus su gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhugs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o zhes mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las gsungs pas/ nyi
213b5(rgyud 'grel): ma la gnas pa'i 'jigs byed dang gau rI dag gi steng du rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas pa'i ye shes mkha' 'gro rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po 'am nag po rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dril bu ldan pa'i g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi
213b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gis yum la 'khyud pa'o// lha mo de ni rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i phyag g.yas brkyang pa khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'bul ba'i phyag g.yon gyis yab la 'khyud pa sku mdog dmar po ye shes mkha'
214a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma ste/ mang gnan chas byu dbyis kyi dpung phyug ma zhes pa dang rdo rje phag mo zhes kyang grags so// de nas shUr+ya la sogs pa'i phyogs la g.yas sbyor gyis sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro la sogs pa/
214a2(rgyud 'grel): bo dgod par bya ste/ de dag gi 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor so sor shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su g.yon skor gyis dpyod cing me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnamasu g.yas skor gyis dgod par bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' phyogs
214a3(rgyud 'grel): bral rnams l-i/ rim pa ji lta bas mkha' 'gro ma dang / lA ma dang / dum skyes ma dang / gzugs can ma rnams ni ston mo dang / ser mo dang / dmar mo dang / ljang gu rnams g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa'o// sgo rnamasu thod pa'i
214a4(rgyud 'grel): dum bu dang / keng rus chen po dang / keng rus dang / mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa rnams sku mdog nag po rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rab tu gtum mo gtum pa'i mig can ma dang / 'od ldan ma dang sna chen
214a5(rgyud 'grel): ma thal ba dkar po'i mdog can rnams la 'khyud pa'o// de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzhal yas khrung gis dbus su seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i tshangs pa'i snying gar sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro rdo
214a6(rgyud 'grel): rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa sku mdog dkar po 'khor lo dang 'khor los mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag g.yas dang g.yon gnyis kyis sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la 'khyud pa'o// sgo rnams la chang dgra dang /
214b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med dang / rdo rje 'od dang rdo rje lus rnams ni sku mdog dkar po 'khor lo dang 'khor los mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag gnyis kyis dpa' bo'i blo gros ma dang mi thung ma dang lang gra'i dbang phyug ma dang shing grib ma
214b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams ser mo lnga 'khyud pa'o// rin tshun+d+ra 'byung ldan gyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rta'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i lha'i bu nyi ma'i snying ger rin chen mkha' 'gro rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa sku mdog ser
214b3(rgyud 'grel): po rin po che dang rin po ches mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gnyis kyis rin chen mkha' 'gro ma ser mo la 'khyud pa'o// sgo rnams la myu gu can dang / rdo rje ral po can dang / dpa' bo chen po dang / rdo rje hUM
214b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad rnams sku mdog ser po rin po che dang / rin po ches mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag gnyis kyis sa srungs ma dang 'jigs byed chen mo dang rlung shugs ma dang chang thung ma rnams ljang gu'i kha dog dang ldan pa la 'khyud
214b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'od na snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i snying gar pad+ma mkha' 'gro dmar po rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa sku mdog dmar po
214b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang pad+mas mtshan pa'i dril bu dang ldan pa'i phyag g.yas pa dang g.yin pa gnyis kyos pad+ma mkha' 'gro dmar mo la 'khyud pa'o// sgo rnams la shin tu bzang po dang rdo rje bzang po dang 'jigs byed chen po dang / mig mi
215a1(rgyud 'grel): bzang rnams dmar po pad+ma dang pad+mas mtshan pa'i dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis lha mo sngo spangs ma dang / shin tu bzang mo dang / rta rna mo dang / bya rog gdong ma rnams sku mdog dkar mo la 'khyud pa'o// mi
215a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su glang po che'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi mA la gonas pa'i khyab 'jug gi snying gar rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i rdo rje mokha' 'gro nag po rdo rje dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bur ldan
215a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag g.yas dang g.yon pa gnyis rdo rje mkha' 'gro me la 'khyud pa ste/ lha mo de ni dmar mo 'am nog mo'o// sgo rnams la stobs po che dang / rin tshon rdo rje dang / rta myagrin dang / na mkha'i snying po rnams nag po rdo rje dang rdo rjes me
215a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khor lo'i shugs canu maM dang / dum skyes mA dang / chang 'thung ma dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma rnams ser mo la 'khyud pa'o// don yod grub pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbusu na mkha'
215a5(rgyud 'grel): lding gi steng du sna tshogs pad+mo dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i lha'i bu zla ba'i snying gar rdo rje skyilo krung gis bzhugs pa'i sna tshogs mkha' 'gro sku mdog ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje dang / sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu gzung ba'i phyag
215a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis sna tshogs mkha'i 'gro ma ljang gu la 'khyud pa'o// sgo rnams su he ru ka pid+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje sems dpa' rnams sku mdog ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin po'i
215b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis kyis shin tu dpa' mo dang / stobs chen mo dang / 'khor los sgyur ma dang / brtson 'grus chen mo rnams du bya lta bu'i sngo skya'i mdog can ma la 'khyud pa'o// de ltar dpa' mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni g.yas brkyang gis
215b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o// 'dir mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi ni g.yon pa thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa g.yas pas Da ma ru 'dzin pa'o// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dang rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa rnams ni phyag g.yas pas rdo
215b3(rgyud 'grel): rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub gdengs pa'o// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bo'i blo gros ma la sogs pa rnams kyi ni 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub po// rin chen mkha' 'gro ma dang sa srungs ma la so/
215b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams ni rin po che dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub bo// pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma dang lha mo sngo bsangs ma la sogs pa rnams ni pad+ma dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub bo// rdo rje mkha' 'gro mya dang shugs can mi 'khor lo
215b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub baM// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma dang shin tu dpa' mo la sogs pa rnams ni sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub bo// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la
215b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa thams cad la yang 'khyud par byed pa'i g.yon pa'i phyag tu 'dzag pa dang bcas pa'i khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo rnams la khwa gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong ma dang /
216a1(rgyud 'grel): khyi gdong mA dang / phyag gdong ma rnams ming gis rjes su 'thun pa'i zhal te rim pa ji lta bas sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'i mdog can rnams/ phyug g.yas rnams na lcags kyu dang / zhal
216a2(rgyud 'grel): bapa dang / lcags skyog dang / dril bu 'udzin pa'o// mtshams rnams la gshin d+he bair+d+han ma dang / gshin rje pony+tsa maM dang / glu shin d+hi mche ba ma dang / gshin rje 'joms ma rnams ni mi mo'i gdong pa can no// glu yas dang g.yon
216a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha mi'i khA dog g.yas g.yon gyi sku phyed phyed dang ldan pa rnams te/ phyag g.yas bA na me long dang pi wang dang dri'i dung chos dang ro'i snod rnams 'dzin pa'o// lha mo brgyad po 'di dag kyang phyug g.yon pas thod pa
216a4(rgyud 'grel): dang khwa rde ga 'dzin pa g.yas brgyang gis gnas pa'o// gzhal yis khang rnyog po rnams kyi yang mtshams su sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems la sogs pos glang po'i thod po rnams// mkha' 'grom
216a5(rgyud 'grel): lce sogs pa nas ga shin rje 'joms ma'i mthar thug/ pA rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi mA la gnas pa'i rlo rnams la bizhugs pa'o// khor los sbyar ba rnams kyang rol gnas pa'o zhes pa phyogs glunan
216a6(rgyud 'grel): nadu lnga po rnams ni sgra rgyab tu 'phyang ba'i sdug gi lpags pa'i rinam thabs dkris pa ma ched phyir thogs pa can mo mgo rnan pa'i phreng ba mgrin pa la 'phyang ba rol pa nag par bar tsog can mo// lham rnams ni maN+Di
216b1(rgyud 'grel): bu skra nag po grol zhing mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba mgrin pa la 'phyang ba'o// lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyang zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa rdo rje phreng bas mtshan pa'i dpral ba'i steng du thod pa lngas brgyan pa
216b2(rgyud 'grel): dpung rgyan dang g.yer ga la sogs pas brgyan pa phyag rgya lha dong ldan pa'o// 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kho na phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa/ nor bu dang zla ba phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan po'i ral pa'i thor tsog can
216b3(rgyud 'grel): ngag go/ lha mo sum cu rtsa bzhi rnams rang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la mngon paraphyogs pa'o// 'khor lo sI sgyur ba rnam pa lnga dang khwa ge dong ma la sogs pa rnams kyis dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po
216b4(rgyud 'grel): la mngon par phyogs pa'o// dpa' bo rnams ni rang rang gi shes rab ma la mngon par phyogs po'o// de ltar bshad pa 'di ni phyogs gcig go// 'khor lo sgyur ba drug po 'di dag kyang zhabs g.yas brkyang ngo // zhes bya
216b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khyad par ni phyogs gnyis pa'o// phyogs gnyis po 'di dag la ye shes mkha' 'gro dang sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro dang de dag gi 'khor rnams kyang seng ge'i steng du gnas pa dang / rin chen mkha' 'gro dang / de'i
216b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnams kyang rta'i steng du gnas pa dang / pad+ma mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang rma ba'o steng du gnas pa dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang glang po che'i steng du gnas pa dang / sna tshogs mkha' 'gro dang de'i
217a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnams kyang namakha' lding gi steng du gnas pa'o// ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa 'di dag rdo rje skyil krung can no// khwa gdong ma la sogs pa brgyad po 'di dag phyogs skyong brgyad rnams la
217a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o zhes pa ni phyogs gsum pa'o// phyogs 'di rnams dang phyogs gzhan rnams la ye shes mkha'i 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams ni zhal gcig phyog bzhi pa la sogs pa nyid dang / zhal gsum
217a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug lo sogs pa nyid dang / zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa la sogs pa nyid dang / zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug pa la sogs pa nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu smos nas gsungs te/ gzhung mangs pas 'jigs
217a4(rgyud 'grel): pos 'dor ma bstan to// rang rang gi 'khon rnams la dkyil 'khor gyi rigs kyi bdag po ni 'khor l-Is sbyar pa drug gis so// 'khor los sgyur ba lha la ni rdo rte mkha' 'groso// de nyid la ni ye shes mkha' 'gros so//
217a5(rgyud 'grel): khA gdong ma la sogs pa rnams la nI sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste/ ye shes mkha' 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni khA gcig gi/ ye shes mkha' 'gro bI lA sogs pa'i rim pa ji lta bar thugs ka'i snga bon rnams lA nI baM b+hU aM
217a6(rgyud 'grel): hU~MhUM hUM khaM ngo // snying po'i sngags rnamasaM na oM shrI ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa DA ki ni dzA la saM ba raM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI bud+d+ha DA kI la la la pAM AHDA ki nI dz+wa la saM b+ha raM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI ran+ta DA ki tAM AHhUM DA ki nI dzA l-i saM
217b1(rgyud 'grel): b+ha raM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI pad+ma DA ka hrIHAHhUM DA ki ni dz+wA lA saM b+hA ra hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra DA ka AHhUM phaT DA kI nI dz+wA la saM b+ha raM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI bi shA DA ka hoHkhaM UHhUM DA kI nI dz+wA la saM b+ha raM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba'o// oM
217b2(rgyud 'grel): khaM hUM phaT+Ta/ ces bya ba ni dum+me skyes mu ste las thams cad pa'i sngags// / deng l-i dus kyi 'khor le'i dkyil 'khor lo/ rdo rje gur gyi nang du bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa s+ho// de'i shir dang lho dang nub dang
217b3(rgyud 'grel): byang gi rtsibs rnams la shin tu stobs byed dang rmongs byed dang / rengs byed dang rgyal byed rnams te/ gshin rje mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang bgegs mthar byed ces bya ba ming gi rnam grangs so// me la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams
217b4(rgyud 'grel): lho dbyug pa ston po dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang stobs po che dang mi g.yo ba rnams so// steng gi rtsibs la gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o// 'og gi rtsibs la gnod mdzes rgyal po'o// de skad du'ang rtsa ba las/ de rjes 'khor lo
